4729             * @description 当超出最大值时，是否截取 ，默认为false
4730             * @default intercept:false
4731             * @example
4732             * $("#id").maxLength({intercept:false});
4733             */
4734             intercept :false ,
4735              /**
4736             * @name maxLength#status
4737             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4738             * @description 是否显示提示信息，默认为true
4739             * @default status:true
4740             * @example
4741             * $("#id").maxLength({status:true});
4742             */
4743             status :true ,
4744             /**
4745             * @name maxLength#statusClass
4746             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4747             * @description 提示信息的class名 ，默认为"ui-maxLength-statusClass"
4748             * @default statusClass:"ui-maxLength-statusClass"
4749             * @example
4750             * $("#id").maxLength({statusClass:"ui-maxLength-statusClass"});
4751             */
4752             statusClass :"ui-maxLength-statusClass" ,
4753             /**
4754             * @name maxLength#statusText
4755             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4756             * @description 提示信息里面text值 ，默认为"您可以输入的字符个数为："
4757             * @default statusText:"您可以输入的字符个数为："
4758             * @example
4759             * $("#id").maxLength({statusText:"您可以输入的字符个数为："});
4760             */
4761             statusText :"您可以输入的字符个数为：" ,
4762             /**
4763             * @name maxLength#notificationClass
4764             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4765             * @description 当超出最大值时，文本框的样式class名 ，默认为"ui-maxLength-notification"
4766             * @default notificationClass:"ui-maxLength-notification"
4767             * @example
4768             * $("#id").maxLength({notificationClass:"ui-maxLength-notification"});
4769             */
4770             notificationClass :"ui-maxLength-notification" ,
4771             /**
4772             * @name maxLength#showAlert
4773             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4774             * @description 当超出最大值时，是否显示alert提示信息，默认为false
4775             * @default showAlert:false
4776             * @example
4777             * $("#id").maxLength({showAlert:false});
4778             */
4779             showAlert :false ,
4780             /**
4781             * @name maxLength#alertText
4782             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4783             * @description 当超出最大值时，alert提示信息所提示的内容 ，默认为"您输入的字数太多了！"
4784             * @default alertText:"您输入的字数太多了！"
4785             * @example
4786             * $("#id").maxLength({alertText:"您输入的字数太多了！"});
4787             */
4788             alertText :"您输入的字数太多了！" ,
4789             /**
4790             * @name maxLength#slider
4791             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4792             * @description 提示信息是否获得焦点时显示，失去焦点后隐藏，默认为false
4793             * @default slider:false
4794             * @example
4795             * $("#id").maxLength({slider:false});
4796             */
4797             slider :false ,
4798             /**
4799             * @name maxLength#events
4800             * @param {maxLength} maxLength maxLength对象
4801             * @description 事件绑定，默认为‘keyup’事件
4802             * @default events: ['keyup']
4803             * @example
4804             * $("#id").maxLength({events: ['keyup']});
4805             */
4806             events : ['keyup']
4807 
4808         },
4809 		_create:function(){
4810 		},
4811 		_init:function(){
4812             var settings = this.options,item = $(this.element),charactersLength = item.val().length;
4813             // 更改提示信息的文本内容，即修改提醒字数
4814 			function updateStatus(){
4815 				var charactersLeft = settings.maxCharacters - charactersLength;
4816 				if(charactersLeft < 0){
4817                     //加入intercept参数。
4818                     if(settings.intercept){
4819                           charactersLeft = 0;
4820                     }
4821 				}
4822 				item.next("div").html(settings.statusText+charactersLeft);
4823 			}
4824 
4825             //验证字数
4826 			function checkChars(){
4827 				var valid = true;
4828 				// 当内容过多时
4829 				if(charactersLength >= settings.maxCharacters){
4830 					valid = false;
4831 					// 加入内容过多时的样式
4832 					item.addClass(settings.notificationClass);
4833                     //加入intercept参数，是否截取
4834                     if(settings.intercept){
4835                         item.val(item.val().substr(0,settings.maxCharacters));
4836                      }else{
4837                         updateStatus();
4838                      }
4839 					// 判断是否显示alert提示信息的内容
4840 					showAlert();
4841                     //失去焦点时将其样式移除，获得焦点时，添加该样式
4842                     item.blur(function(){
4843                         if(item.hasClass(settings.notificationClass)){
4844                              item.removeClass(settings.notificationClass);
4845                         }
4846                     }).focus(function(){
4847                          item.addClass(settings.notificationClass);
4848                     });
4849 				}else{
4850 					// 移除内容过多时的样式
4851 					if(item.hasClass(settings.notificationClass))
4852 					{
4853 						item.removeClass(settings.notificationClass);
4854 					}
4855 				}
4856 
4857 				if(settings.status){
4858 					updateStatus();
4859 				}
4860 			}
4861 
4862 			// 显示alert提示信息的内容
4863 			function showAlert(){
4864 				if(settings.showAlert)
4865 				{
4866 					alert(settings.alertText);
4867 				}
4868 			}
4869 
4870 			// 检查需要验证的元素，textarea和input
4871 			function validateElement(){
4872 				var ret = false;
4873                 if(item.is('textarea')) {
4874 					ret = true;
4875 				}else if(item.is("input[type=text]")) {
4876 					ret = true;
4877 				}else if(item.is("input[type=password]")) {
4878 					ret = true;
4879 				}else if(item.attr('contentEditable')){
4880                      charactersLength = item.text().length ;
4881                      ret = true;
4882                  }
4883 
4884 				return ret;
4885 			}
4886 
4887 			// Validate
4888 			if(!validateElement()){
4889 				return false;
4890 			}
4891 
4892 			// 事件绑定
4893 			$.each(settings.events, function (i, n) {
4894 				item.bind(n, function(e) {
4895                     if(item.is('textarea')||item.is('input')){
4896                          charactersLength = item.val().length;
4897                     } else{
4898                          charactersLength = item.text().length ;
4899                     }
4900 					checkChars();
4901 				});
4902 			});
4903 
4904 			// 初始化提示信息div
4905 			if(settings.status){
4906 				item.after($("<div/>").addClass(settings.statusClass).html('-'));
4907 				updateStatus();
4908 			}
4909 
4910 			// 移除提示信息div
4911 			if(!settings.status){
4912 				var removeThisDiv = item.next("div."+settings.statusClass);
4913 
4914 				if(removeThisDiv) {
4915 					removeThisDiv.remove();
4916 				}
4917 
4918 			}
4919 
4920 			// slider=true时，提示信息获得焦点时显示，失去焦点后隐藏
4921 			if(settings.slider) {
4922 				item.next().hide();
4923 				item.focus(function(){
4924 					item.next().slideDown('fast');
4925 				});
4926 				item.blur(function(){
4927 					item.next().slideUp('fast');
4928 				});
4929 			}
4930 
4931 		}
4932 	});
4933 
4934     $.extend($.ui.maxLength, {
4935         version: "1.0",
4936         author:"黄卉"
4937     });
4938 
4939 })(jQuery);
4940 /*
4941 	Masked Input plugin for jQuery
4942 	Copyright (c) 2007-2011 Josh Bush (digitalbush.com)
4943 	Licensed under the MIT license (http://digitalbush.com/projects/masked-input-plugin/#license) 
4944 	Version: 1.3
4945 */
4946 (function($) {
4947 	var pasteEventName = ($.browser.msie ? 'paste' : 'input') + ".mask";
4948 	var iPhone = (window.orientation != undefined);
4949 
4950 	$.mask = {
4951 		//Predefined character definitions
4952 		definitions: {
4953 			'9': "[0-9]",
4954 			'a': "[A-Za-z]",
4955 			'*': "[A-Za-z0-9]"
4956 		},
4957 		dataName:"rawMaskFn"
4958 	};
4959 
4960 	$.fn.extend({
4961 		//Helper Function for Caret positioning
4962 		caret: function(begin, end) {
4963 			if (this.length == 0) return;
4964 			if (typeof begin == 'number') {
4965 				end = (typeof end == 'number') ? end : begin;
4966 				return this.each(function() {
4967 					if (this.setSelectionRange) {
4968 						this.setSelectionRange(begin, end);
4969 					} else if (this.createTextRange) {
4970 						var range = this.createTextRange();
4971 						range.collapse(true);
4972 						range.moveEnd('character', end);
4973 						range.moveStart('character', begin);
4974 						range.select();
4975 					}
4976 				});
4977 			} else {
4978 				if (this[0].setSelectionRange) {
4979 					begin = this[0].selectionStart;
4980 					end = this[0].selectionEnd;
4981 				} else if (document.selection && document.selection.createRange) {
4982 					var range = document.selection.createRange();
4983 					begin = 0 - range.duplicate().moveStart('character', -100000);
4984 					end = begin + range.text.length;
4985 				}
4986 				return { begin: begin, end: end };
4987 			}
4988 		},
4989 		unmask: function() { return this.trigger("unmask"); },
4990 		mask: function(mask, settings) {
4991 			if (!mask && this.length > 0) {
4992 				var input = $(this[0]);
4993 				return input.data($.mask.dataName)();
4994 			}
4995 			settings = $.extend({
4996 				placeholder: "_",
4997 				completed: null
4998 			}, settings);
4999 
5000 			var defs = $.mask.definitions;
5001 			var tests = [];
5002 			var partialPosition = mask.length;
5003 			var firstNonMaskPos = null;
5004 			var len = mask.length;
5005 
5006 			$.each(mask.split(""), function(i, c) {
5007 				if (c == '?') {
5008 					len--;
5009 					partialPosition = i;
5010 				} else if (defs[c]) {
5011 					tests.push(new RegExp(defs[c]));
5012 					if(firstNonMaskPos==null)
5013 						firstNonMaskPos =  tests.length - 1;
5014 				} else {
5015 					tests.push(null);
5016 				}
5017 			});
5018 
5019 			return this.trigger("unmask").each(function() {
5020 				var input = $(this);
5021 				var buffer = $.map(mask.split(""), function(c, i) { if (c != '?') return defs[c] ? settings.placeholder : c });
5022 				var focusText = input.val();
5023 
5024 				function seekNext(pos) {
5025 					while (++pos <= len && !tests[pos]);
5026 					return pos;
5027 				};
5028 				function seekPrev(pos) {
5029 					while (--pos >= 0 && !tests[pos]);
5030 					return pos;
5031 				};
5032 
5033 				function shiftL(begin,end) {
5034 					if(begin<0)
5035 					   return;
5036 					for (var i = begin,j = seekNext(end); i < len; i++) {
5037 						if (tests[i]) {
5038 							if (j < len && tests[i].test(buffer[j])) {
5039 								buffer[i] = buffer[j];
5040 								buffer[j] = settings.placeholder;
5041 							} else
5042 								break;
5043 							j = seekNext(j);
5044 						}
5045 					}
5046 					writeBuffer();
5047 					input.caret(Math.max(firstNonMaskPos, begin));
5048 				};
5049 
5050 				function shiftR(pos) {
5051 					for (var i = pos, c = settings.placeholder; i < len; i++) {
5052 						if (tests[i]) {
5053 							var j = seekNext(i);
5054 							var t = buffer[i];
5055 							buffer[i] = c;
5056 							if (j < len && tests[j].test(t))
5057 								c = t;
5058 							else
5059 								break;
5060 						}
5061 					}
5062 				};
5063 
5064 				function keydownEvent(e) {
5065 					var k=e.which;
5066 
5067 					//backspace, delete, and escape get special treatment
5068 					if(k == 8 || k == 46 || (iPhone && k == 127)){
5069 						var pos = input.caret(),
5070 							begin = pos.begin,
5071 							end = pos.end;
5072 						
5073 						if(end-begin==0){
5074 							begin=k!=46?seekPrev(begin):(end=seekNext(begin-1));
5075 							end=k==46?seekNext(end):end;
5076 						}
5077 						clearBuffer(begin, end);
5078 						shiftL(begin,end-1);
5079 
5080 						return false;
5081 					} else if (k == 27) {//escape
5082 						input.val(focusText);
5083 						input.caret(0, checkVal());
5084 						return false;
5085 					}
5086 				};
5087 
5088 				function keypressEvent(e) {
5089 					var k = e.which,
5090 						pos = input.caret();
5091 					if (e.ctrlKey || e.altKey || e.metaKey || k<32) {//Ignore
5092 						return true;
5093 					} else if (k) {
5094 						if(pos.end-pos.begin!=0){
5095 							clearBuffer(pos.begin, pos.end);
5096 							shiftL(pos.begin, pos.end-1);
5097 						}
5098 
5099 						var p = seekNext(pos.begin - 1);
5100 						if (p < len) {
5101 							var c = String.fromCharCode(k);
5102 							if (tests[p].test(c)) {
5103 								shiftR(p);
5104 								buffer[p] = c;
5105 								writeBuffer();
5106 								var next = seekNext(p);
5107 								input.caret(next);
5108 								if (settings.completed && next >= len)
5109 									settings.completed.call(input);
5110 							}
5111 						}
5112 						return false;
5113 					}
5114 				};
5115 
5116 				function clearBuffer(start, end) {
5117 					for (var i = start; i < end && i < len; i++) {
5118 						if (tests[i])
5119 							buffer[i] = settings.placeholder;
5120 					}
5121 				};
5122 
5123 				function writeBuffer() { return input.val(buffer.join('')).val(); };
5124 
5125 				function checkVal(allow) {
5126 					//try to place characters where they belong
5127 					var test = input.val();
5128 					var lastMatch = -1;
5129 					for (var i = 0, pos = 0; i < len; i++) {
5130 						if (tests[i]) {
5131 							buffer[i] = settings.placeholder;
5132 							while (pos++ < test.length) {
5133 								var c = test.charAt(pos - 1);
5134 								if (tests[i].test(c)) {
5135 									buffer[i] = c;
5136 									lastMatch = i;
5137 									break;
5138 								}
5139 							}
5140 							if (pos > test.length)
5141 								break;
5142 						} else if (buffer[i] == test.charAt(pos) && i!=partialPosition) {
5143 							pos++;
5144 							lastMatch = i;
5145 						}
5146 					}
5147 					if (!allow && lastMatch + 1 < partialPosition) {
5148 						input.val("");
5149 						clearBuffer(0, len);
5150 					} else if (allow || lastMatch + 1 >= partialPosition) {
5151 						writeBuffer();
5152 						if (!allow) input.val(input.val().substring(0, lastMatch + 1));
5153 					}
5154 					return (partialPosition ? i : firstNonMaskPos);
5155 				};
5156 
5157 				input.data($.mask.dataName,function(){
5158 					return $.map(buffer, function(c, i) {
5159 						return tests[i]&&c!=settings.placeholder ? c : null;
5160 					}).join('');
5161 				})
5162 
5163 				if (!input.attr("readonly"))
5164 					input
5165 					.one("unmask", function() {
5166 						input
5167 							.unbind(".mask")
5168 							.removeData($.mask.dataName);
5169 					})
5170 					.bind("focus.mask", function() {
5171 						focusText = input.val();
5172 						var pos = checkVal();
5173 						writeBuffer();
5174 						var moveCaret=function(){
5175 							if (pos == mask.length)
5176 								input.caret(0, pos);
5177 							else
5178 								input.caret(pos);
5179 						};
5180 						($.browser.msie ? moveCaret:function(){setTimeout(moveCaret,0)})();
5181 					})
5182 					.bind("blur.mask", function() {
5183 						checkVal();
5184 						if (input.val() != focusText)
5185 							input.change();
5186 					})
5187 					.bind("keydown.mask", keydownEvent)
5188 					.bind("keypress.mask", keypressEvent)
5189 					.bind(pasteEventName, function() {
5190 						setTimeout(function() { input.caret(checkVal(true)); }, 0);
5191 					});
5192 
5193 				checkVal(); //Perform initial check for existing values
5194 			});
5195 		}
5196 	});
5197 })(jQuery);
5198 /*
5199  * Metadata - jQuery plugin for parsing metadata from elements
5200  *
5201  * Copyright (c) 2006 John Resig, Yehuda Katz, J�örn Zaefferer, Paul McLanahan
5202  *
5203  * Dual licensed under the MIT and GPL licenses:
5204  *   http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php
5205  *   http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html
5206  *
5207  * Revision: $Id: jquery.metadata.js 4187 2007-12-16 17:15:27Z joern.zaefferer $
5208  *
5209  */
5210 
5211 /**
5212  * Sets the type of metadata to use. Metadata is encoded in JSON, and each property
5213  * in the JSON will become a property of the element itself.
5214  *
5215  * There are three supported types of metadata storage:
5216  *
5217  *   attr:  Inside an attribute. The name parameter indicates *which* attribute.
5218  *          
5219  *   class: Inside the class attribute, wrapped in curly braces: { }
5220  *   
5221  *   elem:  Inside a child element (e.g. a script tag). The
5222  *          name parameter indicates *which* element.
5223  *          
5224  * The metadata for an element is loaded the first time the element is accessed via jQuery.
5225  *
5226  * As a result, you can define the metadata type, use $(expr) to load the metadata into the elements
5227  * matched by expr, then redefine the metadata type and run another $(expr) for other elements.
5228  * 
5229  * @name $.metadata.setType
5230  *
5231  * @example <p id="one" class="some_class {item_id: 1, item_label: 'Label'}">This is a p</p>
5232  * @before $.metadata.setType("class")
5233  * @after $("#one").metadata().item_id == 1; $("#one").metadata().item_label == "Label"
5234  * @desc Reads metadata from the class attribute
5235  * 
5236  * @example <p id="one" class="some_class" data="{item_id: 1, item_label: 'Label'}">This is a p</p>
5237  * @before $.metadata.setType("attr", "data")
5238  * @after $("#one").metadata().item_id == 1; $("#one").metadata().item_label == "Label"
5239  * @desc Reads metadata from a "data" attribute
5240  * 
5241  * @example <p id="one" class="some_class"><script>{item_id: 1, item_label: 'Label'}</script>This is a p</p>
5242  * @before $.metadata.setType("elem", "script")
5243  * @after $("#one").metadata().item_id == 1; $("#one").metadata().item_label == "Label"
5244  * @desc Reads metadata from a nested script element
5245  * 
5246  * @param String type The encoding type
5247  * @param String name The name of the attribute to be used to get metadata (optional)
5248  * @cat Plugins/Metadata
5249  * @descr Sets the type of encoding to be used when loading metadata for the first time
5250  * @type undefined
5251  * @see metadata()
5252  */
5253 
5254 (function($) {
5255 
5256 $.extend({
5257 	metadata : {
5258 		defaults : {
5259 			type: 'class',
5260 			name: 'metadata',
5261 			cre: /({.*})/,
5262 			single: 'metadata'
5263 		},
5264 		setType: function( type, name ){
5265 			this.defaults.type = type;
5266 			this.defaults.name = name;
5267 		},
5268 		get: function( elem, opts ){
5269 			var settings = $.extend({},this.defaults,opts);
5270 			// check for empty string in single property
5271 			if ( !settings.single.length ) settings.single = 'metadata';
5272 			
5273 			var data = $.data(elem, settings.single);
5274 			// returned cached data if it already exists
5275 			if ( data ) return data;
5276 			
5277 			data = "{}";
5278 			
5279 			if ( settings.type == "class" ) {
5280 				var m = settings.cre.exec( elem.className );
5281 				if ( m )
5282 					data = m[1];
5283 			} else if ( settings.type == "elem" ) {
5284 				if( !elem.getElementsByTagName )
5285 					return undefined;
5286 				var e = elem.getElementsByTagName(settings.name);
5287 				if ( e.length )
5288 					data = $.trim(e[0].innerHTML);
5289 			} else if ( elem.getAttribute != undefined ) {
5290 				var attr = elem.getAttribute( settings.name );
5291 				if ( attr )
5292 					data = attr;
5293 			}
5294 			
5295 			if ( data.indexOf( '{' ) <0 )
5296 			data = "{" + data + "}";
5297 			
5298 			data = eval("(" + data + ")");
5299 			
5300 			$.data( elem, settings.single, data );
5301 			return data;
5302 		}
5303 	}
5304 });
5305 
5306 /**
5307  * Returns the metadata object for the first member of the jQuery object.
5308  *
5309  * @name metadata
5310  * @descr Returns element's metadata object
5311  * @param Object opts An object contianing settings to override the defaults
5312  * @type jQuery
5313  * @cat Plugins/Metadata
5314  */
5315 $.fn.metadata = function( opts ){
5316 	return $.metadata.get( this[0], opts );
5317 };
5318 
5319 })(jQuery);/*
5320  *作    者: 高娜
5321  *版    本: 1.2
5322  *完成时间: 2012-05-14
5323  *描    述: verification
5324  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
5325  */
5326 (function($,undefined){
5327     /**
5328 	* @class 输入区域掩码功能
5329     * @name verification
5330     * @description 输入区域掩码插件
5331 	* @version 1.2
5332     */
5333 	$.widget('ui.verification',
5334 	/** @lends verification.prototype */
5335 	{		
5336 		options:{
5337 			/**  
5338 			* @name verification#verSplit
5339 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5340 			* @description 输入区域分割符,可设置为'-','/'等
5341 			* @default {String} '-'
5342 			* @example
5343 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5344 			*		verSplit : '-'
5345 			*  });
5346 			*/
5347 			verSplit : '-' ,			
5348 			/**  
5349 			* @name verification#verPromptMobile
5350 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5351 			* @description 手机号码输入区域提示信息
5352 			* @default {String} '请输入11位数字'
5353 			* @example
5354 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5355 			*		verPromptMobile : '请输入11位数字'
5356 			*  });
5357 			*/
5358 			verPromptMobile : '请输入11位数字' ,
5359 			/**  
5360 			* @name verification#verPromptString
5361 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5362 			* @description 字母输入区域提示信息
5363 			* @default {String} '请输入a-z或是A-Z'
5364 			* @example
5365 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5366 			*		verPromptString : '请输入a-z或是A-Z'
5367 			*  });
5368 			*/
5369 			verPromptString : '请输入a-z或是A-Z',
5370 			/**  
5371 			* @name verification#verPromptNumber
5372 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5373 			* @description 数字输入区域提示信息
5374 			* @default {String} '请输入0-9'
5375 			* @example
5376 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5377 			*		verPromptNumber : '请输入0-9'
5378 			*  });
5379 			*/
5380 			verPromptNumber : '请输入有效数字',
5381 			/**  
5382 			* @name verification#verFloatDigit
5383 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
5384 			* @description 小数默认可输入的位数
5385 			* @default {Number} 2
5386 			* @example
5387 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5388 			*		verFloatDigit : 2
5389 			*  });
5390 			*/
5391 			verFloatDigit : 2 ,
5392 			/**  
5393 			* @name verification#verPromptPhone
5394 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5395 			* @description 座机输入区域提示信息
5396 			* @default {String} '输入固定电话'
5397 			* @example
5398 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5399 			*		verPromptPhone : '输入固定电话'
5400 			*  });
5401 			*/
5402 			verPromptPhone : '输入固定电话',
5403 			/**  
5404 			* @name verification#verPromptEmail
5405 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5406 			* @description Email输入区域提示信息
5407 			* @default {String} '输入有效的email地址'
5408 			* @example
5409 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5410 			*		verPromptEmail : '输入有效的email地址'
5411 			*  });
5412 			*/
5413 			verPromptEmail : '输入有效的email地址',
5414 			/**  
5415 			* @name verification#verPromptUrl
5416 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5417 			* @description url输入区域提示信息
5418 			* @default {String} '输入有效的链接地址'
5419 			* @example
5420 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5421 			*		verPromptUrl : '输入有效的链接地址'
5422 			*  });
5423 			*/
5424 			verPromptUrl : '输入有效的链接地址',
5425 			/**  
5426 			* @name verification#verPromptIP
5427 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5428 			* @description IP输入区域提示信息
5429 			* @default {String} '输入有效的IP地址'
5430 			* @example
5431 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5432 			*		verPromptIP : '输入有效的IP地址'
5433 			*  });
5434 			*/
5435 			verPromptIP : '输入有效的IP地址',
5436 			/**  
5437 			* @name verification#verPromptTime
5438 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5439 			* @description 时间输入区域提示信息
5440 			* @default {String} '输入有效的时间'
5441 			* @example
5442 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5443 			*		verPromptTime : '输入有效的时间'
5444 			*  });
5445 			*/
5446 			verPromptTime : '输入有效的时间',
5447 			/**  
5448 			* @name verification#verPromptAttendance
5449 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
5450 			* @description 考勤输入区域提示信息
5451 			* @default {String} '输入有效的考勤'
5452 			* @example
5453 			* $('.verInput').verification({
5454 			*		verPromptAttendance : '输入有效的考勤'
5455 			*  });
5456 			*/
5457 			verPromptAttendance : '输入有效的考勤'
5458 		},
5459 		_create:function(){
5460 			var self = this.element ;
5461 			var parDiv = '<div class="parDiv"></div>' ;
5462 			self.wrap(parDiv) ;
5463 		},
5464 		_init:function(){
5465 			var o = this.options ;
5466 			var self = this.element ;
5467 			var veifType = self.attr('data-verif') ;			
5468 			var verifFun ;
5469 			if(veifType){
5470 				switch(veifType){
5471 					case 'verMobile' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptMobile).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptMobile) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verMobile; break ;
5472 					case 'verString' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptString).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptString) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verString; break ;
5473 					case 'verNumber' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptNumber).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptNumber) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verNumber; break ;
5474 					case 'verPhone' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptPhone).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptPhone) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verPhone; break ;
5475 					case 'verEmail' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptEmail).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptEmail) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verEmail; break ;
5476 					case 'verUrl' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptUrl).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptUrl) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verUrl; break ;
5477 					case 'verIP' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptIP).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptIP) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verIP; break ;
5478 					case 'verTime' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptTime).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptTime) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verTime; break ;
5479 					case 'verAttendance' : (self.val() == '') ? self.val(o.verPromptAttendance).addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',o.verPromptAttendance) : self.addClass('varPrompt').attr('data-val',self.val()) ; verifFun = verAttendance; break ;
5480 				}
5481 			}else{
5482 				return false ;
5483 			} ;
5484 			self.focus(function(){
5485 				self.removeClass('varPrompt').removeClass('inputPrompt') ;
5486 				verifFun() ;
5487 			}) ;
5488 			
5489 			//判断是否是数字
5490 			function isNumber(letter){
5491 				if(((letter<=57)&&(letter>=48))||((letter<=105)&&(letter>=96))){
5492 					return true ;
5493 				}else{
5494 					return false ;
5495 				}
5496 			}
5497 			
5498 			//判断是否是字母
5499 			function isLetter(letter){
5500 				if((letter<=90)&&(letter>=65)){
5501 					return true ;
5502 				}else{
5503 					return false ;
5504 				}
5505 			}
5506 			
5507 			//判断是否在数组中
5508 			function isInArr(targetElem,sourceArr){
5509 				for(var i=0; i<sourceArr.length;i++){
5510 					if(targetElem == sourceArr[i]){
5511 						return true ;
5512 					}
5513 				}
5514 			}
5515 			
5516 			//判断是否是通用按键
5517 			var commonKeyArr = new Array('8','9','13','16','17','18','19','20','27','32','33','34','35','36','37','38','39','40','45','46','91','92','93','112','113','114','115','116','117','118','119','120','121','122','123','144','145') ; //键盘键值-删除:8,tab:9,enter:13,shift:16,ctrl:17,alt:18,pause:19,capslock:20,esc:27,空格:32,pageup:33,pagedown:34,end:35,Home:36,左键:37,上键:38,右键:39,下键:40,insert:45,delete:46,空格左边窗口键:91,空格右边窗口键:92,黏贴:93,F1-F12:112-123,NumLock:144,ScrollLock:145
5518 			function isCommonKey(letter){
5519 				var isCom = isInArr(letter,commonKeyArr) ;
5520 				if(isCom){
5521 					return true ;
5522 				}else{
5523 					return false ;
5524 				}
5525 			}
5526 			
5527 			//判断是否是闰年
5528 			function isLeapYear(pYear){
5529 				if(!isNaN(parseInt(pYear))){
5530 					if((pYear%4==0) && (pYear%100!=0)||(pYear%100==0) && (pYear%400==0)){
5531 						return true ;
5532 					}else{
5533 						return false ;
5534 					}
5535 				}
5536 			}
5537 			
5538 			//生成气泡提示
5539 			function createBubble(obj,bubconmsg){
5540 				$(obj).bubble("temBub",true,{
5541 					x:$(obj).offset().left + 10 ,
5542 					y:$(obj).offset().top + 4 ,
5543 					content:bubconmsg,
5544 					hand:"leftTop"
5545 				}) ;	
5546 				setTimeout(function(){$('#temBub').detach() ;},500) ;
5547 			}
5548 			
5549 			//键盘触发数字方法
5550 			function keydownNumber(objkey,maxLengthkey,focusObjkey,frontFocuskey){
5551 				objkey.keydown(function(e){
5552 					var inputLetter = e.which ;
5553 					if(!isCommonKey(inputLetter)){
5554 						var lenTim = objkey.val().length ;
5555 						if(maxLengthkey != 'placeholderKey'){
5556 							if(lenTim<maxLengthkey){
5557 								if(isNumber(inputLetter)){
5558 								}else{
5559 									return false ;
5560 								}
5561 							}else{
5562 								if(focusObjkey != 'placeholderKey'){
5563 									focusObjkey.focus() ;
5564 								}
5565 								return false ;
5566 							}
5567 						}else{
5568 							if(isNumber(inputLetter)){
5569 							}else{
5570 								return false ;
5571 							}
5572 						}
5573 					}
5574 					if(focusObjkey != 'placeholderKey'){
5575 						if(inputLetter == 9){
5576 							focusObjkey.focus(function(){
5577 								focusObjkey.attr('data-focus',true)
5578 							}) ;
5579 						}
5580 					}
5581 					if(frontFocuskey != 'placeholderKey'){
5582 						if(inputLetter == 8){
5583 							var objkeyLen = objkey.val().length	;
5584 							if(objkeyLen == 0){
5585 								frontFocuskey.focus() ;
5586 							}
5587 						}
5588 					}
5589 				}) ;
5590 			}
5591 			
5592 			//判断获得焦点的对象
5593 			function documentFocus(objFocus,classArr,documentFocusVal){
5594 				var isDocument = true ;
5595 				$(document).focus(function(e){
5596 					isDocument = false ;
5597 					var target = e.target ;						
5598 					var isHasNull ;
5599 					var classObj ;				
5600 					if(!isInArr($(target).attr('class').split(' ')[0],classArr)){
5601 						for(var i=0; i<classArr.length ; i++){
5602 							classObj = eval('$(".'+classArr[i]+'")') ;
5603 							if(classObj.val() == ''){
5604 								isHasNull = true ;
5605 							}
5606 						}
5607 						if(isHasNull){
5608 							self.val(documentFocusVal).show().addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5609 						}else{
5610 							self.val(documentFocusVal).show() ;
5611 						}
5612 						objFocus.parent('.EditDiv').hide() ;
5613 					}
5614 				}) ;
5615 				if(isDocument == true){
5616 					$(document).click(function(e){
5617 						var target = e.target ;						
5618 						var isHasNull ;
5619 						var classObj ;				
5620 						if(!isInArr($(target).attr('class').split(' ')[0],classArr)){
5621 							for(var i=0; i<classArr.length ; i++){
5622 								classObj = eval('$(".'+classArr[i]+'")') ;
5623 								if(classObj.val() == ''){
5624 									isHasNull = true ;
5625 								}
5626 							}
5627 							if(isHasNull){
5628 								self.val(documentFocusVal).show().addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5629 							}else{
5630 								self.val(documentFocusVal).show() ;
5631 							}
5632 							objFocus.parent('.EditDiv').hide() ;
5633 						}
5634 					}) ;
5635 				}
5636 			}
5637 			
5638 			/*手机验证*/
5639 			function verMobile(){
5640 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptMobile){
5641 					self.val('') ;
5642 				}
5643 				var mobileLen = 11 ;
5644 				keydownNumber(self,mobileLen,'placeholderKey','placeholderKey') ;
5645 				self.blur(function(){
5646 					if(self.val().length<mobileLen){
5647 						createBubble(self,'请输入11位的手机号码') ;
5648 						self.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5649 					}
5650 				}) ;
5651 			}
5652 			
5653 			/*字符串验证*/
5654 			function verString(){
5655 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptString){
5656 					self.val('').removeClass('varPrompt') ;
5657 				}
5658 				self.keydown(function(e){
5659 					var inputLetter = e.which ;
5660 					if(isLetter(inputLetter)||isCommonKey(inputLetter)){
5661 					}else{
5662 						return false ;
5663 					}
5664 				}) ;
5665 				self.blur(function(){
5666 					if(self.val() == ''){
5667 						createBubble(self,'不能为空') ;
5668 						self.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5669 					}
5670 				}) ;
5671 			}
5672 			
5673 			/*数字验证*/
5674 			function verNumber(){		
5675 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptNumber){
5676 					self.val('') ;
5677 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
5678 					self.hide() ;
5679 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
5680 				}
5681 				var range = self.attr('data-range') ;
5682 				if(range){
5683 					var numRange = range.split(',') ;
5684 					var minRanage = numRange[0] ;
5685 					var maxRanage = numRange[1] ;
5686 					var maxLen = maxRanage.length ;
5687 					if(numRange[2]){
5688 						var numberType = numRange[2] ;
5689 					}else{
5690 						var numberType = 'integer' ;
5691 					}
5692 					switch(numberType){
5693 						case 'integer' : intNumber(minRanage,maxRanage,numberType,maxLen) ; break ;
5694 						case 'percentage' : 
5695 							var isPer = self.attr('data-isPer') ; 
5696 							if(!isPer){
5697 								self.after('%');
5698 								self.attr('data-isPer','false') ;
5699 							} ;  
5700 							intNumber(minRanage,maxRanage,numberType,maxLen) ; break ;
5701 						case 'float' : floNumber(minRanage,maxRanage,numberType,maxLen) ; break ;
5702 					}	
5703 				}else{ //没有大小值限制
5704 					self.show() ;
5705 					keydownNumber(self,'placeholderKey','placeholderKey','placeholderKey') ;
5706 					self.blur(function(){
5707 						if(self.val() == ''){
5708 							createBubble(self,'不能为空') ;
5709 							self.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5710 						}
5711 					}) ;
5712 				}
5713 			}
5714 			/*数字验证-输入整数或是百分数形式*/
5715 			function intNumber(minRanage,maxRanage,numberType,maxLen){
5716 				keydownNumber(self,maxLen,'placeholderKey','placeholderKey') ;
5717 				self.blur(function(){
5718 					var tarVal = parseInt(self.val()) ;
5719 					if(tarVal<parseInt(minRanage)){
5720 						var bubconmsg = '输入数字范围为'+minRanage+'-'+maxRanage+',输入内容小于'+minRanage+',默认为'+minRanage ;
5721 						createBubble(self,bubconmsg) ;
5722 						self.val(minRanage) ;
5723 					}else if(tarVal>parseInt(maxRanage)){
5724 						var bubconmsg = '输入数字范围为'+minRanage+'-'+maxRanage+',输入内容大于'+maxRanage+',默认为'+maxRanage ;
5725 						createBubble(self,bubconmsg) ;
5726 						self.val(maxRanage)  ;
5727 					}else if(self.val() == ''){
5728 						createBubble(self,'不能为空') ;
5729 						self.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5730 					}
5731 				}) ;
5732 			}
5733 			/*数字验证-输入小数数形式*/
5734 			function floNumber(minRanage,maxRanage,numberType,maxLen){	
5735 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
5736 				if(self.attr('data-val')!=o.verPromptNumber){
5737 					var tarVal = self.val().split('.') ;
5738 				}else{
5739 					defVal = '.' ;
5740 					var tarVal = defVal.split('.') ;
5741 				}
5742 				if(!isHasFl){
5743 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><input type="text" class="inputInter" value="'+tarVal[0]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputFloat" value="'+tarVal[1]+'" /></div>') ;
5744 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
5745 				} ;	
5746 				var selfFloInt = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputInter') ;	
5747 				var selfFloFlo = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputFloat') ;
5748 				self.hide() ;
5749 				selfFloInt.focus() ;			
5750 				keydownNumber(selfFloInt,maxLen,selfFloFlo,'placeholderKey') ;
5751 				keydownNumber(selfFloFlo,o.verFloatDigit,'placeholderKey',selfFloInt) ;
5752 				
5753 				selfFloInt.blur(function(){
5754 					var tarVal = parseInt(selfFloInt.val()) ;
5755 					if(tarVal<parseInt(minRanage)){
5756 						var bubconmsg = '输入数字范围为'+minRanage+'-'+maxRanage+',输入内容小于'+minRanage+',默认为'+minRanage ;
5757 						createBubble(selfFloFlo,bubconmsg) ;
5758 						selfFloInt.val(minRanage) ;
5759 						self.val(minRanage+'.00') ;
5760 					}else if(tarVal>=parseInt(maxRanage)){
5761 						var bubconmsg = '输入数字范围为'+minRanage+'-'+maxRanage+',输入内容大于'+maxRanage+',默认为'+maxRanage ;
5762 						createBubble(selfFloFlo,bubconmsg) ;
5763 						selfFloInt.val(maxRanage)  ;
5764 						selfFloFlo.val('00') ;
5765 					}
5766 					var classArr = new Array('inputInter','inputFloat') ;
5767 					var targetInputVal = selfFloInt.val() + '.' + selfFloFlo.val() ;
5768 					selfFloInt.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5769 					documentFocus(selfFloInt,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5770 				}) ;
5771 				selfFloFlo.blur(function(){
5772 					selfFloFlo.attr('data-focus',false)
5773 					var floVal =  selfFloFlo.val() ;
5774 					if(floVal.length == 1){
5775 						 selfFloFlo.val(floVal + '0')
5776 					}else if(floVal.length == 0){
5777 						 selfFloFlo.val(floVal + '00')
5778 					}
5779 					if(selfFloInt.val() == ''){
5780 						createBubble(selfFloFlo,'不能为空') ;
5781 						selfFloInt.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5782 					}					
5783 					var classArr = new Array('inputInter','inputFloat') ;
5784 					var targetInputVal = selfFloInt.val() + '.' + selfFloFlo.val() ;
5785 					selfFloFlo.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5786 					documentFocus(selfFloFlo,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5787 				}) ;
5788 			}
5789 			
5790 			/*座机验证*/
5791 			function verPhone(){
5792 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptPhone){
5793 					self.val('') ;
5794 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
5795 					self.hide() ;
5796 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
5797 				}
5798 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
5799 				var areaCodeLen = 3 ;
5800 				var phoneLen = 8 ;
5801 				var phoneExtLen = 3 ;
5802 				if(self.attr('data-val')!=o.verPromptPhone){
5803 					var tarVal = self.val().split(o.verSplit) ;
5804 				}else{
5805 					defVal = o.verSplit + o.verSplit + o.verSplit ;
5806 					var tarVal = defVal.split(o.verSplit) ;
5807 				}
5808 				if(!isHasFl){
5809 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><span class="decPoint">0</span><input type="text" class="inputAreaCode" value="'+tarVal[0]+'"/><span class="decPoint">'+o.verSplit+'</span><input type="text" class="inputPhoneNumber" value="'+tarVal[1]+'"/><span class="decPoint">'+o.verSplit+'</span><input type="text" class="inputPhoneExt" value="'+tarVal[2]+'"/></div>') ;
5810 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
5811 				} ;
5812 				var selfAreaCode = self.hide().nextAll('.EditDiv').children('input.inputAreaCode') ;
5813 				var selfPhone = self.hide().nextAll('.EditDiv').children('input.inputPhoneNumber') ;
5814 				var selfExt = self.hide().nextAll('.EditDiv').children('input.inputPhoneExt') ;
5815 				self.hide() ;
5816 				selfAreaCode.focus() ;
5817 				keydownNumber(selfAreaCode,areaCodeLen,selfPhone,'placeholderKey') ;
5818 				selfAreaCode.blur(function(){
5819 					var areaCodeVal = selfAreaCode.val() ;
5820 					if(areaCodeVal == ''){
5821 						createBubble(selfAreaCode,'不能为空') ;
5822 						selfAreaCode.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5823 					}else if(parseInt(areaCodeVal)<10){
5824 						createBubble(selfAreaCode,'输入数字范围为10-999输入内容小于10,默认为10') ;
5825 						selfAreaCode.val('10') ;
5826 					}
5827 					var classArr = new Array('inputAreaCode','inputPhoneNumber','inputPhoneExt') ;
5828 					var targetInputVal = '0' + selfAreaCode.val() + o.verSplit + selfPhone.val() + o.verSplit + selfExt.val() ;
5829 					selfAreaCode.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5830 					documentFocus(selfAreaCode,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5831 				}) ;
5832 				keydownNumber(selfPhone,phoneLen,selfExt,selfAreaCode) ;
5833 				selfPhone.blur(function(){
5834 					var pnoneVal = selfPhone.val() ;
5835 					if(pnoneVal == ''){
5836 						createBubble(selfAreaCode,'不能为空') ;
5837 						selfPhone.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5838 					} ;
5839 					var classArr = new Array('inputAreaCode','inputPhoneNumber','inputPhoneExt') ;
5840 					var targetInputVal = '0' + selfAreaCode.val() + o.verSplit + selfPhone.val() + o.verSplit + selfExt.val() ;
5841 					selfPhone.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5842 					documentFocus(selfPhone,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5843 				}) ;
5844 				keydownNumber(selfExt,'placeholderKey','placeholderKey',selfPhone) ;
5845 				selfExt.blur(function(){
5846 					var extVal = selfExt.val() ;
5847 					if(extVal.length <1){
5848 						var targetInputVal = '0' + selfAreaCode.val() + o.verSplit + selfPhone.val() ;
5849 					}else{
5850 						var targetInputVal = '0' + selfAreaCode.val() + o.verSplit + selfPhone.val() + o.verSplit + selfExt.val() ;
5851 					}	
5852 					var classArr = new Array('inputAreaCode','inputPhoneNumber','inputPhoneExt') ;
5853 					var targetInputVal = '0' + selfAreaCode.val() + o.verSplit + selfPhone.val() + o.verSplit + selfExt.val() ;
5854 					selfExt.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5855 					documentFocus(selfExt,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5856 				}) ;
5857 			}
5858 		
5859 			/*Email验证*/
5860 			function verEmail(){
5861 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptEmail){
5862 					self.val('') ;
5863 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
5864 					self.hide() ;
5865 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
5866 				}
5867 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
5868 				if(self.attr('data-val')!=o.verPromptEmail){
5869 					var tarVal0 = self.val().split('@')[0] ;
5870 					var tarVal1 = self.val().split('@')[1].split('.')[0] ;
5871 					var tarVal2 = self.val().split('@')[1].split('.')[1] ;
5872 				}else{
5873 					defVal = '@.' ;
5874 					var tarVal0 = defVal.split('@')[0] ;
5875 					var tarVal1 = defVal.split('@')[1].split('.')[0] ;
5876 					var tarVal2 = defVal.split('@')[1].split('.')[1] ;
5877 				}
5878 				if(!isHasFl){
5879 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><input type="text" class="inputEmailfront" value="'+tarVal0+'"/><span class="decPoint">@</span><input type="text" class="inputEmailback" value="'+tarVal1+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputEmaillast" value="'+tarVal2+'"/></div>') ;
5880 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
5881 				} ;
5882 				var selfEmailF = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputEmailfront') ;
5883 				var selfEmailB = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputEmailback') ;
5884 				var selfEmailL = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputEmaillast') ;
5885 				self.hide() ;
5886 				selfEmailF.focus() ;
5887 				selfEmailF.blur(function(){
5888 					var classArr = new Array('inputEmailfront','inputEmailback','inputEmaillast') ;
5889 					var targetInputVal = selfEmailF.val() + '@' + selfEmailB.val() + '.' + selfEmailL.val() ;
5890 					selfEmailF.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5891 					documentFocus(selfEmailF,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5892 				}) ;
5893 				selfEmailB.blur(function(){
5894 					var classArr = new Array('inputEmailfront','inputEmailback','inputEmaillast') ;
5895 					var targetInputVal = selfEmailF.val() + '@' + selfEmailB.val() + '.' + selfEmailL.val() ;
5896 					selfEmailB.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5897 					documentFocus(selfEmailB,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5898 				}) ;
5899 				selfEmailL.blur(function(){
5900 					var emailVal = selfEmailL.val() ;
5901 					if(emailVal == ''){
5902 						createBubble(selfEmailL,'不能为空') ;
5903 						selfEmailL.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5904 					}
5905 					var classArr = new Array('inputEmailfront','inputEmailback','inputEmaillast') ;
5906 					var targetInputVal = selfEmailF.val() + '@' + selfEmailB.val() + '.' + selfEmailL.val() ;
5907 					selfEmailL.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5908 					documentFocus(selfEmailL,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5909 				}) ;
5910 			}
5911 			
5912 			/*url验证*/
5913 			function verUrl(){
5914 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptUrl){
5915 					self.val('') ;
5916 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
5917 					self.hide() ;
5918 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
5919 				}
5920 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
5921 				if(!isHasFl){
5922 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><span class="decPoint">http://</span><input type="text" class="inputUrl"/></div>') ;
5923 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
5924 				} ;
5925 				var selfInputUrl = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputUrl') ;
5926 				self.hide() ;
5927 				selfInputUrl.focus() ;
5928 				selfInputUrl.blur(function(){
5929 					var urlVal = selfInputUrl.val() ;
5930 					if(urlVal == ''){
5931 						createBubble(selfInputUrl,'不能为空') ;
5932 						selfInputUrl.addClass('inputPrompt') ;
5933 					}
5934 					var classArr = new Array('inputUrl') ;
5935 					var targetInputVal = 'http://' + urlVal ;
5936 					selfInputUrl.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5937 					documentFocus(selfInputUrl,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5938 				}) ;
5939 			}
5940 		
5941 			/*ip地址验证*/
5942 			function verIP(){
5943 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptIP){
5944 					self.val('') ;
5945 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
5946 					self.hide() ;
5947 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
5948 				}
5949 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
5950 				var ipLen = 3 ;
5951 				if(self.attr('data-val')!=o.verPromptIP){
5952 					var tarVal = self.val().split('.') ;
5953 				}else{
5954 					defVal = '...' ;
5955 					var tarVal = defVal.split('.') ;
5956 				}
5957 				if(!isHasFl){
5958 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><input type="text" class="inputIP1" value="'+tarVal[0]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputIP2" value="'+tarVal[1]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputIP3" value="'+tarVal[2]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputIP4" value="'+tarVal[3]+'"/></div>') ;
5959 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
5960 				} ;
5961 				var selfIP1 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputIP1') ;
5962 				var selfIP2 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputIP2') ;
5963 				var selfIP3 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputIP3') ;
5964 				var selfIP4 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputIP4') ;
5965 				self.hide() ;
5966 				selfIP1.focus() ;
5967 				keydownNumber(selfIP1,ipLen,selfIP2,'placeholderKey') ;
5968 				selfIP1.blur(function(){
5969 					var ip1Val = selfIP1.val() ;
5970 					if(ip1Val == ''){
5971 						createBubble(selfIP1,'不能为空') ;
5972 						selfIP1.val('1') ;
5973 					}else if(parseInt(ip1Val)<1){
5974 						createBubble(selfIP1,'必须输入1-223之间的数,输入数值小于1,默认为1') ;
5975 						selfIP1.val('1') ;
5976 					}else if(parseInt(ip1Val)>223){
5977 						createBubble(selfIP1,'必须输入1-223之间的数,输入数值大于223,默认为223') ;
5978 						selfIP1.val('223') ;
5979 					}
5980 					var classArr = new Array('inputIP1','inputIP2','inputIP3','inputIP4') ;
5981 					var targetInputVal = selfIP1.val() + '.' + selfIP2.val() + '.' + selfIP3.val() + '.' + selfIP4.val() ;
5982 					selfIP1.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5983 					documentFocus(selfIP1,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5984 				}) ;
5985 				keydownNumber(selfIP2,ipLen,selfIP3,selfIP1) ;
5986 				selfIP2.blur(function(){
5987 					var ip2Val = selfIP2.val() ;
5988 					if(ip2Val == ''){
5989 						createBubble(selfIP1,'不能为空') ;
5990 						selfIP2.val('0') ;
5991 					}else if(parseInt(ip2Val)>255){
5992 						createBubble(selfIP1,'必须输入0-255之间的数,输入数值大于255,默认为255') ;
5993 						selfIP2.val('255') ;
5994 					}
5995 					var classArr = new Array('inputIP1','inputIP2','inputIP3','inputIP4') ;
5996 					var targetInputVal = selfIP1.val() + '.' + selfIP2.val() + '.' + selfIP3.val() + '.' + selfIP4.val() ;
5997 					selfIP2.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
5998 					documentFocus(selfIP2,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
5999 				}) ;
6000 				keydownNumber(selfIP3,ipLen,selfIP4,selfIP2) ;
6001 				selfIP3.blur(function(){
6002 					var ip3Val = selfIP3.val() ;
6003 					if(ip3Val == ''){
6004 						createBubble(selfIP1,'不能为空') ;
6005 						selfIP3.val('0') ;
6006 					}else if(parseInt(ip3Val)>255){
6007 						createBubble(selfIP1,'必须输入0-255之间的数,输入数值大于255,默认为255') ;
6008 						selfIP3.val('255') ;
6009 					}
6010 					var classArr = new Array('inputIP1','inputIP2','inputIP3','inputIP4') ;
6011 					var targetInputVal = selfIP1.val() + '.' + selfIP2.val() + '.' + selfIP3.val() + '.' + selfIP4.val() ;
6012 					selfIP3.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6013 					documentFocus(selfIP3,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6014 				}) ;
6015 				keydownNumber(selfIP4,ipLen,'placeholderKey',selfIP3) ;
6016 				selfIP4.blur(function(){
6017 					var ip4Val = selfIP4.val() ;
6018 					if(ip4Val == ''){
6019 						createBubble(selfIP1,'不能为空') ;
6020 						selfIP4.val('0') ;
6021 					}else if(parseInt(ip4Val)>255){
6022 						createBubble(selfIP1,'必须输入0-255之间的数,输入数值大于255,默认为255') ;
6023 						selfIP4.val('255') ;
6024 					}
6025 					var classArr = new Array('inputIP1','inputIP2','inputIP3','inputIP4') ;
6026 					var targetInputVal = selfIP1.val() + '.' + selfIP2.val() + '.' + selfIP3.val() + '.' + selfIP4.val() ;
6027 					selfIP4.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6028 					documentFocus(selfIP4,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6029 				}) ;
6030 			}
6031 		
6032 			/*时间验证*/
6033 			function verTime(){
6034 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptTime){
6035 					self.val('') ;
6036 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
6037 					self.hide() ;
6038 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
6039 				}
6040 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
6041 				var yearLen = 4 ;
6042 				var monthLen = 2 ;
6043 				var DayLen = 2 ;
6044 				if(self.attr('data-val')!=o.verPromptTime){
6045 					var tarVal = self.val().split(o.verSplit) ;
6046 				}else{
6047 					defVal = o.verSplit + o.verSplit + o.verSplit ;
6048 					var tarVal = defVal.split(o.verSplit) ;
6049 				}
6050 				if(!isHasFl){
6051 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><input type="text" class="inputYear" value="'+tarVal[0]+'"/><span class="decPoint">'+o.verSplit+'</span><input type="text" class="inputMonth" value="'+tarVal[1]+'"/><span class="decPoint">'+o.verSplit+'</span><input type="text" class="inputDay" value="'+tarVal[2]+'"/></div>') ;
6052 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
6053 				} ;
6054 				var selfTimeY = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputYear') ;
6055 				var selfTimeM = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputMonth') ;
6056 				var selfTimeD = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputDay') ;
6057 				self.hide() ;
6058 				selfTimeY.focus() ;
6059 				keydownNumber(selfTimeY,yearLen,selfTimeM,'placeholderKey') ;
6060 				selfTimeY.blur(function(){
6061 					var yearVal = selfTimeY.val() ;
6062 					if(yearVal == ''){
6063 						createBubble(selfTimeY,'不能为空') ;
6064 						selfTimeY.val('1000') ;
6065 					}else if(parseInt(yearVal)<1000){
6066 						createBubble(selfTimeY,'必须输入1000-9999之间的数,输入数值小于1000,默认为1000') ;
6067 						selfTimeY.val('1000') ;
6068 					}else if(parseInt(yearVal)>9999){
6069 						createBubble(selfTimeY,'必须输入1000-9999之间的数,输入数值大于9999,默认为9999') ;
6070 						selfTimeY.val('9999') ;
6071 					}
6072 					var classArr = new Array('inputYear','inputMonth','inputDay') ;
6073 					var targetInputVal = selfTimeY.val() + o.verSplit + selfTimeM.val() + o.verSplit + selfTimeD.val() ;
6074 					selfTimeY.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6075 					documentFocus(selfTimeY,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6076 				}) ;
6077 				keydownNumber(selfTimeM,monthLen,selfTimeD,selfTimeY) ;
6078 				selfTimeM.blur(function(){
6079 					var monthVal = selfTimeM.val() ;
6080 					var monthValLen = monthVal.length ;
6081 					if(monthVal == ''){
6082 						createBubble(selfTimeM,'不能为空') ;
6083 						selfTimeM.val('01') ;
6084 					}else if(parseInt(monthVal)<1){
6085 						createBubble(selfTimeM,'必须输入01-12之间的数,输入数值小于01,默认为01') ;
6086 						selfTimeM.val('01') ;
6087 					}else if(parseInt(monthVal)>12){
6088 						createBubble(selfTimeM,'必须输入01-12之间的数,输入数值大于12,默认为12') ;
6089 						selfTimeM.val('12') ;
6090 					}else if(monthValLen == 1){
6091 						selfTimeM.val('0'+monthVal) ;
6092 					}
6093 					var classArr = new Array('inputYear','inputMonth','inputDay') ;
6094 					var targetInputVal = selfTimeY.val() + o.verSplit + selfTimeM.val() + o.verSplit + selfTimeD.val() ;
6095 					selfTimeM.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6096 					documentFocus(selfTimeM,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6097 				}) ;
6098 				keydownNumber(selfTimeD,monthLen,'placeholderKey',selfTimeM) ;
6099 				selfTimeD.blur(function(){
6100 					var yearVal = selfTimeY.val() ;
6101 					var monthVal = selfTimeM.val() ;
6102 					var bigMonth = new Array(1,01,3,03,5,05,7,07,8,08,10,12) ;
6103 					var smallMonth = new Array(4,04,6,06,9,09,11) ;
6104 					var otherMonth = new Array(2,02) ;
6105 					var maxDay ;
6106 					var promptMsg ;
6107 					
6108 					if(isLeapYear(yearVal)&&isInArr(monthVal,otherMonth)){
6109 						maxDay = 29 ;
6110 					}else if(!isLeapYear(yearVal)&&isInArr(monthVal,otherMonth)){
6111 						maxDay = 28 ;
6112 					}else if(isInArr(monthVal,bigMonth)){
6113 						maxDay = 31 ;
6114 					}else if(isInArr(monthVal,smallMonth)){
6115 						maxDay = 30 ;
6116 					}
6117 					promptMsg = '必须输入01-'+maxDay+'之间的数' ;					
6118 					var dayVal = selfTimeD.val() ;
6119 					var dayValLen = dayVal.length ;
6120 					if(dayVal == ''){
6121 						createBubble(selfTimeM,'不能为空') ;
6122 						selfTimeD.val('01') ;
6123 					}else if(dayVal<1){
6124 						var bubconmsg = promptMsg + ',输入数值小于01,默认为01' ;
6125 						createBubble(selfTimeM,bubconmsg) ;
6126 						selfTimeD.val('01') ;
6127 					}else if(dayVal>maxDay){
6128 						var bubconmsg = promptMsg + ',输入数值大于'+maxDay+'12,默认为'+maxDay ;
6129 						createBubble(selfTimeM,bubconmsg) ;
6130 						selfTimeD.val(maxDay) ;
6131 					}else if(dayValLen == 1){
6132 						selfTimeD.val('0'+dayVal) ;
6133 					}
6134 					var classArr = new Array('inputYear','inputMonth','inputDay') ;
6135 					var targetInputVal = selfTimeY.val() + o.verSplit + selfTimeM.val() + o.verSplit + selfTimeD.val() ;
6136 					selfTimeD.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6137 					documentFocus(selfTimeD,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6138 				}) ;
6139 			}
6140 			/*考勤验证*/
6141 			function verAttendance(){
6142 				if(self.val() == o.verPromptAttendance){
6143 					self.val('') ;
6144 				}else if(self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').css('display') == 'none'){
6145 					self.hide() ;
6146 					self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').show() ;
6147 				}
6148 				var isHasFl = self.attr('data-isHasFl') ; 
6149 				var attLen = 3 ;
6150 				if(self.attr('data-val')!=o.verPromptAttendance){
6151 					var tarVal = self.val().split('.') ;
6152 				}else{
6153 					defVal = ' . . . ' ;
6154 					var tarVal = defVal.split('.') ;
6155 				}
6156 				if(!isHasFl){
6157 					self.after('<div class="EditDiv"><input type="text" class="inputAtt1" value="'+tarVal[0]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputAtt2" value="'+tarVal[1]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputAtt3" value="'+tarVal[2]+'"/><span class="decPoint">.</span><input type="text" class="inputAtt4" value="'+tarVal[3]+'"/></div>') ;
6158 					self.attr('data-isHasFl','false') ;
6159 				} ;
6160 				var selfAtt1 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputAtt1') ;
6161 				var selfAtt2 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputAtt2') ;
6162 				var selfAtt3 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputAtt3') ;
6163 				var selfAtt4 = self.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').children('input.inputAtt4') ;
6164 				self.hide() ;
6165 				selfAtt1.focus() ;
6166 				keydownNumber(selfAtt1,attLen,selfAtt2,'placeholderKey') ;
6167 				selfAtt1.blur(function(){
6168 					var att1Val = selfAtt1.val() ;
6169 					if(att1Val == ''){
6170 						createBubble(selfAtt1,'不能为空') ;
6171 						selfAtt1.val('1').attr('data-val','1') ;
6172 					}else if(parseInt(att1Val)<1){
6173 						createBubble(selfAtt1,'必须输入1-223之间的数,输入数值小于1,默认为1') ;
6174 						selfAtt1.val('1').attr('data-val','1') ;
6175 					}else if(parseInt(att1Val)>223){
6176 						createBubble(selfAtt1,'必须输入1-223之间的数,输入数值大于223,默认为223') ;
6177 						selfAtt1.val('223').attr('data-val','233') ;
6178 					}
6179 					var classArr = new Array('inputAtt1','inputAtt2','inputAtt3','inputAtt4') ;
6180 					var targetInputVal = selfAtt1.val() + '.' + selfAtt2.val() + '.' + selfAtt3.val() + '.' + selfAtt4.val() ;
6181 					selfAtt1.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6182 					documentFocus(selfAtt1,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6183 				}) ;
6184 				keydownNumber(selfAtt2,attLen,selfAtt3,selfAtt1) ;
6185 				selfAtt2.blur(function(){
6186 					var att2Val = selfAtt2.val() ;
6187 					if(att2Val == ''){
6188 					}else if(parseInt(att2Val)>255){
6189 						createBubble(selfAtt1,'必须输入0-255之间的数,输入数值大于255,默认为255') ;
6190 						selfAtt2.val('255') ;
6191 					}
6192 					var classArr = new Array('inputAtt1','inputAtt2','inputAtt3','inputAtt4') ;
6193 					var targetInputVal = selfAtt1.val() + '.' + selfAtt2.val() + '.' + selfAtt3.val() + '.' + selfAtt4.val() ;
6194 					selfAtt2.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6195 					documentFocus(selfAtt2,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6196 				}) ;
6197 				keydownNumber(selfAtt3,attLen,selfAtt4,selfAtt2) ;
6198 				selfAtt3.blur(function(){
6199 					var att3Val = selfAtt3.val() ;
6200 					if(att3Val == ''){
6201 					}else if(parseInt(att3Val)>255){
6202 						createBubble(selfAtt1,'必须输入0-255之间的数,输入数值大于255,默认为255') ;
6203 						selfAtt3.val('255') ;
6204 					}
6205 					var classArr = new Array('inputAtt1','inputAtt2','inputAtt3','inputAtt4') ;
6206 					var targetInputVal = selfAtt1.val() + '.' + selfAtt2.val() + '.' + selfAtt3.val() + '.' + selfAtt4.val() ;
6207 					selfAtt3.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6208 					documentFocus(selfAtt3,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6209 				}) ;
6210 				keydownNumber(selfAtt4,attLen,'placeholderKey',selfAtt3) ;
6211 				selfAtt3.focus(function(){
6212 					var att2Val = selfAtt2.val() ;
6213 					if(att2Val == ''){
6214 						selfAtt2.val('0') ;
6215 					}
6216 				}) ;
6217 				selfAtt4.focus(function(){
6218 					var att2Val = selfAtt2.val() ;
6219 					if(att2Val == ''){
6220 						selfAtt2.val('0') ;
6221 					}
6222 					var att3Val = selfAtt3.val() ;
6223 					if(att3Val == ''){
6224 						selfAtt3.val('0') ;
6225 					}
6226 				}) ;
6227 				selfAtt4.blur(function(){
6228 					var att4Val = selfAtt4.val() ;
6229 					if(att4Val == ''){
6230 					}else if(parseInt(att4Val)>255){
6231 						createBubble(selfAtt1,'必须输入0-255之间的数,输入数值大于255,默认为255') ;
6232 						selfAtt4.val('255') ;
6233 					}
6234 					var classArr = new Array('inputAtt1','inputAtt2','inputAtt3','inputAtt4') ;
6235 					var targetInputVal = selfAtt1.val() + '.' + selfAtt2.val() + '.' + selfAtt3.val() + '.' + selfAtt4.val() ;
6236 					selfAtt4.parents('.EditDiv').prev('input.verInput').val(targetInputVal) ;
6237 					documentFocus(selfAtt4,classArr,targetInputVal) ;
6238 				}) ;
6239 			}
6240 		},
6241 		verify : function(verifAttr){
6242 			var attrVerif = this.el ;
6243 			if(attrVerif == verifAttr){
6244 			}else{
6245 				this.element.attr('data-verif',verifAttr) ;
6246 			}
6247 			this.element.verification() ;
6248 		},	
6249 		/**
6250 		* @description 修改验证规则为手机号码验证
6251 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6252 		* @example
6253 		* $("#changeVer").verification('vermobile');
6254 		*/		
6255 		vermobile : function(){
6256 		   this.verify("verMobile");
6257 		},
6258 		/**
6259 		* @description 修改验证规则为字符串验证
6260 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6261 		* @example
6262 		* $("#changeVer").verification('verstring');
6263 		*/
6264 		verstring : function(){
6265 		   this.verify("verString");
6266 		},
6267 		/**
6268 		* @description 修改验证规则为数字验证
6269 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6270 		* @example
6271 		* $("#changeVer").verification('vernumber');
6272 		*/
6273 		vernumber : function(){
6274 		   this.verify("verNumber");
6275 		},
6276 		/**
6277 		* @description 修改验证规则为座机验证
6278 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6279 		* @example
6280 		* $("#changeVer").verification('verphone');
6281 		*/
6282 		verphone : function(){
6283 		   this.verify("verPhone");
6284 		},
6285 		/**
6286 		* @description 修改验证规则为Email验证
6287 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6288 		* @example
6289 		* $("#changeVer").verification('veremail');
6290 		*/
6291 		veremail : function(){
6292 		   this.verify("verEmail");
6293 		},
6294 		/**
6295 		* @description 修改验证规则为url验证
6296 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6297 		* @example
6298 		* $("#changeVer").verification('verurl');
6299 		*/
6300 		verurl : function(){
6301 		   this.verify("verUrl");
6302 		},
6303 		/**
6304 		* @description 修改验证规则为IP地址验证
6305 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6306 		* @example
6307 		* $("#changeVer").verification('verip');
6308 		*/
6309 		verip : function(){
6310 		   this.verify("verIP");
6311 		},
6312 		/**
6313 		* @description 修改验证规则为时间验证
6314 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6315 		* @example
6316 		* $("#changeVer").verification('vertime');
6317 		*/
6318 		vertime : function(){
6319 		   this.verify("verTime");
6320 		},
6321 		/**
6322 		* @description 修改验证规则为考勤验证
6323 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6324 		* @example
6325 		* $("#changeVer").verification('verattendance');
6326 		*/
6327 		verattendance : function(){
6328 		   this.verify("verAttendance");
6329 		},
6330 		/**
6331 		* @description 销毁验证
6332 		* @return {verification} verification对象
6333 		* @example
6334 		* $("#changeVer").verification('destroy');
6335 		*/
6336 		destroy : function(){
6337 			this.element.removeAttr('data-verif') ;
6338 			if(this.element.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').length>0){
6339 				this.element.parent('.parDiv').find('.EditDiv').remove() ;
6340 			}
6341 			if(this.element.parent('.parDiv').length>0){
6342 				this.element.unwrap('.parDiv') ;
6343 			}
6344 		}
6345 	});
6346 
6347 	$.extend($.fn.verification, {
6348 		version: "1.2"
6349 	});
6350 
6351 })(jQuery);
6352 
6353 $(function(){
6354 	$('.verInput').verification({
6355 		//verSplit : '-'
6356 	});
6357 });/*
6358  *作    者: 高娜
6359  *版    本: 1.2
6360  *完成时间: 2012-05-14
6361  *描    述: geolocation
6362  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
6363  */
6364 (function($,undefined){
6365     /**
6366 	* @class 获取地理位置
6367     * @name geolocation
6368     * @description 获取地理位置
6369 	* @version 1.2
6370     */
6371 	$.widget('ui.geolocation',
6372 	/** @lends geolocation.prototype */
6373 	{		
6374 		options:{
6375 			/**  
6376 			* @name geolocation#nosupportMsg
6377 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
6378 			* @description 不支持地理定位的输出信息
6379 			* @default {String} '您当前的浏览器不支持Geolocation,请升级浏览器'
6380 			* @example
6381 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6382 			*		nosupportMsg : '您当前的浏览器不支持Geolocation,请升级浏览器'
6383 			*  });
6384 			*/
6385 			nosupportMsg : '您当前的浏览器不支持Geolocation,请升级浏览器' ,
6386 			/**  
6387 			* @name geolocation#isshowLat
6388 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6389 			* @description 是否显示纬度
6390 			* @default {Boolean} true
6391 			* @example
6392 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6393 			*		isshowLat : true
6394 			*  });
6395 			*/
6396 			isshowLat : true ,
6397 			/**  
6398 			* @name geolocation#isshowLon
6399 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6400 			* @description 是否显示经度
6401 			* @default {Boolean} true
6402 			* @example
6403 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6404 			*		isshowLon : true
6405 			*  });
6406 			*/
6407 			isshowLon : true ,
6408 			/**  
6409 			* @name geolocation#isshowAcc
6410 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6411 			* @description 是否显示准确度
6412 			* @default {Boolean} true
6413 			* @example
6414 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6415 			*		isshowAcc : true
6416 			*  });
6417 			*/
6418 			isshowAcc : true ,
6419 			/**  
6420 			* @name geolocation#isshowAlt
6421 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6422 			* @description 是否显示海拔高度
6423 			* @default {Boolean} true
6424 			* @example
6425 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6426 			*		isshowAlt : true
6427 			*  });
6428 			*/
6429 			isshowAlt : true ,
6430 			/**  
6431 			* @name geolocation#isshowAla
6432 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6433 			* @description 是否显示海拔高度的精确度
6434 			* @default {Boolean} true
6435 			* @example
6436 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6437 			*		isshowAla : true
6438 			*  });
6439 			*/
6440 			isshowAla : true ,
6441 			/**  
6442 			* @name geolocation#isshowHea
6443 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6444 			* @description 是否显示行进方向
6445 			* @default {Boolean} true
6446 			* @example
6447 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6448 			*		isshowHea : true
6449 			*  });
6450 			*/
6451 			isshowHea : true ,
6452 			/**  
6453 			* @name geolocation#isshowSpe
6454 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
6455 			* @description 是否显示地面速度
6456 			* @default {Boolean} true
6457 			* @example
6458 			* $('.showGeo').geolocation({
6459 			*		isshowSpe : true
6460 			*  });
6461 			*/
6462 			isshowSpe : true
6463 		},
6464 		_create:function(){
6465 			var $this = this.element ;
6466 			var domCreLen = $('.posMsg').length ;
6467 			if(domCreLen <= 0){
6468 				var posMsg = '<div class="posMsg"></div>' ;
6469 				$this.append(posMsg) ;
6470 			}			
6471 		},
6472 		_init:function(){
6473 			var o = this.options ;
6474 			var self = this.element.find('.posMsg') ;
6475 			//判断值是否存在
6476 			function isVal(strVal){
6477 				if((strVal != null)&&(strVal != undefined)){
6478 					return true ;
6479 				}
6480 			}
6481 			function getElem(id){
6482 				return typeof id === 'string' ? document.getElementById(id) : id ;
6483 			}
6484 			
6485 			function show_it(lat,lon,acc,alt,ala,hea,spe){
6486 				lat = (o.isshowLat && isVal(lat)) ? lat : '' ;
6487 				lon = (o.isshowLon && isVal(lon)) ? lon : '' ;
6488 				acc = (o.isshowAcc && isVal(acc)) ? acc : '' ;
6489 				alt = (o.isshowAlt && isVal(alt)) ? alt : '' ;
6490 				ala = (o.isshowAla && isVal(ala)) ? ala : '' ;
6491 				hea = (o.isshowHea && isVal(hea)) ? hea : '' ;				
6492 				spe = (o.isshowSpe && isVal(spe)) ? spe : '' ;
6493 				var str = '您当前的位置：' + lat + lon + acc + alt + ala + hea + spe ;
6494 				var addMsg ;
6495 				self.html(str) ;
6496 				self.attr({
6497 					'data-lat' : lat ,
6498 					'data-lon' : lon ,
6499 					'data-acc' : acc ,
6500 					'data-alt' : alt ,
6501 					'data-ala' : ala ,
6502 					'data-hea' : hea ,
6503 					'data-spe' : spe 
6504 				}).hide() ;
6505 				try{
6506 				   //地图上标示
6507 					/*var map = new BMap.Map("container"); 
6508 					map.centerAndZoom(new BMap.Point(lon,lat),11); */
6509 					// 创建地理编码实例 
6510 					var myGeo = new BMap.Geocoder(); 
6511 					// 根据坐标得到地址描述 
6512 					myGeo.getLocation(new BMap.Point(lon,lat),function(result){  
6513 						if(result){      
6514 							addMsg = result.address;						
6515 						}   
6516 						self.attr('data-addmsg',addMsg) ;
6517 					}); 
6518 				}catch(e){
6519 				}
6520 			}
6521 			
6522 			if(navigator.geolocation){
6523 				navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function(position){  
6524 					show_it(position.coords.latitude, position.coords.longitude, position.coords.accuracy, position.coords.altitude, position.coords.altitudeAcuracy, position.coords.heading, position.coords.speed);  
6525 				},function(err) {
6526 					var errMsg = err.code + ' ' + err.message;
6527 					self.html(errMsg) ;
6528 				});
6529 			}else{
6530 				self.html(o.options) ;
6531 			}
6532 		},
6533 		/**
6534 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-详细地址
6535 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6536 		* @example
6537 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getAddress');
6538 		*/
6539 		getAddress : function(){
6540 			getAddress = $('.posMsg').attr('data-addmsg') ? $('.posMsg').attr('data-addmsg') : '无法获取地址' ;
6541 			return getAddress ;
6542 		},
6543 		/**
6544 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-纬度
6545 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6546 		* @example
6547 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getX');
6548 		*/
6549 		getX : function(){
6550 			getX = $('.posMsg').attr('data-lat') ;
6551 			return getX ;
6552 		},
6553 		/**
6554 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-经度
6555 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6556 		* @example
6557 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getY');
6558 		*/
6559 		getY : function(){
6560 			getY = $('.posMsg').attr('data-lon') ;
6561 			return getY ;
6562 		},
6563 		/**
6564 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-准确度
6565 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6566 		* @example
6567 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getA');
6568 		*/
6569 		getA : function(){
6570 			getA = $('.posMsg').attr('data-acc') ;
6571 			return getA ;
6572 		},
6573 		/**
6574 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-海拔高度
6575 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6576 		* @example
6577 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getAcc');
6578 		*/
6579 		getAcc : function(){
6580 			getAcc = $('.posMsg').attr('data-alt') ;
6581 			return getAcc ;
6582 		},
6583 		/**
6584 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-海拔高度的精确度
6585 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6586 		* @example
6587 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getAla');
6588 		*/
6589 		getAla : function(){
6590 			getAla = $('.posMsg').attr('data-ala') ;
6591 			return getAla ;
6592 		},
6593 		/**
6594 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-行进方向
6595 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6596 		* @example
6597 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getH');
6598 		*/
6599 		getH : function(){
6600 			getH = $('.posMsg').attr('data-hea') ;
6601 			return getH ;
6602 		},
6603 		/**
6604 		* @description 获得地理位置信息-地面速度
6605 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6606 		* @example
6607 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('getS');
6608 		*/
6609 		getS : function(){
6610 			getS = $('.posMsg').attr('data-spe') ;
6611 			return getS ;
6612 		},
6613 		/**
6614 		* @description 清除地理位置信息
6615 		* @return {geolocation} geolocation对象
6616 		* @example
6617 		* $("#destoryBtn").geolocation('destroy');
6618 		*/
6619 		destroy : function(){
6620 			this.element.find('.posMsg').remove() ;
6621 		}
6622 	});
6623 
6624 	$.extend($.fn.geolocation, {
6625 		version: "1.2"
6626 	});
6627 
6628 })(jQuery);/*
6629  *作    者: 高娜
6630  *版    本: 1.2
6631  *完成时间: 2012-06-11
6632  *描    述: ajaxload
6633  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
6634  */
6635 (function($,undefined){
6636     /**
6637 	* @class 加载等待提示功能
6638     * @name ajaxload
6639     * @description 加载等待提示插件
6640 	* @version 1.2
6641     */
6642 	$.widget('ui.ajaxload',
6643 	/** @lends ajaxload.prototype */
6644 	{		
6645 		options:{
6646 			/**  
6647 			* @name ajaxload#content
6648 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
6649 			* @description 提示信息文字描述
6650 			* @default {String} ''
6651 			* @example
6652 			* $('.exampleObj').ajaxload({
6653 			*		content : '加载中,请稍后......'
6654 			*  });
6655 			*/
6656 			content : '加载中,请稍后......' ,
6657 			/**  
6658 			* @name ajaxload#gifSize
6659 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
6660 			* @description 加载图片类型，可选参数有大中小三种bigSize(48*48),midSize(24*24),smallSize(16*16)
6661 			* @default {String} ''
6662 			* @example
6663 			* $('.exampleObj').ajaxload({
6664 			*		gifSize : 'midSize'
6665 			*  });
6666 			*/
6667 			gifSize : 'midSize' 
6668 		},
6669 		_create:function(){
6670 			var o = this.options ;
6671 			var self = this.element ;
6672 			var ajaxMask = '<div class="ajaxMask"><div class="ajaxContent"><p class="ajaxPic '+o.gifSize+'"></p><p class="ajaxMsg">'+o.content+'</p></div></div>' ;
6673 			var ajaxMain = '<div class="ajaxMain"></div>' ;
6674 			var ajaxCon = '<div class="ajaxCon"></div>' ;
6675 			var maskWid = self.width() ;
6676 			var maskHei = self.height() ;
6677 			var maskL = self.offset().left ;
6678 			var maskT = self.offset().top ;
6679 			if(self.attr('data-dom')!='true'){
6680 				self.wrap(ajaxMain).after(ajaxMask).wrap(ajaxCon) ;
6681 				self.attr('data-dom',true) ;
6682 			}
6683 			var selfPar = self.parents('.ajaxMain') ;
6684 			var ajaxContentL = (maskWid - (selfPar.find('.ajaxMsg').width() + selfPar.find('.ajaxPic').width()))/2 ;
6685 			var ajaxContentT = (maskHei - selfPar.find('.ajaxPic').height())/2 ;
6686 			//设置提示信息行高
6687 			selfPar.find('.ajaxMsg').css('line-height',selfPar.find('.ajaxPic').height() + 'px') ;
6688 			//设置遮罩层宽高定位
6689 			selfPar.find('.ajaxMask').css({
6690 				height : maskHei,
6691 				width : maskWid ,
6692 				top : maskT ,
6693 				left : maskL
6694 			}) ;
6695 			//设置加载gif图和提示信息定位
6696 			selfPar.find('.ajaxContent').css({
6697 				top : ajaxContentT ,
6698 				left : ajaxContentL
6699 			}) ;
6700 		},
6701 		_init:function(){
6702 		},
6703 		/**
6704 		* @description 显示加载提示
6705 		* @return {ajaxload} ajaxload对象
6706 		* @example
6707 		* $("#testExpObj").ajaxload('show');
6708 		*/
6709 		show : function(){
6710 			this.element.parents('.ajaxMain').find('.ajaxMask').css('display','block') ;
6711 			return this.element ;
6712 		},
6713 		/**
6714 		* @description 影藏加载提示
6715 		* @return {ajaxload} ajaxload对象
6716 		* @example
6717 		* $("#testExpObj").ajaxload('hide');
6718 		*/
6719 		hide : function(){
6720 			this.element.parents('.ajaxMain').find('.ajaxMask').css('display','none') ;			
6721 			return this.element ;
6722 		},
6723 		/**
6724 		* @description 销毁加载提示
6725 		* @return {ajaxload} ajaxload对象
6726 		* @example
6727 		* $("#testExpObj").ajaxload('destroy');
6728 		*/
6729 		destroy : function(){
6730 			if(this.element.attr('data-dom') == 'true'){
6731 				this.element.parents('.ajaxMain').find('.ajaxMask').remove() ;
6732 				this.element.unwrap().unwrap() ;
6733 			}
6734 			this.element.attr('data-dom','false') ;
6735 			return this.element ;
6736 		}
6737 	});
6738 
6739 	$.extend($.fn.ajaxload, {
6740 		version: "1.2"
6741 	});
6742 
6743 })(jQuery);/*
6744  *作    者: 高娜
6745  *版    本: 1.2
6746  *完成时间: 2012-06-19
6747  *描    述: autosave
6748  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
6749  */
6750 (function($,undefined){
6751     /**
6752 	* @class 表单自动保存
6753     * @name autosave
6754     * @description 表单自动保存插件
6755 	* @version 1.2
6756     */
6757 	$.widget('ui.autosave',
6758 	/** @lends autosave.prototype */
6759 	{		
6760 		options:{
6761 			/**  
6762 			* @name autosave#saveTime
6763 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
6764 			* @description 自动保存的时间间隔
6765 			* @default {Number} ''
6766 			* @example
6767 			* $('.exampleObj').autosave({
6768 			*		saveTime : 5000
6769 			*  });
6770 			*/
6771 			saveTime : 5000 
6772 		},
6773 		_create:function(){
6774 		},
6775 		_init:function(){
6776 			var inputAry = this.element.find('input').filter(':text,:password,:hidden') ; 
6777 			var textareaAry = this.element.find('textarea') ;
6778 			var selectAry = this.element.find('select') ;
6779 			var radioAry = this.element.find('input').filter(':radio,:checkbox') ;
6780 			
6781 			var opt = this.options ;
6782 			var isCookie = this.element.attr('data-isCookie') ;
6783 			if(isCookie != 'false'){
6784 				getCookie() ;
6785 			}
6786 			setInterval(setCookie,opt.saveTime) ;
6787 			//存值处理,isRadioOrCheck判断是否是radio或是checkbox
6788 			function sum(arr,isRadioOrCheck){
6789 				var result = '' ;
6790 				if(isRadioOrCheck){
6791 					for(var i=0; i<arr.length; i++){
6792 						result += arr.eq(i).attr('checked') + ',' ;
6793 					}
6794 				}else{
6795 					for(var i=0; i<arr.length; i++){
6796 						result += arr.eq(i).val() + ',' ;
6797 					}
6798 				}
6799 				return result;
6800 			}
6801 			//取值处理,isRadioOrCheck判断是否是radio或是checkbox
6802 			function getSum(arr,tarObj,isRadioOrCheck){
6803 				if(isRadioOrCheck){
6804 					for(var i=0; i<arr.length-1; i++){
6805 						if(arr[i] == 'true'){
6806 							tarObj.eq(i).attr('checked',arr[i]) ;
6807 						}
6808 					}
6809 				}else{
6810 					for(var i=0; i<arr.length-1; i++){
6811 						tarObj.eq(i).val(arr[i]) ;
6812 					}
6813 				}
6814 			}
6815 
6816 			function setCookie(){
6817 				var c_input_value = c_textarea_value = c_select_value = c_radio_value = '' ;
6818 				
6819 				if(inputAry.length>0){
6820 					c_input_value = sum(inputAry,false) ;
6821 				}
6822 				if(textareaAry.length>0){
6823 					c_textarea_value = sum(textareaAry,false) ;
6824 				}
6825 				if(selectAry.length>0){
6826 					c_select_value = sum(selectAry,false) ;
6827 				}
6828 				if(radioAry.length>0){
6829 					c_radio_value = sum(radioAry,true) ;
6830 				}
6831 				var cookie_val = c_input_value + '-' + c_textarea_value + '-' + c_select_value + '-' + c_radio_value ;
6832 				document.cookie = cookie_val ;
6833 			}
6834 			function getCookie(){
6835 				if(document.cookie.length>0){
6836 					var cookieAry = document.cookie.split('-') ;
6837 					var cookieLen = cookieAry.length ;
6838 					var c_inputAry = cookieAry[0].split(',') ;
6839 					var c_textareaAry = cookieAry[1].split(',') ;
6840 					var c_selectAry = cookieAry[2].split(',') ;
6841 					var c_radioAry = cookieAry[3].split(',') ;
6842 					
6843 					if(c_inputAry.length>1){
6844 						getSum(c_inputAry,inputAry,false)
6845 					}
6846 					if(c_textareaAry.length>1){
6847 						getSum(c_textareaAry,textareaAry,false)
6848 					}	
6849 					if(c_selectAry.length>1){
6850 						getSum(c_selectAry,selectAry,false)
6851 					}	
6852 					if(c_radioAry.length>1){
6853 						getSum(c_radioAry,radioAry,true)
6854 					}				
6855 				}
6856 			}
6857 		},
6858 		/**
6859 		* @description 清除表单自动保存缓存
6860 		* @return {autosave} autosave对象
6861 		* @example
6862 		* $("#testExpObj").autosave('destroy');
6863 		*/
6864 		destroy : function(){
6865 			
6866 		}
6867 	});
6868 
6869 	$.extend($.fn.autosave, {
6870 		version: "1.2"
6871 	});
6872 
6873 })(jQuery);/*
6874  *作    者: 高娜
6875  *版    本: 1.3
6876  *完成时间: 2012-07-02
6877  *描    述: colorpicker
6878  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
6879  */
6880 (function($,undefined){
6881     /**
6882 	* @class 颜色选择器
6883     * @name colorpicker
6884     * @description 颜色选择器插件
6885 	* @version 1.3
6886     */
6887 	$.widget('ui.colorpicker',
6888 	/** @lends colorpicker.prototype */
6889 	{		
6890 		options:{},
6891 		_create:function(){
6892 			var _self = this.element ;
6893 			var pickerDiv = '<div id="picker"></div>' ;
6894 			var selfTop = _self.offset().top + _self.height() + 2 ;
6895         	var selfLeft = _self.offset().left ;
6896 			if($('#picker').length<1){
6897 				_self.parent().append(pickerDiv) ;
6898 			}			
6899 			$('#picker').css({
6900 				'position' : "absolute" ,
6901 				'left' : selfLeft ,
6902 				'top' : selfTop ,
6903 				'z-index' : 100
6904 			}) ;
6905 		},
6906 		_init:function(){
6907 			this.element.click(function(){
6908 				$('#picker').farbtastic('#color');
6909 				if($('#picker').css('display') == 'none'){
6910 					$('#picker').css('display','block') ;
6911 				}		
6912 			}) ;
6913 			$(document).click(function(event){
6914 				var target = event.target ;
6915 				var inputLen = $(target).nextAll('#picker').length ;
6916 				var parLen = $(target).parents('#picker').length ;
6917 				if((parLen < 1) && (inputLen < 1)){
6918 					$('#picker').css('display','none') ;
6919 				}
6920 			}) ;
6921 			
6922 			//取色器代码
6923 			/**
6924 			 * Farbtastic Color Picker 1.2
