6925 			 * © 2008 Steven Wittens
6926 			 *
6927 			 * This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
6928 			 * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
6929 			 * the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or
6930 			 * (at your option) any later version.
6931 			 *
6932 			 * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
6933 			 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
6934 			 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
6935 			 * GNU General Public License for more details.
6936 			 *
6937 			 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
6938 			 * along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software
6939 			 * Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA  02110-1301  USA
6940 			 */
6941 			
6942 			jQuery.fn.farbtastic = function (callback) {
6943 			  $.farbtastic(this, callback);
6944 			  return this;
6945 			};
6946 			
6947 			jQuery.farbtastic = function (container, callback) {
6948 			  var container = $(container).get(0);
6949 			  return container.farbtastic || (container.farbtastic = new jQuery._farbtastic(container, callback));
6950 			}
6951 			
6952 			jQuery._farbtastic = function (container, callback) {
6953 			  // Store farbtastic object
6954 			  var fb = this;
6955 			
6956 			  // Insert markup
6957 			  $(container).html('<div class="farbtastic"><div class="color"></div><div class="wheel"></div><div class="overlay"></div><div class="h-marker marker"></div><div class="sl-marker marker"></div></div>');
6958 			  var e = $('.farbtastic', container);
6959 			  fb.wheel = $('.wheel', container).get(0);
6960 			  // Dimensions
6961 			  fb.radius = 84;
6962 			  fb.square = 100;
6963 			  fb.width = 194;
6964 			
6965 			  // Fix background PNGs in IE6
6966 			  if (navigator.appVersion.match(/MSIE [0-6]\./)) {
6967 				$('*', e).each(function () {
6968 				  if (this.currentStyle.backgroundImage != 'none') {
6969 					var image = this.currentStyle.backgroundImage;
6970 					image = this.currentStyle.backgroundImage.substring(5, image.length - 2);
6971 					$(this).css({
6972 					  'backgroundImage': 'none',
6973 					  'filter': "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.AlphaImageLoader(enabled=true, sizingMethod=crop, src='" + image + "')"
6974 					});
6975 				  }
6976 				});
6977 			  }
6978 			
6979 			  /**
6980 			   * Link to the given element(s) or callback.
6981 			   */
6982 			  fb.linkTo = function (callback) {
6983 				// Unbind previous nodes
6984 				if (typeof fb.callback == 'object') {
6985 				  $(fb.callback).unbind('keyup', fb.updateValue);
6986 				}
6987 			
6988 				// Reset color
6989 				fb.color = null;
6990 			
6991 				// Bind callback or elements
6992 				if (typeof callback == 'function') {
6993 				  fb.callback = callback;
6994 				}
6995 				else if (typeof callback == 'object' || typeof callback == 'string') {
6996 				  fb.callback = $(callback);
6997 				  fb.callback.bind('keyup', fb.updateValue);
6998 				  if (fb.callback.get(0).value) {
6999 					fb.setColor(fb.callback.get(0).value);
7000 				  }
7001 				}
7002 				return this;
7003 			  }
7004 			  fb.updateValue = function (event) {
7005 				if (this.value && this.value != fb.color) {
7006 				  fb.setColor(this.value);
7007 				}
7008 			  }
7009 			
7010 			  /**
7011 			   * Change color with HTML syntax #123456
7012 			   */
7013 			  fb.setColor = function (color) {
7014 				var unpack = fb.unpack(color);
7015 				if (fb.color != color && unpack) {
7016 				  fb.color = color;
7017 				  fb.rgb = unpack;
7018 				  fb.hsl = fb.RGBToHSL(fb.rgb);
7019 				  fb.updateDisplay();
7020 				}
7021 				return this;
7022 			  }
7023 			
7024 			  /**
7025 			   * Change color with HSL triplet [0..1, 0..1, 0..1]
7026 			   */
7027 			  fb.setHSL = function (hsl) {
7028 				fb.hsl = hsl;
7029 				fb.rgb = fb.HSLToRGB(hsl);
7030 				fb.color = fb.pack(fb.rgb);
7031 				fb.updateDisplay();
7032 				return this;
7033 			  }
7034 			
7035 			  /////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7036 			
7037 			  /**
7038 			   * Retrieve the coordinates of the given event relative to the center
7039 			   * of the widget.
7040 			   */
7041 			  fb.widgetCoords = function (event) {
7042 				var x, y;
7043 				var el = event.target || event.srcElement;
7044 				var reference = fb.wheel;
7045 			
7046 				if (typeof event.offsetX != 'undefined') {
7047 				  // Use offset coordinates and find common offsetParent
7048 				  var pos = { x: event.offsetX, y: event.offsetY };
7049 			
7050 				  // Send the coordinates upwards through the offsetParent chain.
7051 				  var e = el;
7052 				  while (e) {
7053 					e.mouseX = pos.x;
7054 					e.mouseY = pos.y;
7055 					pos.x += e.offsetLeft;
7056 					pos.y += e.offsetTop;
7057 					e = e.offsetParent;
7058 				  }
7059 			
7060 				  // Look for the coordinates starting from the wheel widget.
7061 				  var e = reference;
7062 				  var offset = { x: 0, y: 0 }
7063 				  while (e) {
7064 					if (typeof e.mouseX != 'undefined') {
7065 					  x = e.mouseX - offset.x;
7066 					  y = e.mouseY - offset.y;
7067 					  break;
7068 					}
7069 					offset.x += e.offsetLeft;
7070 					offset.y += e.offsetTop;
7071 					e = e.offsetParent;
7072 				  }
7073 			
7074 				  // Reset stored coordinates
7075 				  e = el;
7076 				  while (e) {
7077 					e.mouseX = undefined;
7078 					e.mouseY = undefined;
7079 					e = e.offsetParent;
7080 				  }
7081 				}
7082 				else {
7083 				  // Use absolute coordinates
7084 				  var pos = fb.absolutePosition(reference);
7085 				  x = (event.pageX || 0*(event.clientX + $('html').get(0).scrollLeft)) - pos.x;
7086 				  y = (event.pageY || 0*(event.clientY + $('html').get(0).scrollTop)) - pos.y;
7087 				}
7088 				// Subtract distance to middle
7089 				return { x: x - fb.width / 2, y: y - fb.width / 2 };
7090 			  }
7091 			
7092 			  /**
7093 			   * Mousedown handler
7094 			   */
7095 			  fb.mousedown = function (event) {
7096 				// Capture mouse
7097 				if (!document.dragging) {
7098 				  $(document).bind('mousemove', fb.mousemove).bind('mouseup', fb.mouseup);
7099 				  document.dragging = true;
7100 				}
7101 			
7102 				// Check which area is being dragged
7103 				var pos = fb.widgetCoords(event);
7104 				fb.circleDrag = Math.max(Math.abs(pos.x), Math.abs(pos.y)) * 2 > fb.square;
7105 			
7106 				// Process
7107 				fb.mousemove(event);
7108 				return false;
7109 			  }
7110 			
7111 			  /**
7112 			   * Mousemove handler
7113 			   */
7114 			  fb.mousemove = function (event) {
7115 				// Get coordinates relative to color picker center
7116 				var pos = fb.widgetCoords(event);
7117 			
7118 				// Set new HSL parameters
7119 				if (fb.circleDrag) {
7120 				  var hue = Math.atan2(pos.x, -pos.y) / 6.28;
7121 				  if (hue < 0) hue += 1;
7122 				  fb.setHSL([hue, fb.hsl[1], fb.hsl[2]]);
7123 				}
7124 				else {
7125 				  var sat = Math.max(0, Math.min(1, -(pos.x / fb.square) + .5));
7126 				  var lum = Math.max(0, Math.min(1, -(pos.y / fb.square) + .5));
7127 				  fb.setHSL([fb.hsl[0], sat, lum]);
7128 				}
7129 				return false;
7130 			  }
7131 			
7132 			  /**
7133 			   * Mouseup handler
7134 			   */
7135 			  fb.mouseup = function () {
7136 				// Uncapture mouse
7137 				$(document).unbind('mousemove', fb.mousemove);
7138 				$(document).unbind('mouseup', fb.mouseup);
7139 				document.dragging = false;
7140 			  }
7141 			
7142 			  /**
7143 			   * Update the markers and styles
7144 			   */
7145 			  fb.updateDisplay = function () {
7146 				// Markers
7147 				var angle = fb.hsl[0] * 6.28;
7148 				$('.h-marker', e).css({
7149 				  left: Math.round(Math.sin(angle) * fb.radius + fb.width / 2) + 'px',
7150 				  top: Math.round(-Math.cos(angle) * fb.radius + fb.width / 2) + 'px'
7151 				});
7152 			
7153 				$('.sl-marker', e).css({
7154 				  left: Math.round(fb.square * (.5 - fb.hsl[1]) + fb.width / 2) + 'px',
7155 				  top: Math.round(fb.square * (.5 - fb.hsl[2]) + fb.width / 2) + 'px'
7156 				});
7157 			
7158 				// Saturation/Luminance gradient
7159 				$('.color', e).css('backgroundColor', fb.pack(fb.HSLToRGB([fb.hsl[0], 1, 0.5])));
7160 			
7161 				// Linked elements or callback
7162 				if (typeof fb.callback == 'object') {
7163 				  // Set background/foreground color
7164 				  $(fb.callback).css({
7165 					backgroundColor: fb.color,
7166 					color: fb.hsl[2] > 0.5 ? '#000' : '#fff'
7167 				  });
7168 			
7169 				  // Change linked value
7170 				  $(fb.callback).each(function() {
7171 					if (this.value && this.value != fb.color) {
7172 					  this.value = fb.color;
7173 					}
7174 				  });
7175 				}
7176 				else if (typeof fb.callback == 'function') {
7177 				  fb.callback.call(fb, fb.color);
7178 				}
7179 			  }
7180 			
7181 			  /**
7182 			   * Get absolute position of element
7183 			   */
7184 			  fb.absolutePosition = function (el) {
7185 				var r = { x: el.offsetLeft, y: el.offsetTop };
7186 				// Resolve relative to offsetParent
7187 				if (el.offsetParent) {
7188 				  var tmp = fb.absolutePosition(el.offsetParent);
7189 				  r.x += tmp.x;
7190 				  r.y += tmp.y;
7191 				}
7192 				return r;
7193 			  };
7194 			
7195 			  /* Various color utility functions */
7196 			  fb.pack = function (rgb) {
7197 				var r = Math.round(rgb[0] * 255);
7198 				var g = Math.round(rgb[1] * 255);
7199 				var b = Math.round(rgb[2] * 255);
7200 				return '#' + (r < 16 ? '0' : '') + r.toString(16) +
7201 					   (g < 16 ? '0' : '') + g.toString(16) +
7202 					   (b < 16 ? '0' : '') + b.toString(16);
7203 			  }
7204 			
7205 			  fb.unpack = function (color) {
7206 				if (color.length == 7) {
7207 				  return [parseInt('0x' + color.substring(1, 3)) / 255,
7208 					parseInt('0x' + color.substring(3, 5)) / 255,
7209 					parseInt('0x' + color.substring(5, 7)) / 255];
7210 				}
7211 				else if (color.length == 4) {
7212 				  return [parseInt('0x' + color.substring(1, 2)) / 15,
7213 					parseInt('0x' + color.substring(2, 3)) / 15,
7214 					parseInt('0x' + color.substring(3, 4)) / 15];
7215 				}
7216 			  }
7217 			
7218 			  fb.HSLToRGB = function (hsl) {
7219 				var m1, m2, r, g, b;
7220 				var h = hsl[0], s = hsl[1], l = hsl[2];
7221 				m2 = (l <= 0.5) ? l * (s + 1) : l + s - l*s;
7222 				m1 = l * 2 - m2;
7223 				return [this.hueToRGB(m1, m2, h+0.33333),
7224 					this.hueToRGB(m1, m2, h),
7225 					this.hueToRGB(m1, m2, h-0.33333)];
7226 			  }
7227 			
7228 			  fb.hueToRGB = function (m1, m2, h) {
7229 				h = (h < 0) ? h + 1 : ((h > 1) ? h - 1 : h);
7230 				if (h * 6 < 1) return m1 + (m2 - m1) * h * 6;
7231 				if (h * 2 < 1) return m2;
7232 				if (h * 3 < 2) return m1 + (m2 - m1) * (0.66666 - h) * 6;
7233 				return m1;
7234 			  }
7235 			
7236 			  fb.RGBToHSL = function (rgb) {
7237 				var min, max, delta, h, s, l;
7238 				var r = rgb[0], g = rgb[1], b = rgb[2];
7239 				min = Math.min(r, Math.min(g, b));
7240 				max = Math.max(r, Math.max(g, b));
7241 				delta = max - min;
7242 				l = (min + max) / 2;
7243 				s = 0;
7244 				if (l > 0 && l < 1) {
7245 				  s = delta / (l < 0.5 ? (2 * l) : (2 - 2 * l));
7246 				}
7247 				h = 0;
7248 				if (delta > 0) {
7249 				  if (max == r && max != g) h += (g - b) / delta;
7250 				  if (max == g && max != b) h += (2 + (b - r) / delta);
7251 				  if (max == b && max != r) h += (4 + (r - g) / delta);
7252 				  h /= 6;
7253 				}
7254 				return [h, s, l];
7255 			  }
7256 			
7257 			  // Install mousedown handler (the others are set on the document on-demand)
7258 			  $('*', e).mousedown(fb.mousedown);
7259 			
7260 				// Init color
7261 			  fb.setColor('#000000');
7262 			
7263 			  // Set linked elements/callback
7264 			  if (callback) {
7265 				fb.linkTo(callback);
7266 			  }
7267 			}
7268 		},
7269 		/**
7270 		* @description 获取颜色值
7271 		* @return {colorpicker} colorpicker对象
7272 		* @example
7273 		* $("#testExpObj").colorpicker('getVal');
7274 		*/
7275 		getVal : function(){
7276 			getVal = this.element.val() ;
7277 			return getVal ;
7278 		},
7279 		/**
7280 		* @description 销毁取色控件
7281 		* @return {colorpicker} colorpicker对象
7282 		* @example
7283 		* $("#testExpObj").colorpicker('destroy');
7284 		*/
7285 		destroy : function(){
7286 			$('#picker').remove() ;
7287 		}
7288 	});
7289 
7290 	$.extend($.fn.colorpicker, {
7291 		version: "1.3"
7292 	});
7293 
7294 })(jQuery);/*
7295  *作    者: 高娜
7296  *版    本: 1.3
7297  *完成时间: 2012-07-05
7298  *描    述: ratystar
7299  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
7300  */
7301 (function($,undefined){
7302     /**
7303 	* @class 星级评定
7304     * @name ratystar
7305     * @description 星级评定插件
7306 	* @version 1.3
7307     */
7308 	$.widget('ui.ratystar',
7309 	/** @lends ratystar.prototype */
7310 	{		
7311 		options:{
7312 			/**  
7313 			* @name ratystar#total
7314 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
7315 			* @description 显示最多星星个数
7316 			* @default {Number} 5
7317 			* @example
7318 			* $('.exampleObj').ratystar({
7319 			*		total : 5
7320 			*  });
7321 			*/
7322 			total : 5 ,
7323 			/**  
7324 			* @name ratystar#value
7325 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
7326 			* @description 每个星星表示的分值
7327 			* @default {Number} 1
7328 			* @example
7329 			* $('.exampleObj').ratystar({
7330 			*		value : 1
7331 			*  });
7332 			*/
7333 			value : 1 ,
7334 			/**  
7335 			* @name ratystar#stardefault
7336 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
7337 			* @description 默认显示星级,这个需要和每个星星表示的分值相除，所以建议设置值和每个星星分值成整数倍。
7338 			* @default {Number} 2
7339 			* @example
7340 			* $('.exampleObj').ratystar({
7341 			*		stardefault : 2
7342 			*  });
7343 			*/
7344 			stardefault : 2 ,
7345 			/**  
7346 			* @name ratystar#disable
7347 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
7348 			* @description 是否禁用手动设置星级
7349 			* @default {Boolean} false
7350 			* @example
7351 			* $('.exampleObj').ratystar({
7352 			*		disable : false
7353 			*  });
7354 			*/
7355 			disable : false
7356 		},
7357 		_create:function(){
7358 			var _self = this.element ;
7359 			var o = this.options ;
7360 			var starul = '' ;
7361 			var starli = '' ;
7362 			for(var i=0 ; i<o.total ; i++){
7363 				starli += '<li></li>' ;
7364 			}
7365 			starul = '<ul class="ratystar-starul" data-disable = '+ o.disable + '>' + starli + '</ul><div class="ratystar-clear"></div>' ;
7366 			_self.append(starul) ;
7367 		},
7368 		_init:function(){
7369 			var _self = this.element ;
7370 			var o = this.options ;
7371 			var tarLi = _self.find('.ratystar-starul li') ;
7372 			var tarUl = _self.find('.ratystar-starul') ;
7373 			var sourceLi = Math.round((o.stardefault - 1) / o.value) ;
7374 			setStarL(sourceLi) ;
7375 			tarLi.click(function(){
7376 				if(tarUl.attr('data-disable') == 'false'){
7377 					var index = $(this).index() ;
7378 					tarLi.css('cursor','pointer') ;
7379 					setStarL(index) ;
7380 					setStarD(index) ;
7381 					sourceLi = index ;
7382 				}else{
7383 					tarLi.css('cursor','default') ;
7384 				}
7385 			}) ;
7386 			
7387 			tarLi.hover(function(){
7388 				if(tarUl.attr('data-disable') == 'false'){
7389 					var index = $(this).index() ;
7390 					tarLi.css('cursor','pointer') ;
7391 					setStarL(index) ;
7392 					setStarD(index) ;
7393 				}else{
7394 					tarLi.css('cursor','default') ;
7395 				}
7396 			},function(){
7397 				if(tarUl.attr('data-disable') == 'false'){
7398 					tarLi.css('cursor','pointer') ;
7399 					setStarL(sourceLi) ;
7400 					setStarD(sourceLi) ;
7401 				}else{
7402 					tarLi.css('cursor','default') ;
7403 				}
7404 			}) ;
7405 			
7406 			//点亮星星
7407 			function setStarL(index){			
7408 				for(var i=0 ; i<=index; i++){
7409 					if(!tarLi.eq(i).hasClass('ratystar-starli-active')){
7410 						tarLi.eq(i).addClass('ratystar-starli-active') ;
7411 					}
7412 				}
7413 				tarUl.attr('data-starval',(index+1)*o.value) ;
7414 			}
7415 			
7416 			//点灰星星
7417 			function setStarD(index){
7418 				for(var i = index + 1 ; i<o.total ; i++){
7419 					if(tarLi.eq(i).hasClass('ratystar-starli-active')){
7420 						tarLi.eq(i).removeClass('ratystar-starli-active') ;
7421 					}
7422 				}
7423 				tarUl.attr('data-starval',(index+1)*o.value) ;
7424 			}
7425 		},
7426 		/**
7427 		* @description 禁用设置星级
7428 		* @return {ratystar} ratystar对象
7429 		* @example
7430 		* $("#testExpObj").ratystar('disable');
7431 		*/
7432 		disable : function(){
7433 			this.element.find('.ratystar-starul').attr('data-disable','true') ;
7434 		},
7435 		/**
7436 		* @description 启用设置星级
7437 		* @return {ratystar} ratystar对象
7438 		* @example
7439 		* $("#testExpObj").ratystar('enable');
7440 		*/
7441 		enable : function(){
7442 			this.element.find('.ratystar-starul').attr('data-disable','false') ;
7443 		},
7444 		/**
7445 		* @description 获取星级评定结果
7446 		* @return {ratystar} ratystar对象
7447 		* @example
7448 		* $("#testExpObj").ratystar('getStar');
7449 		*/
7450 		getStar : function(){
7451 			getStar = this.element.find('.ratystar-starul').attr('data-starval') ;
7452 			return getStar ;
7453 		},
7454 		/**
7455 		* @description 清除星级评定
7456 		* @return {ratystar} ratystar对象
7457 		* @example
7458 		* $("#testExpObj").ratystar('destroy');
7459 		*/
7460 		destroy : function(){
7461 		}
7462 	});
7463 
7464 	$.extend($.fn.ratystar, {
7465 		version: "1.3"
7466 	});
7467 
7468 })(jQuery);/*
7469  *作    者: 高娜
7470  *版    本: 1.3
7471  *完成时间: 2012-07-09
7472  *描    述: uploadannex
7473  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
7474  */
7475 (function($,undefined){
7476     /**
7477 	* @class 上传附件
7478     * @name uploadannex
7479     * @description 上传附件插件
7480 	* @version 1.3
7481     */
7482 	$.widget('ui.uploadannex',
7483 	/** @lends uploadannex.prototype */
7484 	{		
7485 		options:{
7486 			/**  
7487 			* @name uploadannex#height
7488 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
7489 			* @description 上传文件列表区域高度
7490 			* @default {Number} 180
7491 			* @example
7492 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7493 			*		height : 180
7494 			*  });
7495 			*/
7496 			height : 180 ,
7497 			/**  
7498 			* @name uploadannex#able
7499 			* @param {Array}  数组类型
7500 			* @description 可上传文件格式(如果设置有值表示除设置的几种文件格式其他在备选数组中的文件格式均不可上传)
7501 			* @default {Array} []
7502 			* @example
7503 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7504 			*		able : []
7505 			*  });
7506 			*/
7507 			able : ['jpg','gif','png','jpeg','doc','docx','xls','xlsx','txt','html','rar','zip','asp','ppt','pptx','avi','exe','swf','fla','js','xml','htm','jsp','mp3','mp4','css'],
7508 			/**  
7509 			* @name uploadannex#disable
7510 			* @param {Array}  数组类型
7511 			* @description 不可上传文件格式(如果设置有值表示除设置的几种文件格式其他在备选数组中的文件格式均可上传)
7512 			* @default {Array} []
7513 			* @example
7514 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7515 			*		disable : []
7516 			*  });
7517 			*/
7518 			disable : [],
7519 			/**  
7520 			* @name uploadannex#contain
7521 			* @param {Array}  数组类型
7522 			* @description 备选的文件格式
7523 			* @default {Array} [jpg,gif,png,doc,docx,xlsx,xls,txt,html,rar,zip,asp,ppt,pptx,avi]
7524 			* @example
7525 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7526 			*		contain :['jpg','gif','png','jpeg','doc','docx','xls','xlsx','txt','html','rar','zip','asp']
7527 			*  });
7528 			*/
7529 			contain : [] ,
7530 			 /**  
7531 			* @name uploadannex#fnFile 
7532 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7533 			* @description 通过浏览按钮上传自定义方法
7534 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7535 			* @example
7536 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7537 			*		fnFile: function(){alert("fnFile")}
7538 			*    });
7539 			*/
7540  			 fnFile : function(){} ,
7541 			 /**  
7542 			* @name uploadannex#fn  
7543 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7544 			* @description 自定义方法
7545 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7546 			* @example
7547 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7548 			*		fn: function(){alert("fn")}
7549 			*    });
7550 			*/
7551  			 fn : function(){} ,
7552 			 /**  
7553 			* @name uploadannex#fnDel
7554 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7555 			* @description 删除附件自定义方法
7556 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7557 			* @example
7558 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7559 			*		fnDel: function(){alert("fn")}
7560 			*    });
7561 			*/
7562  			 fnDel : function(){} ,
7563 			 /**  
7564 			* @name uploadannex#dragEnterDiv  
7565 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7566 			* @description dragenter时操作
7567 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7568 			* @example
7569 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7570 			*		dragEnterDiv: function(){alert("dragenter")}
7571 			*    });
7572 			*/
7573  			 dragEnterDiv : function(){},
7574 			/**  
7575 			* @name uploadannex#dragOverDiv  
7576 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7577 			* @description dragover时操作
7578 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7579 			* @example
7580 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7581 			*		dragOverDiv: function(){alert("dragover")}
7582 			*    });
7583 			*/
7584  			 dragOverDiv : function(){},
7585 			/**  
7586 			* @name uploadannex#dragDropDiv  
7587 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7588 			* @description drop时操作
7589 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7590 			* @example
7591 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7592 			*		dragDropDiv: function(){alert("dragdrop")}
7593 			*    });
7594 			*/
7595  			 dragDropDiv : function(){},
7596 			/**  
7597 			* @name uploadannex#dragLeaveDiv  
7598 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7599 			* @description dragleave时操作
7600 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7601 			* @example
7602 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7603 			*		dragLeaveDiv: function(){alert("dragleave")}
7604 			*    });
7605 			*/
7606  			dragLeaveDiv : function(){}
7607 		},
7608 		_create:function(){
7609 			var _self = this.element ;
7610 			var o = this.options ;
7611 			var uploadContent = '' ;
7612 			if(window.FileReader && !$.browser.opera){
7613 				uploadContent = '浏览并选择文件，或者将文件拖放到该区域来上传文件。' ;
7614 			}else{
7615 				uploadContent = '浏览并选择文件。' ;
7616 			}
7617 			_self.prevAll('.upload-content').html(uploadContent) ;
7618 			_self.height(o.height) ;
7619 		},
7620 		_init:function(){
7621 			var _self = this.element ;
7622 			var o = this.options ;
7623 			var errorContent = '<p class="upload-files-errorCon"><p>' ;
7624 			_self.after(errorContent) ;
7625 			//通过浏览方式上传
7626 			$('.upload-input input').change(function(){
7627 				var fAllname = $(this).val() ;
7628 				showFiles(fAllname) ;
7629 				o.fn() ;
7630 				o.fnFile() ;
7631 			}) ;
7632 			
7633 			//通过拖拽方式上传
7634 			if(window.FileReader){
7635 				_self[0].addEventListener('dragenter', handleDragEnter, false);
7636 				_self[0].addEventListener('dragover', handleDragOver, false);
7637 				_self[0].addEventListener('drop', handleFileSelect, false);
7638 				_self[0].addEventListener('dragleave', handleDragLeave, false);	
7639 			}
7640 			
7641 			//处理拖放文件列表
7642 			function handleFileSelect(evt) {
7643 				evt.stopPropagation(); //阻止默认的打开事件
7644 				evt.preventDefault();
7645 				displayList(evt) ;
7646 				o.fn() ;
7647 				o.dragDropDiv() ;
7648 			}
7649 			
7650 			// 处理插入拖出效果
7651 			function handleDragEnter(evt){ 
7652 				evt.stopPropagation();
7653 				evt.preventDefault();
7654 				o.dragEnterDiv() ;
7655 			}
7656 			function handleDragLeave(evt){
7657 				o.dragLeaveDiv() ;
7658 			}
7659 	
7660 			// 处理文件拖入事件，防止浏览器默认事件带来的重定向
7661 			function handleDragOver(evt){
7662 				evt.stopPropagation();
7663 				evt.preventDefault();
7664 				o.dragOverDiv() ;
7665 			}
7666 			
7667 			//拖拽形式展示
7668 			function displayList(evt){
7669 				var files = evt.dataTransfer.files;//一个file类型的数组，就是你拖拽进来的文件
7670 				for(var i=0,f; f=files[i]; i++){
7671 					var pos = f.name.lastIndexOf('.') ;
7672 					var fileFormat = f.name.substring(pos+1,f.name.length) ;
7673 					var i = $('.upload-files-list').length ;
7674 					var uid = 'uploadID' + i ;
7675 					if(isuploadfileType(fileFormat)&&(!ishasupload(f.name))){
7676 						reader = new FileReader() ;
7677 						var uploadfiles = '<div class="upload-files-list" id="'+uid+'"><p class="upload-files-name"><a href="#">'+f.name+'</a></p><p class="upload-files-msg"><span class="upload-files-progress-num">5%</span><a href="#" class="upload-files-del"></a></p><p class="upload-files-progress"></p></div>' ;
7678 						reader.readAsDataURL(f);//直接将图片的内容以FileReader的readAsDataURL方法读取入并显示
7679 						_self.append(uploadfiles) ;
7680 					}else if(ishasupload(f.name)){
7681 						var errormsg = f.name +'已上传，请重新选择' ;
7682 						_self.nextAll('.upload-files-errorCon').html(errormsg) ;
7683 					}else{
7684 						var errormsg = '您上传的'+fileFormat+'不是合法的格式，请重新选择' ;
7685 						_self.nextAll('.upload-files-errorCon').html(errormsg) ;
7686 					}
7687 				}
7688 			}
7689 			
7690 			//显示上传文件
7691 			function showFiles(fAllname){
7692 				var pos = fAllname.lastIndexOf('.') ;
7693 				fformat = fAllname.substring(pos+1,fAllname.length) ;
7694 				var posName = fAllname.lastIndexOf('\\') ;
7695 				fname = fAllname.substring(posName+1,fAllname.length) ;
7696 				var i = $('.upload-files-list').length ;
7697 				if(isuploadfileType(fformat)&&(!ishasupload(fname))){
7698 					var uploadfiles = '<div class="upload-files-list"><p class="upload-files-name"><a href="#">'+fname+'</a></p><p class="upload-files-msg"><span class="upload-files-progress-num">5%</span><a href="#" class="upload-files-del"></a></p><p class="upload-files-progress"></p></div>' ;
7699 					_self.append(uploadfiles) ;
7700 				}else if(ishasupload(fAllname)){
7701 					var errormsg = f.name +'已上传，请重新选择' ;
7702 					_self.nextAll('.upload-files-errorCon').html(errormsg) ;
7703 				}else{
7704 					var errormsg = '您上传的'+fformat+'不是合法的格式，请重新选择' ;
7705 					_self.nextAll('.upload-files-errorCon').html(errormsg) ;
7706 				}
7707 			}
7708 			
7709 			//删除附件
7710 			$('.upload-files-del').live('click',function(){
7711 				$(this).parents('.upload-files').attr('data-id',$(this).parents('.upload-files-list').attr('id')) ;
7712 				$(this).parents('.upload-files-list').remove() ;
7713 				o.fnDel() ;
7714 			}) ;
7715 			
7716 			//判断是否已上传文件
7717 			function ishasupload(name){
7718 				var isuploadfile = _self.find('.upload-files-name').find('a') ;
7719 				var len = isuploadfile.length ;
7720 				for(var i = 0; i<len ; i++){
7721 					if(name == isuploadfile.eq(i).html()){
7722 						return true ;
7723 					}
7724 				}
7725 			}
7726 			
7727 			//判断是否可上传的文件格式
7728 			function isuploadfileType(uploadType){
7729 				var ableLen = o.able.length ;
7730 				    disableLen = o.disable.length
7731 				if((ableLen == 0)&&(disableLen == 0)){
7732 					return isInArr(uploadType,o.contain) ;
7733 				}else if((ableLen>0)&&(disableLen==0)){
7734 					return isInArr(uploadType,o.able) ;
7735 				}else if((ableLen==0)&&(disableLen>0)){
7736 					return !(isInArr(uploadType,o.disable)) ;
7737 				}else{
7738 					console.log('仅需要设置只允许上传的或不允许上传的文件格式');
7739 				}
7740 			}
7741 			
7742 			//判断是否在数组中
7743 			function isInArr(uploadfile,filesArr){
7744 				for(var i=0; i<filesArr.length;i++){
7745 					if(uploadfile == filesArr[i]){
7746 						return true ;
7747 					}
7748 				}
7749 			}
7750 		},
7751 		/**
7752 		* @description 清除上传附件
7753 		* @return {ratystar} uploadannex对象
7754 		* @example
7755 		* $("#testExpObj").uploadannex('destroy');
7756 		*/
7757 		destroy : function(){
7758 		}
7759 	});
7760 
7761 	$.extend($.fn.uploadannex, {
7762 		version: "1.3"
7763 	});
7764 
7765 })(jQuery);
7766 //设置进度值
7767 function setProgress(id,value,isError){ //isError是一个布尔值，上传是否出错。
7768 	var id = '#' + id ;
7769 	var progress = $(id).find('.upload-files-progress') ;
7770 	var progressNum = $(id).find('.upload-files-progress-num') ;
7771 	var valueStr = value + '%' ;
7772 	var hasdoing = progress.hasClass('upload-files-progress-doing') ;
7773 	var hassuccess = progress.hasClass('upload-files-progress-success') ;
7774 	var haserror = progress.hasClass('upload-files-progress-error') ;
7775 	if(isError){
7776 		if(!haserror){
7777 			progressNum.addClass('.upload-files-num-error').html('续传') ;
7778 			progress.addClass('upload-files-progress-error').width(valueStr) ;
7779 		}
7780 		if(hasdoing){
7781 			progress.removeClass('upload-files-progress-doing') ;
7782 		}
7783 		if(hassuccess){
7784 			progressNum.removeClass('upload-files-num-success') ;
7785 			progress.removeClass('upload-files-progress-success') ;
7786 		}
7787 	}else if(parseInt(value) == 100){
7788 		if(!hassuccess){
7789 			progressNum.addClass('.upload-files-num-success').html('完成') ;
7790 			progress.addClass('upload-files-progress-success').width(valueStr) ;
7791 		}
7792 		if(hasdoing){
7793 			progress.removeClass('upload-files-progress-doing') ;
7794 		}
7795 		if(haserror){
7796 			progressNum.removeClass('upload-files-num-error') ;
7797 			progress.removeClass('upload-files-progress-error') ;
7798 		}
7799 	}else{
7800 		if(!hasdoing){
7801 			progressNum.html(valueStr) ;
7802 			progress.addClass('upload-files-progress-doing').width(valueStr) ;
7803 		}
7804 		if(hassuccess){
7805 			progressNum.removeClass('upload-files-num-success') ;
7806 			progress.removeClass('upload-files-progress-success') ;
7807 		}
7808 		if(haserror){
7809 			progressNum.removeClass('upload-files-num-error') ;
7810 			progress.removeClass('upload-files-progress-error') ;
7811 		}
7812 	}
7813 }/*
7814  *作    者: 高娜
7815  *版    本: 1.3
7816  *完成时间: 2012-07-11
7817  *描    述: inputblock
7818  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
7819  */
7820 (function($,undefined){
7821     /**
7822 	* @class 输入块控件
7823     * @name inputblock
7824     * @description 输入块插件
7825 	* @version 1.3
7826     */
7827 	$.widget('ui.inputblock',
7828 	/** @lends inputblock.prototype */
7829 	{		
7830 		options:{
7831 			/**  
7832 			* @name inputblock#width
7833 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
7834 			* @description 包裹展示区域的宽度
7835 			* @default {Number} 400
7836 			* @example
7837 			* $('.exampleObj').inputblock({
7838 			*		width : 400
7839 			*  });
7840 			*/
7841 			width : 400 ,
7842 			/**  
7843 			* @name inputblock#content
7844 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
7845 			* @description 选择区域提示信息
7846 			* @default {String} 'add a person'
7847 			* @example
7848 			* $('.exampleObj').inputblock({
7849 			*		content : 'add person'
7850 			*  });
7851 			*/
7852 			content : 'add person' ,
7853 			/**  
7854 			* @name inputblock#list
7855 			* @param {Array}  数组类型
7856 			* @description 显示的列表
7857 			* @default {Array} []
7858 			* @example
7859 			* $('.exampleObj').inputblock({
7860 			*		list : []
7861 			*  });
7862 			*/
7863 			list : [] ,
7864 			/**  
7865 			* @name inputblock#fn  
7866 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7867 			* @description 预留自定义方法
7868 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7869 			* @example
7870 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7871 			*		fn : function(){}
7872 			*    });
7873 			*/
7874  			 fn : function(){} ,
7875 			 /**  
7876 			* @name inputblock#fnClick 
7877 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7878 			* @description 点击事件预留方法,需要传递一个返回值，数组类型。
7879 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7880 			* @example
7881 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7882 			*		fnClick : function(){return ['张三','六六']  ;}
7883 			*    });
7884 			*/
7885  			 fnClick : function(){} ,
7886 			 /**  
7887 			* @name inputblock#fnDel  
7888 			* @param {Fn} 函数 
7889 			* @description 删除事件预留方法
7890 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
7891 			* @example
7892 			* $('.exampleObj').uploadannex({
7893 			*		fnDel : function(){}
7894 			*    });
7895 			*/
7896  			 fnDel : function(){} 
7897 		},
7898 		_create:function(){
7899 			var _self = this.element ;
7900 			var o = this.options ;
7901 			var listLen = o.list.length ;
7902 			var inputblockWrap = '<div class="inputblock-wrap"></div>' ;
7903 			var inputWrap = '<div class="inputblock-add"></div>' ;
7904 			var inputblockClear = '<div class="inputblock-clear"></div>' ;
7905 			var inputblockElem = '' ;
7906 			for(var i=0; i<listLen; i++){
7907 				inputblockElem += '<p class="inputblock-elem"><span>'+o.list[i]+'</span><a href="#" title="delete" class="inputblock-del"></a></p>'
7908 			}
7909 			_self.val(o.content).attr({'readonly':true,'unselectable':'on'}).wrap(inputblockWrap).wrap(inputWrap).parents('.inputblock-add').before(inputblockElem).after(inputblockClear) ;
7910 			_self.parents('.inputblock-wrap').width(o.width) ;
7911 		},
7912 		_init:function(){
7913 			var _self = this.element ;
7914 			var o = this.options ;
7915 			var _tarObj = _self.parents('div.inputblock-wrap') ;
7916 			for(var i=0; i<_tarObj.length ; i++){
7917 				_tarObj.eq(i).click(function(e){
7918 					var _this = $(this) ;
7919 					var target = e.target ;
7920 					if(!$(target).hasClass('inputblock-del')){
7921 						var newElem = o.fnClick() ;
7922 						var inputNewElem = '' ;
7923 						for(var i=0; i<newElem.length; i++){
7924 							inputNewElem += '<p class="inputblock-elem"><span>'+newElem[i]+'</span><a href="#" title="delete" class="inputblock-del"></a></p>'
7925 						}
7926 						_this.find('div.inputblock-add').before(inputNewElem) ;
7927 					}
7928 				}) ;
7929 			}
7930 			$('.inputblock-del').live('click',function(){
7931 				$(this).parents('.inputblock-elem').remove() ;
7932 				o.fnDel() ;
7933 			}) ;
7934 		},
7935 		/**
7936 		* @description 注入输入块,需要传入参数，参数为数组形式。
7937 		* @return {inputblock} inputblock对象
7938 		* @example
7939 		* $("#testExpObj").inputblock('setVal',['黄黄','张张','菲菲']);
7940 		*/
7941 		setVal : function(newElem){
7942 			this.element.parents('.inputblock-wrap').find('.inputblock-elem').remove() ;
7943 			var len = newElem.length ;
7944 			var inputblockElem = '' ;
7945 			for(var i=0; i<len; i++){
7946 				inputblockElem += '<p class="inputblock-elem"><span>'+newElem[i]+'</span><a href="#" title="delete" class="inputblock-del"></a></p>'
7947 			}
7948 			this.element.parents('.inputblock-add').before(inputblockElem) ;
7949 		},
7950 		/**
7951 		* @description 获得输入块
7952 		* @return {inputblock} inputblock对象
7953 		* @example
7954 		* $("#testExpObj").inputblock('getVal');
7955 		*/
7956 		getVal : function(){
7957 			console.log('fdasfa') ;
7958 			var spanElem = this.element.parents('.inputblock-wrap').find('.inputblock-elem span') ;
7959 			var len = spanElem.length ;
7960 			getAry = [] ;
7961 			for(var i=0; i<len; i++){
7962 				getAry[i] = spanElem.eq(i).html() ;
7963 			}
7964 			return getAry ;
7965 		},
7966 		/**
7967 		* @description 清楚输入块控件
7968 		* @return {inputblock} inputblock对象
7969 		* @example
7970 		* $("#testExpObj").inputblock('destroy');
7971 		*/
7972 		destroy : function(){
7973 			if(this.element.parents('.inputblock-wrap').length > 0){
7974 				 this.element.parents('.inputblock-wrap').find('.inputblock-elem').remove() ;
7975 				 this.element.parents('.inputblock-wrap').find('.inputblock-clear').remove() ;
7976 				 this.element.unwrap().unwrap().removeAttr('readonly') ;
7977 			}
7978 		}
7979 	});
7980 
7981 	$.extend($.fn.inputblock, {
7982 		version: "1.3"
7983 	});
7984 
7985 })(jQuery);/*
7986  *
7987  * Slides, A Slideshow Plugin for jQuery
7988  * Intructions: http://slidesjs.com
7989  * By: Nathan Searles, http://nathansearles.com
7990  * Version: 1.1.9
7991  * Updated: September 5th, 2011
7992  *
7993  * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
7994  * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
7995  * You may obtain a copy of the License at
7996  *
7997  * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
7998  *
7999  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
8000  * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
8001  * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
8002  * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
8003  * limitations under the License.
8004  */
8005 (function($) {
8006   /**
8007    * @class 图片轮播展示
8008    * @name slide
8009    * @description 图片轮播展示插件
8010    * @version 1.1
8011    */
8012   $.fn.slide = function(option) {
8013     //默认配置
8014     var defaults = {
8015       /**
8016        * @name slide#maxNum
8017        * @param {Number} maxNum
8018        * @description 最多允许展示图片数目
8019        * @default {Number} 6
8020        * @example
8021        *
8022        */
8023       maxNum: 6,
8024       //最多允许6张图片
8025       /**
8026        * @name slide#width
8027        * @param {Number} width
8028        * @description 控件的宽
8029        * @default {Number} 438
8030        * @example
8031        *
8032        */
8033       width: undefined,
8034       /**
8035        * @name slide#height
8036        * @param {Number} height
8037        * @description 控件的高
8038        * @default {Number} 350
8039        * @example
8040        *
8041        */
8042       height: undefined,
8043       /**
8044        * @name slide#container
8045        * @param {String} container
8046        * @description 控件容器class值
8047        * @default {String} 'slide-container'
8048        * @example
8049        *
8050        */
8051       container: 'slide-container',
8052       /**
8053        * @name slide#hoverPause
8054        * @param {Boolean} hoverPause
8055        * @description 鼠标移入时是否停止周期轮播事件 true 表示 停止
8056        * @default {Boolean} false
8057        * @example
8058        *
8059        */
8060       hoverPause: false,
8061       //    preload: false, //  布尔型;控制预加载slideshow下的img的图片；
8062       //    preloadImage: '/img/loading.gif', // 字符串;设定预加载时的加载中标识...(默认值:/img/loading.gif)
8063       /**
8064        * @name slide#height
8065        * @param {Boolean} pagination
8066        * @description 手动选择显示的幻灯图片开关
8067        * @default {Boolean} true
8068        * @example
8069        *
8070        */
8071       pagination: true,
8072       /**
8073        * @deprecated
8074        * @name slide#paginationType
8075        * @param {String} paginationType
8076        * @description 手动触发方式;注意!暂时不提供配置
8077        * @default {String} 'click'
8078        * @example
8079        *
8080        */
8081       paginationType: 'click',
8082       /**
8083        * @name slide#paginationClass
8084        * @param {String} paginationClass
8085        * @description 手动选择入口的容器节点class值
8086        * @default {String} 'pagination'
8087        * @example
8088        *
8089        */
8090       paginationClass: 'pagination',
8091       // 设置pagination导航的位置 优先于样式类 .pagination-pos
8092       // 格式
8093       // {
8094       //   right: 25,
8095       //   bottom: 5
8096       // }
8097       paginationPos: null,
8098       // 是否显示pagination导航的文字 true表示 不显示 false 表示 显示
8099       paginationTextHidden: true,
8100       /**
8101        * @name slide#currentClass
8102        * @param {String} currentClass
8103        * @description 当前显示动画节点的class值
8104        * @default {String} 'current'
8105        * @example
8106        *
8107        */
8108       currentClass: 'current',
8109       /**
8110        * @name slide#duration
8111        * @param {Number} duration
8112        * @description 过渡动画持续时间
8113        * @default {Number} 600
8114        * @example
8115        *
8116        */
8117       duration: 600,
8118       /**
8119        * @name slide#start
8120        * @param {Number} start
8121        * @description 默认显示的图片序号
8122        * @default {Number} 1
8123        * @example
8124        *
8125        */
8126       index: 1,
8127       /**
8128        * @name slide#effect
8129        * @param {String} effect
8130        * @description 动画效果;1,fade,淡入淡出;2,slide:h 水平;v 垂直;可选值: "h"; "v"; "slide";
8131        * @default {String} 'h'
8132        * @example
8133        *
8134        */
8135       effect: 'h',
8136       /**
8137        * @name slide#shutterDir
8138        * @param {String} shutterDir
8139        * @description effect参数值为shutter时使用 可选值 h w
8140        * @default {String} 'h'
8141        * @example
8142        *
8143        */
8144       shutterDir: "h",
8145       /**
8146        * @name slide#shutterNum
8147        * @param {Number} shutterNum
8148        * @description 生成的百叶窗的数目
8149        * @default {Number} 3
8150        * @example
8151        *
8152        */
8153       shutterNum: 3,
8154       /**
8155        * @name slide#dataAttributeName
8156        * @param {String} dataAttributeName
8157        * @description 用来存储响应数据的参数
8158        * @default {String} 3000
8159        * @example
8160        *
8161        */
8162       dataAttributeName: "data-slideParamName",
8163       /**
8164        * @name slide#eventParams
8165        * @param {Array} eventParams
8166        * @description 构建时收集的每帧图片响应时预存的参数
8167        * @default {Array} []
8168        * @example
8169        *
8170        */
8171       eventParams: [],
8172       /**
8173        * @name slide#eventHandler
8174        * @param {Function} eventHandler
8175        * @description 构建时收集的每帧图片响应时响应实现
8176        * @default {Function} null 触发a标签上的默认调整动作
8177        * @example
8178        *
8179        */
8180       eventHandler: null,
8181       /**
8182        * @name slide#play
8183        * @param {Number} play
8184        * @description 自动播放周期(设定为大于0的数字将开启自动播放)
8185        * @default {Number} 3000
8186        * @example
8187        *
8188        */
8189       play: 2000,
8190       /**
8191        * @name slide#pause
8192        * @param {Number} pause
8193        * @description 控制手动播放时停止播放. 定为大于0的数字将开启停止播放功能,数值为停止的间隙
8194        * @default {Number} 1000
8195        * @example
8196        *
8197        */
8198       pause: 1000,
8199       //      hoverPause:false, // 布尔型 设置成ture 鼠标悬浮时会暂停动画
8200       //      bigTarget:false, // 布尔型 设置成true后点击一张图片将链接到下一张图片 注意img父节点a标签的点击事件
8201       /**
8202        * @name slide#animationStart
8203        * @param {fn} animationStart
8204        * @description 动画执行开始前调用的方法
8205        * @default {fn} function() {}
8206        * @example
8207        *
8208        */
8209       animationStart: function() {},
8210       /**
8211        * @name slide#animationComplete
8212        * @param {fn} animationComplete
8213        * @description 动画执行完毕后的回调方法
8214        * @default {fn} function() {}
8215        * @example
8216        *
8217        */
8218       animationComplete: function() {},
8219       /**
8220        * @name slide#animationComplete
8221        * @param {fn} animationComplete
8222        * @description 当幻灯片都加载好后调用的方法
8223        * @default {fn} function() {}
8224        * @example
8225        *
8226        */
8227       slideLoaded: function() {}
8228     };
8229     //加载默认配置和用户自定义配置
8230     option = $.extend({}, defaults, option || {});
8231     //淡入淡出 推入推出
8232     function _slide() {
8233       var $elem = $(this);
8234       var $container = $elem.find('.' + option.container);
8235       //将控件容器下的的幻灯片节点使用div.slide-control包裹
8236       //在html结构中限定
8237       //$slides.wrapAll(/*$control*/$('<div class="slide-control"/>'));
8238       var $control = $container.find(">div.slide-controller");
8239       var $slides = $control.children();
8240       var $imgs = $slides.find("img");
8241 
8242       //收集每帧图片对应的数据
8243       $.each($slides, function(index, item) {
8244         option.eventParams[index] = $(item).attr(option.dataAttributeName);
8245       });
8246       //绑定数据交互事件
8247       if (option.eventHandler && Object.prototype.toString.call(option.eventHandler) === '[object Function]') {
8248         $control.delegate("img", "click", function(event) {
8249           option.eventHandler(option.eventParams[current]);
8250           return false;
8251         });
8252       }
8253       //幻灯片数目
8254       var total = $slides.size();
8255       //如果获取准确的宽高
8256       //1.显式配置;2.在img上设置width,height属性;3,通过脚本判断获取(TODO:未完成)
8257       var width = option.width || $imgs.width() /*$slides.outerWidth()在某些情形下获取值不准确*/
8258       ;
8259       var height = option.height || $imgs.height() /*$slides.outerHeight()*/
8260       ;
8261       var start = option.index - 1;
8262       var next = 0;
8263       var prev = 0;
8264       var current = 0; //重置默认配置为0
8265       var loaded; //资源就绪
8266       var active; //锁,值为false值时才能开启一次动画
8267       var clicked; //手动选择的图片
8268       var position;
8269       var effect = option.effect;
8270       var direction; //正(左、上)、负向
8271       //            var imageParent;//预加载时使用
8272       var duration = option.duration;
8273       // 点击事件列表
8274       // 处理快速点击时动画叠加, 在动画过渡时期的白底问题
8275       var paginationListener = [];
8276       // if(duration < 2000) {
8277       //   duration = 2000;
8278       // }
8279       var pauseTimeout;
8280       var playInterval;
8281       if(total > option.maxNum) {
8282         alert("最多允许" + option.maxNum + "张图片!");
8283         return;
8284       }
8285       if((!option.width || !option.height) && (!$slides.find("img").attr("width") || !$slides.find("img").attr("height"))) {
8286         alert("控件宽高调用错误!");
8287         return;
8288       }
8289       //设定图片的宽、高;在自定义控件宽高时使用
8290       //此时不使用等比缩放、简单的将容器的宽、高赋值
8291       if(option.width && option.height) {
8292         $slides.find("img").attr("width", width).attr("height", height);
8293       }
8294       //设定容器的宽高
8295       //确定控件容器拥有样式: overflow: hidden; position: relative;
8296       //设定控制容器的样式
8297       $container.css({
8298         "overflow": "hidden",
8299         "position": "relative",
8300         "width": width + "px",
8301         "height": height + "px"
8302       });
8303       $control.css({
8304         "position": "relative",
8305         "top": -height + "px",
8306         //slide control
8307         "left": -width + "px",
8308         //slide control
8309         "width": total * width + "px",
8310         "height": total * height + "px"
8311       });
8312       //设定幻灯片的样式
8313       $slides.css({
8314         "position": "absolute",
8315         "display": "none",
8316         "top": height + "px",
8317         "left": width + "px",
8318         "z-index": 0
8319       });
8320       if(total < 2) { //只有一帧
8321         $container.fadeIn(duration, function() {
8322           loaded = true;
8323           option.slideLoaded();
8324         });
8325         return false;
8326       }
8327       if(start < 0) {
8328         start = 0;
8329       }
8330       if(start > total) {
8331         start = total - 1;
8332       }
8333       //根据配置的开始帧 设置 当前帧 下标
8334       if(option.index) {
8335         current = start;
8336       }
8337 
8338       //显示控件
8339       $container.css("display", "block");
8340 
8341       //此时只是简单的显示开始帧
8342       $control.children(":eq(" + start + ")").fadeIn(duration, function() {
8343         loaded = true;
8344         option.slideLoaded();
8345       });
8346       //生成手动操作入口
8347       if(option.pagination) {
8348         var ulCss = {
8349           "position": "absolute",
8350           // "right": "25px",
8351           // "bottom": "12px",
8352           "z-index": 6
8353         };
8354         var ul = '<ul class="' + option.paginationClass + ' pagination-pos ' + (!!option.paginationTextHidden ? 'pagination-text-hidden' : '' )+ '">';
8355         if (option.paginationPos) {
8356           var tmp, paginationPos = option.paginationPos;
8357           for (tmp in paginationPos) {
8358             if (paginationPos.hasOwnProperty(tmp)) {
8359               ulCss[tmp] = paginationPos[tmp];
8360             }
8361           }
8362           delete tmp;
8363         }
8364         for(var i = 0; i < total; i++) {
8365           ul += '<li><a href="javascript:;">' + (i + 1) + '</a></li>';
8366         }
8367         ul += '</ul>';
8368         $(ul).appendTo($container).css(ulCss);
8369         $elem.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li:eq(' + start + ')').addClass(option.currentClass);
8370         //绑定手动播放事件-->TODO:提供参数表示触发类型
8371         // switch(option.paginationType) {
8372         //   case "click":
8373         //     $elem.find("ul." + option.paginationClass + ">li>a").click(function() {
8374         //       console.log($control.is(':animated'));
8375         //       //强制中止动画
8376         //       // if(option.play) { // option.play
8377         //       //   _pause();
8378         //       // }
8379         //       if ($control.is(':animated')) {
8380         //         _pause();
8381         //       }
8382         //       //显示数字从1开始;计算下标由0开始
8383         //       clicked = parseInt($(this).text(), 10) - 1;
8384         //       if(current != clicked) {
8385         //         _animate('pagination', effect, clicked);
8386         //       }
8387         //       return false;
8388         //     });
8389         //     break;
8390         //   //控制上再滑动是不连贯-暂时屏蔽掉
8391         //   case "hover":
8392         //     console.log('pa: hover');
8393         //     break;
8394         //   default:
8395         //     break;
8396         // }
8397         $elem.find("ul." + option.paginationClass + ">li>a").click(function() {
8398           if(option.play) {
8399             _pause();
8400           }
8401           //显示数字从1开始;计算下标由0开始
8402           clicked = parseInt($(this).text(), 10) - 1;
8403           //  && !$control.is(':animated')
8404           // if(current != clicked) {
8405           //   _animate('pagination', effect, clicked);
8406           // }
8407           // 相邻事件不重复添加--> 放置到animation处理?
8408           if (current !== clicked) {
8409             if (paginationListener.length > 0) {
8410               if (clicked !== paginationListener[paginationListener.length - 1]) {
8411                 paginationListener.push(clicked);
8412               }
8413             } else {
8414               paginationListener.push(clicked);
8415             }
8416           }
8417           if (!$control.is(':animated')) {
8418             if(paginationListener.length > 0) {
8419               _animate('pagination', effect, paginationListener.shift());
8420             }
8421           }
8422           return false;
8423         });
8424       }
8425       //开始图片播放
8426       if(option.play) {
8427         playInterval = setInterval(function() {
8428           _animate('next', effect);
8429         }, option.play);
8430         $elem.data("interval", playInterval);
8431       }
8432 
8433       // 悬浮暂停轮播事件
8434       if(option.hoverPause && option.play) {
8435         $control.bind({
8436           mouseover: function() {
8437             _stop();
8438           },
8439           mouseleave: function() {
8440             _pause();
8441           }
8442         });
8443       }
8444       // 检查导航点击事件列表
8445       // 如果有 则执行 否则 进入轮播状态
8446       function _checkListener() {
8447         if (paginationListener.length > 0) {
8448           if (option.play) {
8449             _pause();
8450           }
8451           _animate('pagination', effect, paginationListener.shift());
8452         }
8453       }
8454       function _animate(direction, effect, clicked) {
8455         if(!loaded || active) return;
8456         //动画开始前调用
8457         option.animationStart(current + 1);
8458         //根据动画方向 更新配置参数
8459         switch(direction) {
8460         case "next":
8461           prev = current;
8462           next = current + 1;
8463           next = (total === next) ? 0 : next;
8464           current = next;
8465           if(effect == "h") {
8466             position = width * 2;
8467             direction = -position;
8468           } else if(effect == "v") {
8469             position = height * 2;
8470             direction = -position;
8471           }
8472           break;
8473         case "prev":
8474           prev = current;
8475           next = current - 1;
8476           next = (next = -1) ? total - 1 : next;
8477           position = direction = 0;
8478           current = next;
8479           break;
8480         case "pagination":
8481           prev = $elem.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li.' + option.currentClass + ">a").text();
8482           prev = parseInt(prev, 10) - 1;
8483           next = clicked;
8484           if(prev < next) {
8485             if(effect == "h") {
8486               position = width * 2;
8487               direction = -position;
8488             } else if(effect == "v") {
8489               position = height * 2;
8490               direction = -position;
8491             }
8492           } else {
8493             position = direction = 0;
8494           }
8495           current = next;
8496           break;
8497           //其他
8498         }
8499         //动画效果
8500         switch(effect) {
8501         case "h":
8502           $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").css({
8503             "left": position + "px",
8504             "display": "block"
8505           });
8506           $control.animate({
8507             "left": direction + "px"
8508           }, duration, function() {
8509             //重置动画控制对象参数
8510             $control.css({
8511               "left": -width + "px"
8512             });
8513             $control.children(':eq(' + next + ')').css({
8514               "left": width + "px",
8515               zIndex: 5
8516             });
8517             $control.children(':eq(' + prev + ')').css({
8518               "left": width + "px",
8519               display: 'none',
8520               zIndex: 0
8521             });
8522             //结束动画
8523             option.animationComplete(next + 1);
8524             active = false;
8525             _checkListener();
8526           });
8527           break;
8528         case "v":
8529           $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").css({
8530             "top": position + "px",
8531             "display": "block"
8532           });
8533           $control.animate({
8534             "top": direction + "px"
8535           }, duration, function() {
8536             //重置动画控制对象参数
8537             $control.css({
8538               "top": -height + "px"
8539             });
8540             $control.children(':eq(' + next + ')').css({
8541               "top": height + "px",
8542               "z-index": 5
8543             });
8544             $control.children(':eq(' + prev + ')').css({
8545               "top": height + "px",
8546               "display": "none",
8547               "z-index": 0
8548             });
8549             //结束动画
8550             option.animationComplete(next + 1);
8551             active = false;
8552             _checkListener();
8553           });
8554           break;
8555         case "fade":
8556           $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").css({
8557             "z-index": 5 //6?5?7?
8558           }).fadeIn(duration, function() {
8559             $control.children(":eq(" + prev + ")").css({
8560               "z-index": 0,
8561               "display": "none"
8562             });
8563             //重置z-index
8564             $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").css({
8565               "z-index": 0
8566             });
8567             //结束动画
8568             option.animationComplete(next + 1);
8569             active = false;
8570             _checkListener();
8571           });
8572           break;
8573         case "zoom":
8574           $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").css({
8575             width: 0,
8576             height: 0,
8577             left: 3 * width / 2,
8578             top: 3 * height / 2
8579           });
8580           $control.children(":eq(" + prev + ")").animate({
8581             width: 0,
8582             height: 0,
8583             left: 3 * width / 2,
8584             top: 3 * height / 2
8585           }, duration / 2, function() {
8586             $control.children(":eq(" + prev + ")").css({
8587               "z-index": 0,
8588               "display": "none",
8589               "width": width,
8590               "height": height,
8591               "top": height,
8592               "left": width
8593 
8594             });
8595             $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").animate({
8596               width: width,
8597               height: height,
8598               left: width,
8599               top: height
8600             }, duration / 2);
8601             //重置z-index
8602             $control.children(":eq(" + next + ")").css({
8603               "z-index": 0,
8604               "display": "block",
8605               "opacity": "1"
8606             });
8607             //结束动画
8608             option.animationComplete(next + 1);
8609             active = false;
8610             _checkListener();
8611           });
8612           break;
8613         default:
8614           break;
8615         }
8616         // 更新手动操作样式
8617         if(option.pagination) { //可直接替换
8618           //删除
8619           $elem.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li.' + option.currentClass).removeClass(option.currentClass);
8620           // 添加
8621           $elem.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li:eq(' + next + ')').addClass(option.currentClass);
8622         }
8623       }
8624 
8625       /**
8626        * 清除自动播放周期
8627        */
8628       function _stop() {
8629         clearInterval($elem.data('interval'));
8630       }
8631 
8632       /**
8633        * 清除定时器;延时添加定时器
8634        */
8635       function _pause() {
8636         if(option.pause) {
8637           clearTimeout($elem.data('pause'));
8638           clearInterval($elem.data('interval'));
8639           pauseTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
8640             clearTimeout($elem.data('pause'));
8641             playInterval = setInterval(function() {
8642               _animate('next', effect);
8643             }, option.play);
8644             $elem.data("interval", playInterval);
8645           }, option.pause);
8646           $elem.data('pause', pauseTimeout);
8647         } else {
8648           //_stop();
8649         }
8650       }
8651     }
8652     //百叶窗
8653     //see http://www.cnblogs.com/hongru/archive/2010/10/31/1865555.html
8654     function _shutter() {
8655       var _that = this;
8656       var $wrapper = $(_that);
8657       var $container = $wrapper.find("." + option.container);
8658       var $imgParentA = $container.find("a");
8659       var $img = $imgParentA.find("img");
8660       //收集每帧图片对应的数据
8661       $.each($imgParentA, function(index, item) {
8662         option.eventParams[index] = $(item).attr(option.dataAttributeName);
8663       });
8664       //自动运行间隔
8665       _that.a = option.auto ? option.auto : 4;
8666       _that.index = option.index ? option.index : 0;
8667       //幻燈片個數
8668       _that.l = $imgParentA.length;
8669       //当前显示的图片序号(未&&z-index变量)
8670       _that.cur = 0;
8671       //百葉窗的葉子數//@
8672       _that.stN = option.shutterNum ? option.shutterNum : 5;
8673       //輪播的方向
8674       _that.direction = option.shutterDir ? option.shutterDir : 'h';
8675       _that.W = option.width ? option.width : $wrapper.width();
8676       _that.H = option.height ? option.height : $wrapper.height();
8677 
8678       _that.aw = 0;
8679       //_that.mask = [];
8680       //隱藏原始圖片輪播部份
8681       $container.width(this.W).height(this.H).find(">div.slide-controller").css("display", "none");
8682       //構建百葉窗結構
8683       var $shutterContainer = $("<div />");
8684       var $shutterA = $("<a />");
8685       $shutterA.attr("href", "javascript:;");
8686 
8687       var _shutterHTML = "";
8688       for(var x = 0; x < _that.stN; x++) {
8689         var _spanCssText = _that.direction === "h" ? "position:absolute;width:" + _that.W / _that.stN + "px;height:" + _that.H + "px;left:" + x * (_that.W / _that.stN) + "px;top:0" : "position:absolute;width:" + _that.W + "px;height:" + _that.H / _that.stN + "px;left:0" + "px;top:" + x * (_that.H / _that.stN) + "px";
8690         _shutterHTML += '<span style="' + _spanCssText + '">' + '</span>';
8691       }
8692       var _doubleUseCssText = {
8693         "position": "absolute",
8694         "width": _that.W + "px",
8695         "height": _that.H + "px",
8696         "left": 0,
8697         "top": 0
8698       };
8699       $shutterA.html(_shutterHTML).css(_doubleUseCssText);
8700       //$shutterContainer.css(_doubleUseCssText).css("background-color", "rgba(36, 72, 108,.5)").append($shutterA).appendTo($container);
8701 	  $shutterContainer.css(_doubleUseCssText).css("background-color", "rgb(36, 72, 108)").append($shutterA).appendTo($container);
8702       //绑定数据交互事件
8703       $shutterA.bind("click", function() {
8704         option.eventHandler(option.eventParams[_that.cur]);
8705         return false;
8706       });
8707       //生成手动操作入口
8708       if(option.pagination) {
8709         var ulCss = {
8710           "position": "absolute",
8711           //"right": "25px",
8712           //"bottom": "12px",
8713           "z-index": 6
8714         };
8715         //var ul = '<ul class=' + option.paginationClass + '>';
8716 		var ul = '<ul class="' + option.paginationClass + ' pagination-pos ' + (!!option.paginationTextHidden ? 'pagination-text-hidden' : '' )+ '">';
8717 		if (option.paginationPos) {
8718           var tmp, paginationPos = option.paginationPos;
8719           for (tmp in paginationPos) {
8720             if (paginationPos.hasOwnProperty(tmp)) {
8721               ulCss[tmp] = paginationPos[tmp];
8722             }
8723           }
8724           delete tmp;
8725         }
8726         for(var i = 0; i < _that.l; i++) {
8727           ul += '<li><a href="javascript:;">' + (i + 1) + '</a></li>';
8728         }
8729         ul += '</ul>';
8730         $(ul).appendTo($shutterContainer).css(ulCss).delegate("li", "click", function(event) {
8731           var _t = event.target;
8732           while(_t.nodeType === 3) _t = _t.parentNode;
8733           var $target = $(_t);
8734           if($target.is("ul")) {
8735             return;
8736           } else {
8737             if($target.is("a")) {
8738               $target = $target.parent();
8739             }
8740           }
8741           if($target.is("." + option.paginationClass)) return;
8742           _that.pos($target.index());
8743 
8744         });
8745         $shutterContainer.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li:eq(' + _that.index + ')').addClass(option.currentClass);
8746       }
8747       //變換函數
8748       //大小週期
8749       _that.timer1 = false;
8750       _that.timer2 = [];
8751       _that.timer2.length = _that.stN;
8752       //小週期
8753       //传说中的变量提升
8754       _that.auto = function() {
8755         _that.timer1 = setInterval(function() {
8756           _that.move(1);
8757         }, _that.a * 1000);
8758       };
8759       _that.anim = function(index) {
8760         var tt = _that.direction == 'h' ? $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + (_that.stN - 1) + ")").width() : $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + (_that.stN - 1) + ")").height();
8761         if(tt <= 5) { //如果叶片过多 这个值有点小
8762           clearInterval(_that.timer2[index]);
8763           for(var z = 0; z < _that.stN; z++) {
8764             _that.direction == 'h' ? $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + z + ")").width(0) : $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + z + ")").height(0);
8765           }
8766           if(!_that.timer1) {
8767             _that.auto()
8768           }
8769         } else {
8770           for(var n = 0; n < _that.stN; n++) {
8771             _that.aw -= 1;
8772             _that.direction == 'h' ? $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + n + ")").width(_that.aw) : $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + n + ")").height(_that.aw);
8773           }
8774         }
8775       };
8776       _that.move = function(index) {
8777         var n = _that.cur + index;
8778         //下一张或上一张的序号（注意三元选择符的运用）
8779         var m = index == 1 ? n == _that.l ? 0 : n : n < 0 ? _that.l - 1 : n;
8780         //变换到上一张或下一张
8781         _that.pos(m);
8782       };
8783       _that.pos = function(index) {
8784         //                console.log("@pos:傳入的i:" + index );
8785         clearInterval(_that.timer1);
8786         clearInterval(_that.timer2[index]);
8787 
8788         _that.aw = _that.direction === "h" ? _that.W / _that.stN : _that.H / _that.stN;
8789 
8790         var _next = index + 1 >= _that.l ? 0 : index + 1;
8791 
8792         var _indexSrc = $img[index].src;
8793         var _nextSrc = $img[_next].src;
8794 
8795         $shutterContainer.css("background-image", "url(" + _nextSrc + ")");
8796         for(var y = 0; y < _that.stN; y++) {
8797           var _cssText = {
8798             "background-image": "url(" + _indexSrc + ")"
8799             //"background-repeat": " no-repeat "
8800           };
8801           if(_that.direction == "h") {
8802             _cssText["background-position"] = "-" + y * _that.W / _that.stN + "px 0";
8803             _cssText["width"] = _that.W / _that.stN + "px";
8804             _cssText["height"] = _that.H + "px";
8805             _cssText["left"] = y * (_that.W / _that.stN) + "px";
8806             _cssText["top"] = 0;
8807           } else {
8808             _cssText["background-position"] = "0 -" + y * _that.H / _that.stN + "px";
8809             _cssText["width"] = _that.W + "px";
8810             _cssText["height"] = _that.H / _that.stN + "px";
8811             _cssText["left"] = 0;
8812             _cssText["top"] = y * (_that.H / _that.stN) + "px";
8813           }
8814           $shutterA.find("span:eq(" + y + ")").css(_cssText);
8815         }
8816 
8817         _that.cur = index;
8818         _that.timer1 = false;
8819         //删除
8820         $shutterContainer.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li.' + option.currentClass).removeClass(option.currentClass);
8821         // 添加
8822         $shutterContainer.find('.' + option.paginationClass + ' li:eq(' + index + ')').addClass(option.currentClass);
8823         _that.timer2[index] = setInterval(function() {
8824           _that.anim(index);
8825         }, 10 * _that.stN);
8826       };
8827       _that.pos(_that.index);
8828     }
8829     return this.each(option.effect === "shutter" ? _shutter : _slide);
8830   };
8831   $.extend($.fn.slide, {
8832     version: "1.1"
8833   });
8834 })(jQuery);
8835 /**
8836  * 作    者: 高娜 
8837  * 版    本: 1.3
8838  * 完成时间: 2012-07-16 
8839  * 描    述: fn.isMobile
8840  * 关联文件: 
8841  */
8842 /** 
8843 * @class 判断访问设备是否是手机  
8844 * @name isMobile
8845 * @description 判断访问设备是否是手机 
8846 * @return {isMobile} 布尔值
8847 * @version 1.3 
8848 */
8849 ui.fn.isMobile = function(){
8850 	var agent = window.navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase() ;
8851 	//alert(agent) ;
8852 	var flag = false ;
8853 	var isPC = true ;
8854 	var nmobile = ['windows nt','ipod','macintosh','ipad'] ;//排除条件关键字罗列
8855 	var keyword = ['android','iphone','playbook','symbian','blackberry','windows phone','nokia'] ;//各类手机关键词罗列
8856 	console.log('agent==='+agent) ;
8857 	for(var i=0; i<nmobile.length; i++){
8858 		if(agent.indexOf(nmobile[i])>-1){
8859 			isPC = true ;
8860 			flag = false ;
8861 			break ;
8862 		}else{
8863 			isPC = false ;
8864 		}
8865 	}
8866 	console.log(flag) ;
8867 	if(!isPC){
8868 		for(var i=0; i<keyword.length; i++){
8869 			if(agent.indexOf(keyword[i])>-1){
8870 				flag = true ;
8871 				break ;
8872 			}
8873 		}
8874 	}
8875 	return flag ;
8876 	console.log(flag) ;
8877 };
8878 //声明快捷方法
8879 ui.isMobile = ui.fn.isMobile;/*
8880  *作    者: 高娜
8881  *版    本:1.3
8882  *完成时间: 2012-07-18
8883  *描    述: file
8884  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
8885  */
8886 (function($,undefined){
8887     /**
8888 	* @class 文件上传控件
8889     * @name file
8890     * @description 文件上传控件
8891 	* @version   1.3
8892     */
8893 	$.widget('ui.file',
8894 	/** @lends file.prototype */
8895 	{		
8896 		options:{
8897 			/**  
8898 			* @name file#width
8899 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
8900 			* @description 文件上传控件的宽度
8901 			* @default {Number} 200
8902 			* @example
8903 			* $('.exampleObj').file({
8904 			*		width : 200
8905 			*  });
8906 			*/
8907 			width : 200 ,
8908 			/**  
8909 			* @name file#height
8910 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
8911 			* @description 文件上传控件的高度
8912 			* @default {Number} 200
8913 			* @example
8914 			* $('.exampleObj').file({
8915 			*		height : 30
8916 			*  });
8917 			*/
8918 			height : 30 
8919 		},
8920 		_create:function(){
8921 			var _self = this.element ;
8922 			var o=this.options ;
8923 			var _span = '<span class="file-wrap"></span>' ;
8924 			var _textInput = '<input class="file-text" type="text" readonly /><input class="file-button" type="button" value="浏览" />' ;           
8925 			_self.wrap(_span).after(_textInput) ;
8926 			_self.addClass("file-ifile").width(o.width).height(o.height) ;
8927 			var _parent = _self.parents('.file-wrap') ;
8928 			var text_width=o.width - _parent.find('.file-button').width() -3 ;
8929 			var _left = _parent.offset().left;
8930 			var _top = _parent.offset().top;
8931 			_parent.find('.file-text').width(text_width).height(o.height - 2).css('line-height',o.height - 2+'px') ;
8932 			_self.css({'top':_top,'left':_left}) ;
8933 		},
8934 		
8935 		_init:function(){
8936 			 var _self = this.element ;
8937 			 _self.change(function(){
8938 			 	var _value = _self.val().substring(_self.val().lastIndexOf('\\')+1,_self.val().length) ; 
8939 			 	_self.parents('.file-wrap').find('.file-text').val(_value) ;
8940 			 }) ;
8941 		} ,
8942 		/**
8943 		* @description 获得文件路径控件
8944 		* @return {inputblock} inputblock对象
8945 		* @example
8946 		* $("#testExpObj").file('getVal');
8947 		*/
8948        getVal : function(){
8949 		   getVal = this.element.parents(".file-wrap").find('.file-text').val();
8950 		   return getVal ;
8951        },
8952 		/**
8953 		* @description 清除文件上传控件
8954 		* @return {inputblock} inputblock对象
8955 		* @example
8956 		* $("#testExpObj").file('destroy');
8957 		*/
8958 		destroy : function(){
8959 			if(this.element.parents('.file-wrap').length >0){
8960 				this.element.parents('.file-wrap').find('.file-text').remove() ;
8961 			 	this.element.parents('.file-wrap').find('.file-button').remove() ;
8962 			 	this.element.removeClass().unwrap('.file-wrap');
8963 			}
8964 		}
8965 	});
8966 
8967 	$.extend($.ui.file, {
8968 		version: "1.3"
8969 	});
8970 
8971 })(jQuery);
8972 
8973 /*
8974  *作    者: 高娜
8975  *版    本: 1.3
8976  *完成时间: 2012-07-19
8977  *描    述: accordion
8978  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
8979  */
8980 (function($,undefined){
8981     /**
8982 	* @class 手风琴控件
8983     * @name accordion
8984     * @description 手风琴控件
8985 	* @version 1.3
8986     */
8987 	$.widget('ui.accordion',
8988 	/** @lends accordion.prototype */
8989 	{		
8990 		options : {
8991 			/**  
8992 			* @name accordion#wrapWidth
8993 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
8994 			* @description 包裹展示区域的宽度-针对x方向手风琴设置,建议根据显示图片个数设置,这个值与显示图片宽度的差值大于显示图片数量的十倍
8995 			* @default {Number} 480
8996 			* @example
8997 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
8998 			*		wrapWidth : 480
8999 			*  });
9000 			*/
9001 			wrapWidth : 480 ,
9002 			/**  
9003 			* @name accordion#wrapHeight
9004 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
9005 			* @description 包裹展示区域的高度-针对y方向手风琴设置,建议根据显示图片个数设置,这个值与显示图片高度的差值大于显示图片数量的十倍
9006 			* @default {Number} 480
9007 			* @example
9008 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9009 			*		wrapHeight : 480
9010 			*  });
9011 			*/
9012 			wrapHeight : 480 ,
9013 			/**  
9014 			* @name accordion#imgWidth
9015 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
9016 			* @description 图片的宽度
9017 			* @default {Number} 400
9018 			* @example
9019 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9020 			*		imgWidth : 400
9021 			*  });
9022 			*/
9023 			imgWidth : 400 ,
9024 			/**  
9025 			* @name accordion#imgHeight
9026 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
9027 			* @description 图片的高度
9028 			* @default {Number} 300
9029 			* @example
9030 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9031 			*		imgHeight : 300
9032 			*  });
9033 			*/
9034 			imgHeight : 300 ,
9035 			/**  
9036 			* @name accordion#direction
9037 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
9038 			* @description 手风琴效果方向，可选值有x/y
9039 			* @default {String} 'x'
9040 			* @example
9041 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9042 			*		direction : 'x'
9043 			*  });
9044 			*/
9045 			direction : 'x' ,
9046 			/**  
9047 			* @name accordion#autoplay
9048 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔值类型
9049 			* @description 是否自动播放
9050 			* @default {Boolean} true
9051 			* @example
9052 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9053 			*		autoplay : true
9054 			*  });
9055 			*/
9056 			autoplay : true ,
9057 			/**  
9058 			* @name accordion#delay
9059 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
9060 			* @description 自动切换动画的时间间隔
9061 			* @default {Number} 3000
9062 			* @example
9063 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9064 			*		delay : 3000
9065 			*  });
9066 			*/
9067 			delay : 3000 ,
9068 			/**  
9069 			* @name accordion#radius
9070 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
9071 			* @description 圆角值-该样式需要浏览器支持css3，如果不支持默认为没有圆角效果。
9072 			* @default {Number} 8
9073 			* @example
9074 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9075 			*		radius : 8
9076 			*  });
9077 			*/
9078 			radius : 8 ,
9079 			/**  
9080 			* @name accordion#fn
9081 			* @param {Function}  函数类型
9082 			* @description 预留自定义函数
9083 			* @default {Function} fn
9084 			* @example
9085 			* $('.exampleObj').accordion({
9086 			*		fn : function(){}
9087 			*  });
9088 			*/
9089 			fn : function(){}
9090 		},
9091 		_create : function(){
9092 		},
9093 		_init : function(){
9094 			var _self = this.element ;
9095 			var o = this.options ;
9096 			var liElem = _self.find('li') ;
9097 			var len = liElem.length ;
9098 			_self.addClass('accor-wrap').css('border-radius',o.radius + 'px').find('li').addClass('accor-elem').css('border-radius',o.radius + 'px').find('img').css('border-radius',o.radius + 'px').width(o.imgWidth).height(o.imgHeight) ;
9099 			if(o.direction == 'x'){
9100 				accrX() ;
9101 			}else if(o.direction == 'y'){
9102 				accrY() ;
9103 			}
9104 			o.fn() ;
9105 			
9106 			function accrX(){
9107 				var minWid = parseInt((o.wrapWidth - o.imgWidth + 1)/(len - 1));
9108 				var inter = null ;
9109 				var nextIndex = 0 ;
9110 				_self.width(o.wrapWidth).height(o.imgHeight) ;	
9111 				liElem.addClass('accor-border-left') ;
9112 				liElem.eq(len-1).addClass('accor-current') ;
9113 				liElem.each(function(i){
9114 					var _left = parseInt(minWid) * i;
9115 					$(this).css({
9116 						left : _left 
9117 					});
9118 					$(this).hover(function(){
9119 						liElem.each(function(j){
9120 							liElem.eq(i).addClass('accor-current').siblings('li').removeClass('accor-current') ;
9121 							if(j<=i){
9122 							 	$(this).stop().animate({left:j*parseInt(minWid)},500);
9123 							}else{
9124 							 	$(this).stop().animate({left:parseInt(o.wrapWidth - minWid*(len - j))},500) ;
9125 							}
9126 						}) ;
9127 						if(inter != null || inter != 'undefined'){
9128 							clearInterval(inter);
9129 						}
9130 					},function(){
9131 						nextIndex = i ;
9132 						if(o.autoplay){
9133 							inter = setInterval(autoScroll,o.delay);
9134 							if(++nextIndex >= len){
9135 								nextIndex = 0 ;
9136 							}
9137 						}
9138 					}) ;
9139 				}) ;
9140 				if(o.autoplay){
9141 					inter = setInterval(autoScroll,o.delay);
9142 				}
9143 				function autoScroll(){
9144 					liElem.each(function(j){
9145 						liElem.eq(nextIndex).addClass('accor-current').siblings('li').removeClass('accor-current') ;
9146 						if(j<=nextIndex){ 
9147 						 	$(this).stop().animate({left:j*parseInt(minWid)},500);
9148 						}else{
9149 						 	$(this).stop().animate({left:parseInt(o.wrapWidth - minWid*(len - j))},500) ;
9150 						}  
9151 					});
9152 					if(++nextIndex >= len){
9153 						nextIndex = 0 ;
9154 					}
9155 				}
9156 			}			
9157 			
9158 			function accrY(){
9159 				var minHei = parseInt((o.wrapHeight - o.imgHeight + 1)/(len - 1));
9160 				var inter = null ;
9161 				var nextIndex = 0 ;
9162 				_self.width(o.imgWidth).height(o.wrapHeight) ;	
9163 				liElem.addClass('accor-border-top') ;
9164 				liElem.eq(len-1).addClass('accor-current') ;
9165 				liElem.each(function(i){
9166 					var _top = parseInt(minHei) * i;
9167 					$(this).css({
9168 						top : _top 
9169 					});
9170 					$(this).hover(function(){
9171 						liElem.each(function(j){
9172 							liElem.eq(i).addClass('accor-current').siblings('li').removeClass('accor-current') ;
9173 							if(j<=i){
9174 							 	$(this).stop().animate({top:j*parseInt(minHei)},500);
9175 							}else{
9176 							 	$(this).stop().animate({top:parseInt(o.wrapHeight - minHei*(len - j))},500) ;
9177 							}
9178 						}) ;
9179 						if(inter != null || inter != 'undefined'){
9180 							clearInterval(inter);
9181 						}
9182 					},function(){
9183 						nextIndex = i ;
9184 						if(o.autoplay){
9185 							inter = setInterval(autoScroll,o.delay);
9186 							if(++nextIndex >= len){
9187 								nextIndex = 0 ;
9188 							}
9189 						}
9190 					}) ;
9191 				}) ;
9192 				if(o.autoplay){
9193 					inter = setInterval(autoScroll,o.delay);
9194 				}
9195 				function autoScroll(){
9196 					liElem.each(function(j){
9197 						liElem.eq(nextIndex).addClass('accor-current').siblings('li').removeClass('accor-current') ;
9198 						if(j<=nextIndex){ 
9199 						 	$(this).stop().animate({top:j*parseInt(minHei)},500);
9200 						}else{
9201 						 	$(this).stop().animate({top:parseInt(o.wrapHeight - minHei*(len - j))},500) ;
9202 						}  
9203 					});
9204 					if(++nextIndex >= len){
9205 						nextIndex = 0 ;
9206 					}
9207 				}
9208 			}
9209 		} ,
9210 		/**
9211 		* @description 清除手风琴控件
9212 		* @return {accordion} accordion对象
9213 		* @example
9214 		* $("#testExpObj").accordion('destroy');
9215 		*/
9216 		destroy : function(){
9217 			
9218 		}
9219 	});
9220 
9221 	$.extend($.fn.accordion, {
9222 		version: "1.3"
9223 	});
9224 
9225 })(jQuery);/*
9226  *作    者: 张文钦
9227  *版    本: 1.0
9228  *完成时间: 2012-8-16
9229  *描    述: breadcrumb
9230  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
9231  */
9232 (function($){
9233 	/**
9234      * @class 面包屑
9235      * @name breadcrumb
9236      * @description 面包屑
9237      * @version 1.0
9238      */
9239     $.fn.breadcrumb = function(option){
9240         var defaults = {
9241             /**
9242              * @name breadcrumb#bread
9243              * @param {Array} 数据项格式为{name:"level",url:"#"}的对象数组
9244              * @description 面包屑构成数据集数组
9245              * @default {breadcrumb} []
9246              * @example
9247              * $("#breadcrumb").breadcrumb([{name:"level",url:"#"}]);
9248              */
9249             bread:[{}]
9250         };
9251         option = $.extend({}, defaults, option || {});
9252         return this.each(function(){
9253             //只有1、2个数据、3或者3+数据
9254             var $this = $(this);
9255             var _datas = option.bread;
9256             var i= 0,len= _datas.length;
9257             if ( len === 0 ) {
9258                 alert("参数传入错误!");
9259                 return this;
9260             }
9261             var $dataContent = '<ul class="ui-breadcrumb">';
9262             var _data = _datas[i++];
9263 
9264             if ( len === 1 ) {
9265                 $dataContent += '<li class="last-child"><span class="arrow"></span>'+_data.name+'</li></ul>';
9266                 $this.html($dataContent);
9267                 return this;
9268             } else if ( len === 2 ) {
9269                 $dataContent += '<li><span class="arrow"></span><a href="'+_data.url+'">'+_data.name+'</a></li>'
9270                     + '<li class="last-child"><span class="arrow"></span>'+_data.name+'</li></ul>';
9271                 $this.html($dataContent);
9272                 return this;
9273             }
9274             $dataContent += '<li><a href="'+_data.url+'">'+_data.name+'</a></li>';
9275             for ( i;i<len-1;i++) {
9276                 _data = _datas[i];
9277                 $dataContent += '<li><span class="arrow"></span><a href="'+_data.url+'">'+_data.name+'</a></li>';
9278             }
9279             _data = _datas[len-1];
9280             $dataContent += '<li class="last-child"><span class="arrow"></span>'+_data.name+'</li></ul>';
9281             $this.html($dataContent);
9282         });
9283     }
9284     $.extend($.fn.breadcrumb, {
9285         version: "1.0"
9286     });
9287 })(jQuery);/*
9288  *作    者: 张文钦
9289  *版    本: 1.0
9290  *完成时间: 2012-8-31
9291  *描    述: timeline
9292  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
9293  */
9294 (function ($) {
9295 	"use strict";
9296 	/**
9297 	* @class 简单时间轴+对应信息展示
9298     * @name timeline
9299     * @description 时间轴+对应信息展示
