11446 					.removeClass('ui-minScrollbar').unbind()
11447 					.nextAll().unbind()
11448 					.remove('div.ui-minScrollbar-horizontal,div.ui-minScrollbar-vertical')
11449 					.end().parent().unbind()
11450 					.end().unwrap('div.ui-minScrollbar-viewable');	
11451 				}			
11452 					
11453 			}
11454 			//return this.element; return导致不能一次销毁多个滚动条插件
11455 		}
11456 	});
11457 
11458 	$.extend($.ui.minScrollbar, {
11459 		version: "1.3",
11460 		author:'黄卉',
11461 		date:'2012-10-10'
11462 	});
11463 
11464 })(jQuery);
11465 
11466 $(function(){
11467 	$(".ui-minScrollbar").minScrollbar();
11468 	//$(".ui-minScrollbar").minScrollbar('destroy');
11469 });/*
11470  *作    者: 高娜
11471  *版    本: 1.3
11472  *完成时间: 2012-12-04
11473  *描    述: txttruncate
11474  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
11475  */
11476 (function($,undefined){
11477     /**
11478 	* @class 文本截断
11479     * @name txttruncate
11480     * @description 文本截断
11481 	* @version 1.3
11482     */
11483 	$.widget('ui.txttruncate',
11484 	/** @lends txttruncate.prototype */
11485 	{		
11486 		options:{
11487 			/**  
11488 			* @name txttruncate#dataPrompt
11489 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
11490 			* @description 是否以提示信息的方式显示完整的未截取的字符串。
11491 			* @default {Boolean} true
11492 			* @example
11493 			* $('.exampleObj').txttruncate({
11494 			*		dataPrompt : true
11495 			*  });
11496 			*/
11497 			dataPrompt : true ,
11498 			/**  
11499 			* @name txttruncate#dataFormat
11500 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11501 			* @description 显示多余内容的替代后缀，可以是html片段,注意定义html片段时需要考虑标签的正确嵌套关系
11502 			* @default {String} '...'
11503 			* @example
11504 			* $('.exampleObj').txttruncate({
11505 			*		dataFormat : '...'
11506 			*  });
11507 			*/
11508 			dataFormat : '...' ,
11509 			/**  
11510 			* @name txttruncate#customFn
11511 			* @param {Fn}  函数类型
11512 			* @description 自定义函数
11513 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
11514 			* @example
11515 			* $('.exampleObj').txttruncate({
11516 			*		customFn : function(){alert("customFn")}
11517 			*  });
11518 			*/
11519 			customFn : function(){}
11520 		},
11521 		_create:function(){},
11522 		_init:function(){		
11523 			var _self = this.element ;
11524 			var o = this.options ;
11525 			var txtWid = _self.attr('data-width') ;
11526 			var txtLen = _self.attr('data-length') ;
11527 			var txtHtml = _self.html() ;
11528 			var txtSize = parseInt(_self.css('font-size')) ;
11529 			var format = o.dataFormat ;
11530 			var isWid = (txtWid != undefined) ;
11531 			var isLen = (txtLen != undefined) ;
11532 			if(isLen){ //设置了显示文本的长度没有设置显示区域的宽度或是同时设置了显示文本的长度和显示区域的宽度。
11533 			}else if(!isLen && isWid){//设置了显示区域宽度
11534 				txtLen = Math.floor(txtWid/txtSize) ;
11535 			}else{//没有设置显示文本的长度和显示区域宽度、显示区域宽度根据上下文自适应
11536 				txtWid = _self.width() ;
11537 				txtLen = Math.floor(txtWid/txtSize) ;
11538 				$(window).resize(function(){
11539 					txtWid = _self.width() ;
11540 					txtLen = Math.floor(txtWid/txtSize) ;
11541 				}) ;
11542 			}
11543 			if(truncateByte(txtHtml,txtLen) != txtHtml){
11544 				var newTxt = truncateByte(txtHtml,txtLen) + format ;
11545 			}else{
11546 				var newTxt = truncateByte(txtHtml,txtLen) ;
11547 			}
11548 			_self.html(newTxt).attr('data-source',txtHtml) ;	
11549 			$(window).resize(function(){
11550 				if(truncateByte(txtHtml,txtLen) != txtHtml){
11551 					var newTxt = truncateByte(txtHtml,txtLen) + format ;
11552 				}else{
11553 					var newTxt = truncateByte(txtHtml,txtLen) ;
11554 				}
11555 				_self.html(newTxt).attr('data-source',txtHtml) ;		
11556 			}) ;
11557 			if(o.dataPrompt){
11558 				_self.attr('title',txtHtml) ;
11559 			}
11560 			o.customFn() ;
11561 			//截取方法-按设置文本长度截取
11562 			function truncateByte(str,n){//str待截取的字符串，n设定的截取长度，相当于2n个字节
11563 				var char_length = 0 ;
11564 				for(var i=0; i<str.length;i++){
11565 					var son_str = str.charAt(i) ;
11566 					encodeURI(son_str).length > 2 ? char_length += 1 : char_length += 0.5 ;
11567 					if(char_length > n){
11568 						var sub_len = char_length == n ? i+1 : i ;
11569 						return str.substr(0,sub_len) ;
11570 					}
11571 				}
11572 				return str ;
11573 			}
11574 		},
11575 		/**
11576 		* @description 设置修改替代后缀
11577 		* @return {txttruncate} txttruncate对象
11578 		* @example
11579 		* $("#testExpObj").txttruncate('setformat');
11580 		*/
11581 		setformat : function(forms){
11582 			var _self = this.element ;
11583 			var o = this.options ;
11584 			if(_self.attr('data-source')){
11585 				_self.html(_self.attr('data-source')) ;
11586 			}
11587 			_self.txttruncate({
11588 				dataFormat:forms
11589 			}) ;
11590 		},
11591 		/**
11592 		* @description 设置修改data-length的值
11593 		* @return {txttruncate} txttruncate对象
11594 		* @example
11595 		* $("#testExpObj").txttruncate('setlength');
11596 		*/
11597 		setlength : function(len){
11598 			var _self = this.element ;
11599 			var o = this.options ;
11600 			if(_self.attr('data-source')){
11601 				_self.html(_self.attr('data-source')) ;
11602 			}
11603 			_self.attr('data-length',len) ;
11604 			_self.txttruncate() ;
11605 		},
11606 		/**
11607 		* @description 设置修改data-width的值
11608 		* @return {txttruncate} txttruncate对象
11609 		* @example
11610 		* $("#testExpObj").txttruncate('setwidth');
11611 		*/
11612 		setwidth : function(wid){
11613 			var _self = this.element ;
11614 			var o = this.options ;
11615 			if(_self.attr('data-source')){
11616 				_self.html(_self.attr('data-source')) ;
11617 			}
11618 			_self.attr('data-width',wid) ;
11619 			_self.txttruncate() ;
11620 		},
11621 		/**
11622 		* @description 设置修改区域样式宽度
11623 		* @return {txttruncate} txttruncate对象
11624 		* @examplesetauto
11625 		* $("#testExpObj").txttruncate('setcsswid');
11626 		*/
11627 		setcsswid : function(str){
11628 			var _self = this.element ;
11629 			var o = this.options ;
11630 			if(_self.attr('data-source')){
11631 				_self.html(_self.attr('data-source')) ;
11632 			}
11633 			_self.removeAttr('data-length').removeAttr('data-width') ;
11634 			_self.css('width',str).txttruncate() ;
11635 		},
11636 		/**
11637 		* @description 清除文本截断控件
11638 		* @return {txttruncate} txttruncate对象
11639 		* @example
11640 		* $("#testExpObj").txttruncate('destroy');
11641 		*/
11642 		destroy : function(){
11643 			var _self = this.element ;
11644 			var o = this.options ;
11645 			if(_self.attr('data-source')){
11646 				_self.html(_self.attr('data-source')) ;
11647 			}
11648 		}
11649 	});
11650 
11651 	$.extend($.fn.txttruncate, {
11652 		version: "1.3"
11653 	});
11654 	
11655 })(jQuery);/*
11656  *作    者: 高娜
11657  *版    本: 1.3
11658  *完成时间: 2012-12-12
11659  *描    述: tochart
11660  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js
11661  */
11662 (function($,container){
11663     /**
11664 	* @class 表格转图表控件
11665     * @name tochart
11666     * @description 表格转图表控件
11667 	* @version 1.3
11668     */
11669 	$.widget('ui.tochart',
11670 	/** @lends tochart.prototype */
11671 	{		
11672 		options:{
11673 			/**  
11674 			* @name tochart#type
11675 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11676 			* @description 转换的图表形式，可选值有：'bar'-柱状图,'area'-区域图,'pie'-饼状图,'line'-线性图
11677 			* @default {String} 'bar' 
11678 			* @example
11679 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11680 			*		type : 'bar'
11681 			*  });
11682 			*/
11683 			type : 'bar' ,
11684 			/**  
11685 			* @name tochart#width
11686 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11687 			* @description 转换的图表宽度,当未手动设置宽度或设置值为null,取表格的宽度。
11688 			* @default {Number} null
11689 			* @example
11690 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11691 			*		width : null
11692 			*  });
11693 			*/
11694 			width : null ,
11695 			/**  
11696 			* @name tochart#height
11697 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11698 			* @description 转换的图表高度,当未手动设置高度或设置值为null,取表格的高度。
11699 			* @default {Number} null
11700 			* @example
11701 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11702 			*		height : null
11703 			*  });
11704 			*/
11705 			height : null ,
11706 			/**  
11707 			* @name tochart#appendTitle
11708 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
11709 			* @description 转换的图表是否显示表格的标题
11710 			* @default {Boolean} true
11711 			* @example
11712 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11713 			*		appendTitle : true
11714 			*  });
11715 			*/
11716 			appendTitle : true ,
11717 			/**  
11718 			* @name tochart#title
11719 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11720 			* @description 转换的图表显示的标题
11721 			* @default {String} null 
11722 			* @example
11723 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11724 			*		title : null
11725 			*  });
11726 			*/
11727 			title : null ,
11728 			/**  
11729 			* @name tochart#appendKey
11730 			* @param {Boolean}  布尔类型
11731 			* @description 转换的图表是否显示图例
11732 			* @default {Boolean} true
11733 			* @example
11734 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11735 			*		appendKey : true
11736 			*  });
11737 			*/
11738 			appendKey : true ,
11739 			/**  
11740 			* @name tochart#rowFilter
11741 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11742 			* @description 转换的图表行过滤条件设置
11743 			* @default {String} '*'
11744 			* @example
11745 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11746 			*		rowFilter : '*'
11747 			*  });
11748 			*/
11749 			rowFilter : '*' ,
11750 			/**  
11751 			* @name tochart#colFilter
11752 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11753 			* @description 转换的图表列过滤条件设置
11754 			* @default {String} '*'
11755 			* @example
11756 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11757 			*		colFilter : '*'
11758 			*  });
11759 			*/
11760 			colFilter : '*' ,
11761 			/**  
11762 			* @name tochart#colors
11763 			* @param {Array}  数组类型
11764 			* @description 转换的图表中显示是颜色块
11765 			* @default {Array} ['#be1e2d','#666699','#92d5ea','#ee8310','#8d10ee','#5a3b16','#26a4ed','#f45a90','#e9e744'] 
11766 			* @example
11767 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11768 			*		colors : ['#be1e2d','#666699','#92d5ea','#ee8310','#8d10ee','#5a3b16','#26a4ed','#f45a90','#e9e744']
11769 			*  });
11770 			*/
11771 			colors : ['#be1e2d','#666699','#92d5ea','#ee8310','#8d10ee','#5a3b16','#26a4ed','#f45a90','#e9e744'] ,
11772 			/**  
11773 			* @name tochart#textColors
11774 			* @param {Array}  数组类型
11775 			* @description 转换的饼图中提示数据文本颜色，只有饼图有。
11776 			* @default {Array} [] 
11777 			* @example
11778 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11779 			*		textColors : []
11780 			*  });
11781 			*/
11782 			textColors : [] ,
11783 			/**  
11784 			* @name tochart#parseDirection
11785 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11786 			* @description 解析表格数据的方向，可选参数为'x','y'，被解析的字段必须放到th标签里面。
11787 			* @default {String} 'x'
11788 			* @example
11789 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11790 			*		parseDirection : 'x'
11791 			*  });
11792 			*/
11793 			parseDirection : 'x' ,
11794 			/**  
11795 			* @name tochart#pieMargin
11796 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11797 			* @description 转换的饼图的外边距，只有饼状图有。
11798 			* @default {Number} 20
11799 			* @example
11800 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11801 			*		pieMargin : 20
11802 			*  });
11803 			*/
11804 			pieMargin : 20 ,
11805 			/**  
11806 			* @name tochart#pieLabelPos
11807 			* @param {String}  字符串类型
11808 			* @description 转换的饼图的提示数据在饼图的位置，可选参数'inside','outside',只有饼图有。
11809 			* @default {String} 'inside'
11810 			* @example
11811 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11812 			*		pieLabelPos : 'inside'
11813 			*  });
11814 			*/
11815 			pieLabelPos : 'inside' ,
11816 			/**  
11817 			* @name tochart#lineWeight
11818 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11819 			* @description 转换的线性图和区域图的线的宽度，只有线性图和区域图有。
11820 			* @default {Number} 4
11821 			* @example
11822 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11823 			*		lineWeight : 4
11824 			*  });
11825 			*/
11826 			lineWeight : 4 ,
11827 			/**  
11828 			* @name tochart#barGroupMargin
11829 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11830 			* @description 转换的柱状图中每组数据之间的间距，只有柱状图有。
11831 			* @default {Number} 10
11832 			* @example
11833 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11834 			*		barGroupMargin : 10
11835 			*  });
11836 			*/
11837 			barGroupMargin : 10 ,
11838 			/**  
11839 			* @name tochart#barMargin
11840 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11841 			* @description 转换的柱状图中每组数据内柱子之间的间距，只有柱状图有。
11842 			* @default {Number} 1
11843 			* @example
11844 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11845 			*		barMargin : 1
11846 			*  });
11847 			*/
11848 			barMargin : 1 ,
11849 			/**  
11850 			* @name tochart#yLabelInterval
11851 			* @param {Number}  数字类型
11852 			* @description 转换的图表参考坐标的间距
11853 			* @default {Number} 30
11854 			* @example
11855 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11856 			*		yLabelInterval : 30
11857 			*  });
11858 			*/
11859 			yLabelInterval : 30 ,
11860 			/**  
11861 			* @name tochart#customFn
11862 			* @param {Fn}  函数类型
11863 			* @description 自定义函数
11864 			* @default {Fn} function(){}
11865 			* @example
11866 			* $('.exampleObj').tochart({
11867 			*		customFn : function(){alert("customFn")}
11868 			*  });
11869 			*/
11870 			customFn : function(){}
11871 		},
11872 		_create:function(){},
11873 		_init:function(){
11874 			var _self = this.element ;
11875 			var o = this.options ;
11876 			o.width = (o.width == null) ? parseInt(_self.width()) : parseInt(o.width) ;
11877 			o.height = (o.height == null) ? parseInt(_self.height()) : parseInt(o.height) ;
11878 			if(_self.next('.visualize').length > 0){
11879 				_self.next('.visualize').remove() ;
11880 			}
11881 			//从html表格中解析数据
11882 			function scrapeTable(){
11883 				var colors = o.colors ;
11884 				var textColors = o.textColors ;
11885 				var tableData = {
11886 					dataGroups : function(){
11887 						var dataGroups = [] ;
11888 						if(o.parseDirection == 'x'){
11889 							_self.find('tr:gt(0)').filter(o.rowFilter).each(function(i){
11890 								dataGroups[i] = {} ;
11891 								dataGroups[i].points = [] ;
11892 								dataGroups[i].color = colors[i] ;
11893 								if(textColors[i]){
11894 									dataGroups[i].textColor = textColors[i] ;
11895 								}
11896 								$(this).find('td').filter(o.colFilter).each(function(){
11897 									dataGroups[i].points.push(parseFloat($(this).text())) ;
11898 								}) ;
11899 							}) ;
11900 						}else{
11901 							var cols = _self.find('tr:eq(1) td').filter(o.colFilter).size() ;
11902 							for(var i=0; i<cols; i++){
11903 								dataGroups[i] = {} ;
11904 								dataGroups[i].points = [] ;
11905 								dataGroups[i].color = colors[i] ;
11906 								if(textColors[i]){
11907 									dataGroups[i].textColor = textColors[i] ;
11908 								}
11909 								_self.find('tr:gt(0)').filter(o.colFilter).each(function(){
11910 									dataGroups[i].points.push($(this).find('td').eq(i).text()*1) ;
11911 								}) ;
11912 							}
11913 						}
11914 						return dataGroups ;
11915 					} ,
11916 					allData : function(){
11917 						var allData = [] ;
11918 						$(this.dataGroups()).each(function(){
11919 							allData.push(this.points) ;
11920 						}) ;
11921 						return allData ;
11922 					} ,
11923 					dataSum : function(){
11924 						var dataSum = 0 ;
11925 						var allData = this.allData().join(',').split(',') ;
11926 						$(allData).each(function(){
11927 							dataSum += parseFloat(this) ;
11928 						}) ;
11929 						return dataSum ;
11930 					} ,
11931 					topValue : function(){
11932 						var topValue = 0 ;
11933 						var allData = this.allData().join(',').split(',') ;
11934 						$(allData).each(function(){
11935 							if(parseFloat(this,10)>topValue){
11936 								topValue = parseFloat(this) ;
11937 							}
11938 						}) ;
11939 						return topValue ;
11940 					} ,
11941 					bottomValue : function(){
11942 						var bottomValue = 0 ;
11943 						var allData = this.allData().join(',').split(',') ;
11944 						$(allData).each(function(){
11945 							if(this<bottomValue){
11946 								bottomValue = parseFloat(this) ;
11947 							}
11948 						}) ;
11949 						return bottomValue ;
11950 					} ,
11951 					memberTotals : function(){
11952 						var memberTotals = [] ;
11953 						var dataGroups = this.dataGroups() ;
11954 						$(dataGroups).each(function(l){
11955 							var count = 0 ;
11956 							$(dataGroups[l].points).each(function(m){
11957 								count += dataGroups[l].points[m] ;
11958 							}) ;
11959 							memberTotals.push(count) ;
11960 						}) ;
11961 						return memberTotals ;
11962 					} ,
11963 					yTotals : function(){
11964 						var yTotals = [] ;
11965 						var dataGroups = this.dataGroups() ;
11966 						var loopLength = this.xLabels().length ;
11967 						for(var i=0; i<loopLength; i++){
11968 							yTotals[i] = [] ;
11969 							var thisTotal = 0 ;
11970 							$(dataGroups).each(function(l){
11971 								yTotals[i].push(this.points[i]) ;
11972 							}) ;
11973 							yTotals[i].join(',').split(',') ;
11974 							$(yTotals[i]).each(function(){
11975 								thisTotal += parseFloat(this) ;
11976 							}) ;
11977 							yTotals[i] = thisTotal ;
11978 						}
11979 						return yTotals ;
11980 					} ,
11981 					topYtotal : function(){
11982 						var topYtotal = 0 ;
11983 						var yTotals = this.yTotals().join(',').split(',') ;
11984 						$(yTotals).each(function(){
11985 							if(parseFloat(this,10)>topYtotal){
11986 								topYtotal = parseFloat(this) ;
11987 							}
11988 						}) ;
11989 						return topYtotal ;
11990 					} ,
11991 					totalYRange : function(){
11992 						return this.topValue() - this.bottomValue() ;
11993 					} ,
11994 					xLabels : function(){
11995 						var xLabels = [] ;
11996 						if(o.parseDirection == 'x'){
11997 							_self.find('tr:eq(0) th').filter(o.colFilter).each(function(){
11998 								xLabels.push($(this).html()) ;
11999 							}) ;
12000 						}else{
12001 							_self.find('tr:gt(0) th').filter(o.rowFilter).each(function(){
12002 								xLabels.push($(this).html()) ;
12003 							}) ;
12004 						}
12005 						return xLabels ;
12006 					} ,
12007 					yLabels : function(){
12008 						var yLabels = [] ;
12009 						yLabels.push(bottomValue) ;
12010 						var numLabels = Math.round(o.height/o.yLabelInterval) ;
12011 						var loopInterval = Math.ceil(totalYRange / numLabels) || 1 ;
12012 						while(yLabels[yLabels.length-1]<topValue - loopInterval){
12013 							yLabels.push(yLabels[yLabels.length - 1] + loopInterval) ;
12014 						}
12015 						yLabels.push(topValue) ;
12016 						return yLabels ;
12017 					}
12018 				} ;
12019 				return tableData ;
12020 			}
12021 			
12022 			//创建图表
12023 			var createChart = {
12024 				pie : function(){
12025 					canvasContain.addClass('visualize-pie') ;
12026 					if(o.pieLabelPos == 'outside'){
12027 						canvasContain.addClass('visualize-pie-outside') ;
12028 					}
12029 					var centerx = Math.round(canvas.width()/2) ;
12030 					var centery = Math.round(canvas.height()/2) ;
12031 					var radius = centery - o.pieMargin ;
12032 					var counter = 0.0 ;
12033 					var toRad = function(integer){
12034 						return (Math.PI/180)*integer ;
12035 					} ;
12036 					var labels = $('<ul class="visualize-labels"></ul>').insertAfter(canvas) ;
12037 					//绘制饼图
12038 					$.each(memberTotals,function(i){
12039 						var fraction = (this <= 0 || isNaN(this))? 0 : this / dataSum ;
12040 						ctx.beginPath() ;
12041 						ctx.moveTo(centerx, centery) ;
12042 						ctx.arc(centerx,centery,radius,counter * Math.PI * 2 - Math.PI * 0.5,(counter + fraction) * Math.PI * 2 - Math.PI * 0.5,false) ;
12043 						ctx.lineTo(centerx, centery) ;
12044 						ctx.closePath() ;
12045 						ctx.fillStyle = dataGroups[i].color ;
12046 						ctx.fill() ;
12047 						// draw labels
12048 						var sliceMiddle = (counter + fraction/2) ;
12049 						var distance = o.pieLabelPos == 'inside' ? radius/1.5 : radius +  radius / 5 ;
12050 						var labelx = Math.round(centerx + Math.sin(sliceMiddle * Math.PI * 2) * (distance)) ;
12051 						var labely = Math.round(centery - Math.cos(sliceMiddle * Math.PI * 2) * (distance)) ;
12052 						var leftRight = (labelx > centerx) ? 'right' : 'left' ;
12053 						var topBottom = (labely > centery) ? 'bottom' : 'top' ;
12054 						var labeltext = $('<span class="visualize-label">' + Math.round(fraction*100) + '%</span>').css(leftRight, 0).css(topBottom, 0);
12055 						var label = $('<li class="visualize-label-pos"></li>').appendTo(labels).css({left: labelx, top: labely}).append(labeltext);	
12056 						labeltext.css('font-size', radius / 8)
12057 								 .css('margin-'+leftRight, -labeltext.width()/2)
12058 								 .css('margin-'+topBottom, -labeltext.outerHeight()/2) ;							
12059 						if(dataGroups[i].textColor){ 
12060 							labeltext.css('color', dataGroups[i].textColor) ; 
12061 						}	
12062 						counter += fraction ;
12063 					}) ;
12064 				} ,
12065 				line : function(area){			
12066 					if(area){ 
12067 						canvasContain.addClass('visualize-area') ; 
12068 					}else{ 
12069 						canvasContain.addClass('visualize-line') ; 
12070 					}				
12071 					//write X labels
12072 					var xInterval = canvas.width() / (xLabels.length -1) ;
12073 					var xlabelsUL = $('<ul class="visualize-labels-x"></ul>').width(canvas.width()).height(canvas.height()).insertBefore(canvas) ;
12074 					$.each(xLabels, function(i){ 
12075 						var thisLi = $('<li><span>'+this+'</span></li>').prepend('<span class="line" />').css('left', xInterval * i).appendTo(xlabelsUL) ;						
12076 						var label = thisLi.find('span:not(.line)') ;
12077 						var leftOffset = label.width()/-2 ;
12078 						if(i==0){ 
12079 							leftOffset = 0 ; 
12080 						}else if(i==xLabels.length-1){ 
12081 							leftOffset = -label.width() ; 
12082 						}
12083 						label.css('margin-left', leftOffset).addClass('label') ;
12084 					});	
12085 					//write Y labels
12086 					var yScale = canvas.height() / totalYRange ;
12087 					var liBottom = canvas.height() / (yLabels.length-1) ;
12088 					var ylabelsUL = $('<ul class="visualize-labels-y"></ul>').width(canvas.width()).height(canvas.height()).insertBefore(canvas) ;						
12089 					$.each(yLabels,function(i){  
12090 						var thisLi = $('<li><span>'+this+'</span></li>').prepend('<span class="line" />').css('bottom',liBottom*i).prependTo(ylabelsUL) ;
12091 						var label = thisLi.find('span:not(.line)') ;
12092 						var topOffset = label.height()/-2 ;
12093 						if(i==0){ 
12094 							topOffset = -label.height() ; 
12095 						}
12096 						else if(i==yLabels.length-1){ 
12097 							topOffset = 0 ; 
12098 						}
12099 						label.css('margin-top', topOffset).addClass('label') ;
12100 					});	
12101 					//start from the bottom left
12102 					ctx.translate(0,zeroLoc) ;
12103 					//iterate and draw
12104 					$.each(dataGroups,function(h){
12105 						ctx.beginPath() ;
12106 						ctx.lineWidth = o.lineWeight ;
12107 						ctx.lineJoin = 'round' ;
12108 						var points = this.points ;
12109 						var integer = 0 ;
12110 						ctx.moveTo(0,-(points[0]*yScale)) ;
12111 						$.each(points,function(){
12112 							ctx.lineTo(integer,-(this*yScale)) ;
12113 							integer += xInterval ;
12114 						});
12115 						ctx.strokeStyle = this.color ;
12116 						ctx.stroke() ;
12117 						if(area){
12118 							ctx.lineTo(integer,0) ;
12119 							ctx.lineTo(0,0) ;
12120 							ctx.closePath() ;
12121 							ctx.fillStyle = this.color ;
12122 							ctx.globalAlpha = .3 ;
12123 							ctx.fill() ;
12124 							ctx.globalAlpha = 1.0 ;
12125 						}else{
12126 							ctx.closePath() ;
12127 						}
12128 					});
12129 				},
12130 				area : function(){
12131 					createChart.line(true) ;
12132 				},
12133 				bar : function(){
12134 					canvasContain.addClass('visualize-bar');
12135 					//write X labels
12136 					var xInterval = canvas.width() / (xLabels.length);
12137 					var xlabelsUL = $('<ul class="visualize-labels-x"></ul>')
12138 						.width(canvas.width())
12139 						.height(canvas.height())
12140 						.insertBefore(canvas);
12141 					$.each(xLabels,function(i){ 
12142 						var thisLi = $('<li><span class="label">'+this+'</span></li>').prepend('<span class="line" />').css('left', xInterval * i).width(xInterval).appendTo(xlabelsUL) ;
12143 						var label = thisLi.find('span.label') ;
12144 						label.addClass('label') ;
12145 					});
12146 					//write Y labels
12147 					var yScale = canvas.height() / totalYRange ;
12148 					var liBottom = canvas.height() / (yLabels.length-1) ;
12149 					var ylabelsUL = $('<ul class="visualize-labels-y"></ul>').width(canvas.width()).height(canvas.height()).insertBefore(canvas);
12150 					$.each(yLabels,function(i){  
12151 						var thisLi = $('<li><span>'+this+'</span></li>').prepend('<span class="line" />').css('bottom',liBottom*i).prependTo(ylabelsUL);
12152 						var label = thisLi.find('span:not(.line)');
12153 						var topOffset = label.height()/-2 ;
12154 						if(i == 0){ 
12155 							topOffset = -label.height() ; 
12156 						}else if(i== yLabels.length-1){ 
12157 							topOffset = 0; 
12158 						}
12159 						label.css('margin-top', topOffset).addClass('label');						
12160 					});
12161 					//start from the bottom left
12162 					ctx.translate(0,zeroLoc) ;
12163 					//iterate and draw
12164 					for(var h=0; h<dataGroups.length; h++){
12165 						ctx.beginPath() ;
12166 						var linewidth = (xInterval-o.barGroupMargin*2) / dataGroups.length ; //removed +1 
12167 						var strokeWidth = linewidth - (o.barMargin*2) ;
12168 						ctx.lineWidth = strokeWidth ;
12169 						var points = dataGroups[h].points ;
12170 						var integer = 0;
12171 						for(var i=0; i<points.length; i++){
12172 							var xVal = (integer-o.barGroupMargin)+(h*linewidth)+linewidth/2 ;
12173 							xVal += o.barGroupMargin*2 ;									
12174 							ctx.moveTo(xVal,0) ;
12175 							ctx.lineTo(xVal,Math.round(-points[i]*yScale)) ;
12176 							integer+=xInterval ;
12177 						}
12178 						ctx.strokeStyle = dataGroups[h].color ;
12179 						ctx.stroke() ;
12180 						ctx.closePath() ;
12181 					}
12182 				}
12183 			} ;
12184 			//create new canvas, set w&h attrs (not inline styles)
12185 			var canvasNode = document.createElement("canvas") ; 
12186 			canvasNode.setAttribute('height',o.height) ;
12187 			canvasNode.setAttribute('width',o.width) ;
12188 			var canvas = $(canvasNode) ;
12189 			//get title for chart
12190 			var title = o.title || _self.find('caption').text() ;
12191 			//create canvas wrapper div, set inline w&h, append
12192 			var canvasContain = (container || $('<div class="visualize" role="img" aria-label="Chart representing data from the table: '+ title +'" />')).height(o.height).width(o.width).append(canvas) ;
12193 			//scrape table (this should be cleaned up into an obj)
12194 			var tableData = scrapeTable() ;
12195 			var dataGroups = tableData.dataGroups() ;
12196 			var allData = tableData.allData() ;
12197 			var dataSum = tableData.dataSum() ;
12198 			var topValue = tableData.topValue() ;
12199 			var bottomValue = tableData.bottomValue() ;
12200 			var memberTotals = tableData.memberTotals() ;
12201 			var totalYRange = tableData.totalYRange() ;
12202 			var zeroLoc = o.height * (topValue/totalYRange) ;
12203 			var xLabels = tableData.xLabels() ;
12204 			var yLabels = tableData.yLabels() ;
12205 			
12206 			//title/key container
12207 			if(o.appendTitle || o.appendKey){
12208 				var infoContain = $('<div class="visualize-info"></div>').appendTo(canvasContain) ;
12209 			}
12210 			//append title
12211 			if(o.appendTitle){
12212 				$('<div class="visualize-title">'+ title +'</div>').appendTo(infoContain) ;
12213 			}
12214 			//append key
12215 			if(o.appendKey){
12216 				var newKey = $('<ul class="visualize-key"></ul>') ;
12217 				var selector ;
12218 				if(o.parseDirection == 'x'){
12219 					selector = _self.find('tr:gt(0) th').filter(o.rowFilter);
12220 				}else{
12221 					selector = _self.find('tr:eq(0) th').filter(o.colFilter);
12222 				}
12223 				_self.find(selector).each(function(i){
12224 					$('<li><span class="visualize-key-color" style="background: '+dataGroups[i].color+'"></span><span class="visualize-key-label">'+ $(this).text() +'</span></li>').appendTo(newKey) ;
12225 				});
12226 				newKey.appendTo(infoContain) ;
12227 				//append new canvas to page		
12228 				if(!container){
12229 					canvasContain.insertAfter(_self);
12230 				}
12231 				if(typeof(G_vmlCanvasManager) != 'undefined'){ 
12232 					G_vmlCanvasManager.initElement(canvas[0]); 
12233 				}					
12234 				//set up the drawing board	
12235 				var ctx = canvas[0].getContext('2d') ;				
12236 				//create chart
12237 				createChart[o.type]() ;
12238 				//clean up some doubled lines that sit on top of canvas borders (done via JS due to IE)
12239 				$('.visualize-line li:first-child span.line, .visualize-line li:last-child span.line, .visualize-area li:first-child span.line, .visualize-area li:last-child span.line, .visualize-bar li:first-child span.line,.visualize-bar .visualize-labels-y li:last-child span.line').css('border','none') ;
12240 				if(!container){
12241 					//add event for updating
12242 					canvasContain.bind('visualizeRefresh', function(){
12243 						_self.visualize(o, $(this).empty()) ; 
12244 					}) ;
12245 				}
12246 			};
12247 			o.customFn() ;//自定义方法调用
12248 		},
12249 		/**
12250 		* @description 清除表格转图表控件
12251 		* @return {tochart} tochart对象
12252 		* @example
12253 		* $("#testExpObj").tochart('destroy');
12254 		*/
12255 		destroy : function(){
12256 			var _self = this.element ;
12257 			var o = this.options ;
12258 			if(_self.next('.visualize').length > 0){
12259 				_self.next('.visualize').remove() ;
12260 			}
12261 		}
12262 	});
12263 
12264 	if(!document.createElement("canvas").getContext){
12265 		/*---不支持canvas浏览器处理开始---*/
12266 		document.createElement("canvas").getContext||(function(){var s=Math,j=s.round,F=s.sin,G=s.cos,V=s.abs,W=s.sqrt,k=10,v=k/2;function X(){return this.context_||(this.context_=new H(this))}var L=Array.prototype.slice;function Y(b,a){var c=L.call(arguments,2);return function(){return b.apply(a,c.concat(L.call(arguments)))}}var M={init:function(b){if(/MSIE/.test(navigator.userAgent)&&!window.opera){var a=b||document;a.createElement("canvas");a.attachEvent("onreadystatechange",Y(this.init_,this,a))}},init_:function(b){b.namespaces.g_vml_||
12267 		b.namespaces.add("g_vml_","urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml","#default#VML");b.namespaces.g_o_||b.namespaces.add("g_o_","urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office","#default#VML");if(!b.styleSheets.ex_canvas_){var a=b.createStyleSheet();a.owningElement.id="ex_canvas_";a.cssText="canvas{display:inline-block;overflow:hidden;text-align:left;width:300px;height:150px}g_vml_\\:*{behavior:url(#default#VML)}g_o_\\:*{behavior:url(#default#VML)}"}var c=b.getElementsByTagName("canvas"),d=0;for(;d<c.length;d++)this.initElement(c[d])},
12268 		initElement:function(b){if(!b.getContext){b.getContext=X;b.innerHTML="";b.attachEvent("onpropertychange",Z);b.attachEvent("onresize",$);var a=b.attributes;if(a.width&&a.width.specified)b.style.width=a.width.nodeValue+"px";else b.width=b.clientWidth;if(a.height&&a.height.specified)b.style.height=a.height.nodeValue+"px";else b.height=b.clientHeight}return b}};function Z(b){var a=b.srcElement;switch(b.propertyName){case "width":a.style.width=a.attributes.width.nodeValue+"px";a.getContext().clearRect();
12269 		break;case "height":a.style.height=a.attributes.height.nodeValue+"px";a.getContext().clearRect();break}}function $(b){var a=b.srcElement;if(a.firstChild){a.firstChild.style.width=a.clientWidth+"px";a.firstChild.style.height=a.clientHeight+"px"}}M.init();var N=[],B=0;for(;B<16;B++){var C=0;for(;C<16;C++)N[B*16+C]=B.toString(16)+C.toString(16)}function I(){return[[1,0,0],[0,1,0],[0,0,1]]}function y(b,a){var c=I(),d=0;for(;d<3;d++){var f=0;for(;f<3;f++){var h=0,g=0;for(;g<3;g++)h+=b[d][g]*a[g][f];c[d][f]=
12270 		h}}return c}function O(b,a){a.fillStyle=b.fillStyle;a.lineCap=b.lineCap;a.lineJoin=b.lineJoin;a.lineWidth=b.lineWidth;a.miterLimit=b.miterLimit;a.shadowBlur=b.shadowBlur;a.shadowColor=b.shadowColor;a.shadowOffsetX=b.shadowOffsetX;a.shadowOffsetY=b.shadowOffsetY;a.strokeStyle=b.strokeStyle;a.globalAlpha=b.globalAlpha;a.arcScaleX_=b.arcScaleX_;a.arcScaleY_=b.arcScaleY_;a.lineScale_=b.lineScale_}function P(b){var a,c=1;b=String(b);if(b.substring(0,3)=="rgb"){var d=b.indexOf("(",3),f=b.indexOf(")",d+
12271 		1),h=b.substring(d+1,f).split(",");a="#";var g=0;for(;g<3;g++)a+=N[Number(h[g])];if(h.length==4&&b.substr(3,1)=="a")c=h[3]}else a=b;return{color:a,alpha:c}}function aa(b){switch(b){case "butt":return"flat";case "round":return"round";case "square":default:return"square"}}function H(b){this.m_=I();this.mStack_=[];this.aStack_=[];this.currentPath_=[];this.fillStyle=this.strokeStyle="#000";this.lineWidth=1;this.lineJoin="miter";this.lineCap="butt";this.miterLimit=k*1;this.globalAlpha=1;this.canvas=b;
12272 		var a=b.ownerDocument.createElement("div");a.style.width=b.clientWidth+"px";a.style.height=b.clientHeight+"px";a.style.overflow="hidden";a.style.position="absolute";b.appendChild(a);this.element_=a;this.lineScale_=this.arcScaleY_=this.arcScaleX_=1}var i=H.prototype;i.clearRect=function(){this.element_.innerHTML=""};i.beginPath=function(){this.currentPath_=[]};i.moveTo=function(b,a){var c=this.getCoords_(b,a);this.currentPath_.push({type:"moveTo",x:c.x,y:c.y});this.currentX_=c.x;this.currentY_=c.y};
12273 		i.lineTo=function(b,a){var c=this.getCoords_(b,a);this.currentPath_.push({type:"lineTo",x:c.x,y:c.y});this.currentX_=c.x;this.currentY_=c.y};i.bezierCurveTo=function(b,a,c,d,f,h){var g=this.getCoords_(f,h),l=this.getCoords_(b,a),e=this.getCoords_(c,d);Q(this,l,e,g)};function Q(b,a,c,d){b.currentPath_.push({type:"bezierCurveTo",cp1x:a.x,cp1y:a.y,cp2x:c.x,cp2y:c.y,x:d.x,y:d.y});b.currentX_=d.x;b.currentY_=d.y}i.quadraticCurveTo=function(b,a,c,d){var f=this.getCoords_(b,a),h=this.getCoords_(c,d),g={x:this.currentX_+
12274 		0.6666666666666666*(f.x-this.currentX_),y:this.currentY_+0.6666666666666666*(f.y-this.currentY_)};Q(this,g,{x:g.x+(h.x-this.currentX_)/3,y:g.y+(h.y-this.currentY_)/3},h)};i.arc=function(b,a,c,d,f,h){c*=k;var g=h?"at":"wa",l=b+G(d)*c-v,e=a+F(d)*c-v,m=b+G(f)*c-v,r=a+F(f)*c-v;if(l==m&&!h)l+=0.125;var n=this.getCoords_(b,a),o=this.getCoords_(l,e),q=this.getCoords_(m,r);this.currentPath_.push({type:g,x:n.x,y:n.y,radius:c,xStart:o.x,yStart:o.y,xEnd:q.x,yEnd:q.y})};i.rect=function(b,a,c,d){this.moveTo(b,
12275 		a);this.lineTo(b+c,a);this.lineTo(b+c,a+d);this.lineTo(b,a+d);this.closePath()};i.strokeRect=function(b,a,c,d){var f=this.currentPath_;this.beginPath();this.moveTo(b,a);this.lineTo(b+c,a);this.lineTo(b+c,a+d);this.lineTo(b,a+d);this.closePath();this.stroke();this.currentPath_=f};i.fillRect=function(b,a,c,d){var f=this.currentPath_;this.beginPath();this.moveTo(b,a);this.lineTo(b+c,a);this.lineTo(b+c,a+d);this.lineTo(b,a+d);this.closePath();this.fill();this.currentPath_=f};i.createLinearGradient=function(b,
12276 		a,c,d){var f=new D("gradient");f.x0_=b;f.y0_=a;f.x1_=c;f.y1_=d;return f};i.createRadialGradient=function(b,a,c,d,f,h){var g=new D("gradientradial");g.x0_=b;g.y0_=a;g.r0_=c;g.x1_=d;g.y1_=f;g.r1_=h;return g};i.drawImage=function(b){var a,c,d,f,h,g,l,e,m=b.runtimeStyle.width,r=b.runtimeStyle.height;b.runtimeStyle.width="auto";b.runtimeStyle.height="auto";var n=b.width,o=b.height;b.runtimeStyle.width=m;b.runtimeStyle.height=r;if(arguments.length==3){a=arguments[1];c=arguments[2];h=g=0;l=d=n;e=f=o}else if(arguments.length==
12277 		5){a=arguments[1];c=arguments[2];d=arguments[3];f=arguments[4];h=g=0;l=n;e=o}else if(arguments.length==9){h=arguments[1];g=arguments[2];l=arguments[3];e=arguments[4];a=arguments[5];c=arguments[6];d=arguments[7];f=arguments[8]}else throw Error("Invalid number of arguments");var q=this.getCoords_(a,c),t=[];t.push(" <g_vml_:group",' coordsize="',k*10,",",k*10,'"',' coordorigin="0,0"',' style="width:',10,"px;height:",10,"px;position:absolute;");if(this.m_[0][0]!=1||this.m_[0][1]){var E=[];E.push("M11=",
12278 		this.m_[0][0],",","M12=",this.m_[1][0],",","M21=",this.m_[0][1],",","M22=",this.m_[1][1],",","Dx=",j(q.x/k),",","Dy=",j(q.y/k),"");var p=q,z=this.getCoords_(a+d,c),w=this.getCoords_(a,c+f),x=this.getCoords_(a+d,c+f);p.x=s.max(p.x,z.x,w.x,x.x);p.y=s.max(p.y,z.y,w.y,x.y);t.push("padding:0 ",j(p.x/k),"px ",j(p.y/k),"px 0;filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Matrix(",E.join(""),", sizingmethod='clip');")}else t.push("top:",j(q.y/k),"px;left:",j(q.x/k),"px;");t.push(' ">','<g_vml_:image src="',b.src,
12279 		'"',' style="width:',k*d,"px;"," height:",k*f,'px;"',' cropleft="',h/n,'"',' croptop="',g/o,'"',' cropright="',(n-h-l)/n,'"',' cropbottom="',(o-g-e)/o,'"'," />","</g_vml_:group>");this.element_.insertAdjacentHTML("BeforeEnd",t.join(""))};i.stroke=function(b){var a=[],c=P(b?this.fillStyle:this.strokeStyle),d=c.color,f=c.alpha*this.globalAlpha;a.push("<g_vml_:shape",' filled="',!!b,'"',' style="position:absolute;width:',10,"px;height:",10,'px;"',' coordorigin="0 0" coordsize="',k*10," ",k*10,'"',' stroked="',
12280 		!b,'"',' path="');var h={x:null,y:null},g={x:null,y:null},l=0;for(;l<this.currentPath_.length;l++){var e=this.currentPath_[l];switch(e.type){case "moveTo":a.push(" m ",j(e.x),",",j(e.y));break;case "lineTo":a.push(" l ",j(e.x),",",j(e.y));break;case "close":a.push(" x ");e=null;break;case "bezierCurveTo":a.push(" c ",j(e.cp1x),",",j(e.cp1y),",",j(e.cp2x),",",j(e.cp2y),",",j(e.x),",",j(e.y));break;case "at":case "wa":a.push(" ",e.type," ",j(e.x-this.arcScaleX_*e.radius),",",j(e.y-this.arcScaleY_*e.radius),
12281 		" ",j(e.x+this.arcScaleX_*e.radius),",",j(e.y+this.arcScaleY_*e.radius)," ",j(e.xStart),",",j(e.yStart)," ",j(e.xEnd),",",j(e.yEnd));break}if(e){if(h.x==null||e.x<h.x)h.x=e.x;if(g.x==null||e.x>g.x)g.x=e.x;if(h.y==null||e.y<h.y)h.y=e.y;if(g.y==null||e.y>g.y)g.y=e.y}}a.push(' ">');if(b)if(typeof this.fillStyle=="object"){var m=this.fillStyle,r=0,n={x:0,y:0},o=0,q=1;if(m.type_=="gradient"){var t=m.x1_/this.arcScaleX_,E=m.y1_/this.arcScaleY_,p=this.getCoords_(m.x0_/this.arcScaleX_,m.y0_/this.arcScaleY_),
12282 		z=this.getCoords_(t,E);r=Math.atan2(z.x-p.x,z.y-p.y)*180/Math.PI;if(r<0)r+=360;if(r<1.0E-6)r=0}else{var p=this.getCoords_(m.x0_,m.y0_),w=g.x-h.x,x=g.y-h.y;n={x:(p.x-h.x)/w,y:(p.y-h.y)/x};w/=this.arcScaleX_*k;x/=this.arcScaleY_*k;var R=s.max(w,x);o=2*m.r0_/R;q=2*m.r1_/R-o}var u=m.colors_;u.sort(function(ba,ca){return ba.offset-ca.offset});var J=u.length,da=u[0].color,ea=u[J-1].color,fa=u[0].alpha*this.globalAlpha,ga=u[J-1].alpha*this.globalAlpha,S=[],l=0;for(;l<J;l++){var T=u[l];S.push(T.offset*q+
12283 		o+" "+T.color)}a.push('<g_vml_:fill type="',m.type_,'"',' method="none" focus="100%"',' color="',da,'"',' color2="',ea,'"',' colors="',S.join(","),'"',' opacity="',ga,'"',' g_o_:opacity2="',fa,'"',' angle="',r,'"',' focusposition="',n.x,",",n.y,'" />')}else a.push('<g_vml_:fill color="',d,'" opacity="',f,'" />');else{var K=this.lineScale_*this.lineWidth;if(K<1)f*=K;a.push("<g_vml_:stroke",' opacity="',f,'"',' joinstyle="',this.lineJoin,'"',' miterlimit="',this.miterLimit,'"',' endcap="',aa(this.lineCap),
12284 		'"',' weight="',K,'px"',' color="',d,'" />')}a.push("</g_vml_:shape>");this.element_.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeEnd",a.join(""))};i.fill=function(){this.stroke(true)};i.closePath=function(){this.currentPath_.push({type:"close"})};i.getCoords_=function(b,a){var c=this.m_;return{x:k*(b*c[0][0]+a*c[1][0]+c[2][0])-v,y:k*(b*c[0][1]+a*c[1][1]+c[2][1])-v}};i.save=function(){var b={};O(this,b);this.aStack_.push(b);this.mStack_.push(this.m_);this.m_=y(I(),this.m_)};i.restore=function(){O(this.aStack_.pop(),
12285 		this);this.m_=this.mStack_.pop()};function ha(b){var a=0;for(;a<3;a++){var c=0;for(;c<2;c++)if(!isFinite(b[a][c])||isNaN(b[a][c]))return false}return true}function A(b,a,c){if(!!ha(a)){b.m_=a;if(c)b.lineScale_=W(V(a[0][0]*a[1][1]-a[0][1]*a[1][0]))}}i.translate=function(b,a){A(this,y([[1,0,0],[0,1,0],[b,a,1]],this.m_),false)};i.rotate=function(b){var a=G(b),c=F(b);A(this,y([[a,c,0],[-c,a,0],[0,0,1]],this.m_),false)};i.scale=function(b,a){this.arcScaleX_*=b;this.arcScaleY_*=a;A(this,y([[b,0,0],[0,a,
12286 		0],[0,0,1]],this.m_),true)};i.transform=function(b,a,c,d,f,h){A(this,y([[b,a,0],[c,d,0],[f,h,1]],this.m_),true)};i.setTransform=function(b,a,c,d,f,h){A(this,[[b,a,0],[c,d,0],[f,h,1]],true)};i.clip=function(){};i.arcTo=function(){};i.createPattern=function(){return new U};function D(b){this.type_=b;this.r1_=this.y1_=this.x1_=this.r0_=this.y0_=this.x0_=0;this.colors_=[]}D.prototype.addColorStop=function(b,a){a=P(a);this.colors_.push({offset:b,color:a.color,alpha:a.alpha})};function U(){}G_vmlCanvasManager=
12287 		M;CanvasRenderingContext2D=H;CanvasGradient=D;CanvasPattern=U})();
12288 		/*---不支持canvas浏览器处理结束---*/
12289 	}
12290 	$.extend($.fn.tochart, {
12291 		version: "1.3"
12292 	});
12293 })(jQuery);/*
12294  *作    者: 黄卉
12295  *版    本: 1.3
12296  *完成时间: 2012-12-3
12297  *描    述: formatImage 图片尺寸格式化
12298  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js 
12299  */
12300 (function($,undefined){
12301     /**
12302 	* @class  图片尺寸格式化
12303     * @name formatImage
12304     * @description  图片尺寸格式化插件
12305 	* @version 1.3
12306     */
12307 	$.widget("ui.formatImage",
12308 	/** @lends formatImage.prototype */
12309 	{
12310 		options:{
12311 			width: '150px' ,    //实际显示的宽度，默认值为150px
12312 			height:'100px',     //实际显示的高度，默认值为100px			
12313 			position :'center'  // 从什么地方开始剪切图片，'top'左上角，'center'中间，'bottom'右下角，默认值为‘center’
12314 		},
12315 		_create:function(){
12316 			var o = this.options,$img = this.element,
12317 				$view=$('<div class="ui-formatImage-view"></div>'),
12318 				dataW = parseFloat($img.attr("data-formatImage-width")||0),//获取样式中的预定义
12319 				dataH = parseFloat($img.attr("data-formatImage-height")||0),
12320 				viewW = (dataW!=0)?dataW:parseFloat(o.width),
12321 				viewH = (dataH!=0)?dataH:parseFloat(o.height); 
12322 			$view.css({'width':viewW,'height':viewH});
12323 			$img.attr({'initWidth':$img.width()||$img[0].naturalWidth,
12324 					'initHeight':$img.height()}||$img[0].naturalHeight)//初始化的高度宽度，用于插件销毁
12325 				.wrap($view);	
12326 					 					
12327 		},
12328 		/**
12329 		 * @description this.options中各参数变化时，调用这个方法，修改滚动条的各参数
12330 		 * 内部方法（在_creat和_setOption中都调用了）
12331 		 **/
12332 		_init:function(){
12333 			var $img = this.element,
12334 				src = $img[0].getAttribute('src'),
12335 				that = this;
12336 			$img[0].setAttribute('src','');
12337 			$img[0].onload = null;
12338 			$img[0].onload = function(){
12339 				that.imgOnload();
12340 			}
12341 			$img[0].setAttribute('src',src);	
12342 		},
12343 		
12344 		/**
12345 		 * @description 当this.options改变时，jquery-ui自动调用该方法，然后调用_init()方法
12346 		 * */
12347 		_setOption:function(key, value) {
12348 			this.options[key] = value;  
12349 		},
12350 		imgOnload:function(){
12351 			var o = this.options,$img = this.element,
12352 				$view = $img.parent('div.ui-formatImage-view'),
12353 				imgW = parseFloat($img[0].naturalWidth||$img.width()),imgH = parseFloat($img[0].naturalHeight||$img.height()),//取图片自然高度和宽度
12354 				viewW = (o.width=='150px')?parseFloat($view.width()):o.width,
12355 				viewH = (o.height=='100px')?parseFloat($view.height()):o.height;
12356 			$view.css({'width':viewW,'height':viewH});
12357 			if(imgW==0||imgH==0){return;}
12358 			var x = viewW/imgW,
12359 				y = viewH/imgH,
12360 				multiple = x>y?x:y,
12361 				targetW = imgW*multiple,targetH = imgH*multiple,
12362 				left = viewW-targetW,
12363 				top = viewH-targetH;
12364 			$img.css({'width':targetW,'height':targetH});
12365 			var posi = (o.position=='center')?$img.attr('data-formatImage-position'):o.position;
12366 			switch(posi){
12367 				case 'top':
12368 					$img.css({'left':0,'top':0});
12369 					break;
12370 				case 'bottom':
12371 					$img.css({'left':left,'top':top});	
12372 					break;
12373 				default:
12374 					$img.css({'left':left/2,'top':top/2});	
12375 					break;	
12376 			}
12377 			return $img;
12378 		},
12379 		/**
12380 		* @description 销毁滚动条
12381 		* @return {formatImage} formatImage对象
12382 		* @example 想移除事件，在移除dom元素
12383 		* $("#logo").formatImage('destroy');
12384 		*/
12385 		destroy:function(){
12386 			var $img = this.element;
12387 			$img[0].onload = null;
12388 			$img.removeAttr('left').removeAttr('top')
12389 				.removeAttr('data-formatimage-width')
12390 				.removeAttr('data-formatimage-height')
12391 				.removeAttr('data-formatimage-position')
12392 				.removeClass('ui-formatImage')
12393 				.unwrap('div.ui-formatImage-view');
12394 			var width = $img.attr('initWidth'),
12395 				height = $img.attr('initHeight');
12396 			if(width!=$img[0].naturalWidth){
12397 				$img.width(width);
12398 			}
12399 			if(height!=$img[0].naturalHeight){
12400 				$img.height(height);
12401 			}
12402 			$img.removeAttr('initWidth').removeAttr('initHeight');
12403 		}
12404 	});
12405 
12406 	$.extend($.ui.formatImage, {
12407 		version : "1.3",
12408 		author : "黄卉",
12409 		date:"2012-12-19"
12410 	});
12411 
12412 })(jQuery);
12413 
12414 $(function(){
12415 	$(".ui-formatImage").formatImage();//初始化方法
12416 	//$(".ui-formatImage").formatImage('destroy');销毁方法
12417 });/*
12418  *作    者: 黄卉
12419  *版    本: 1.3
12420  *完成时间: 2012-12-25
12421  *描    述: readModel阅读模式插件
12422  *关联文件: jQuery.js|jquery-ui.js 
12423  */
12424 (function($,undefined){
12425     /**
12426 	* @class 阅读模式插件
12427     * @name readModel
12428     * @description 阅读模式，类似视频网站的关灯效果
12429 	* @version 1.3
12430     */
12431 	$.widget("ui.readModel",
12432 	/** @lends readModel.prototype */
12433 	{
12434 		 options:{
12435 			 height:'',  //目标元素的高度
12436  			 width:'', //目标元素的宽度
12437 			 model:'default', //阅读模式，在原来的位置default、在显示区域的中间位置center
12438 			 iframe:false  //是否跨iframe显示
12439 		 },
12440 		/*
12441 		 * @description 显示插件
12442 		 * @example 显示插件，开灯
12443 		 * $("#targetID").readModel('show');
12444 		 **/
12445 		 show:function(){
12446 			var o = this.options,$target = this.element,top=0,left=0,that = this,
12447 				$readBg = $('<div class="ui-readModel-bg"></div>'),
12448 				$closeSpan = $('<span class="ui-readModel-close"></span>'),
12449 				maxHeight = 0,maxWidth=0,closeLeft =0;
12450 			$('html').css('overflow','hidden');
12451 			maxHeight = Math.max(document.body.offsetHeight,o.height||$target.height());
12452 			maxWidth = Math.max(document.body.offsetWidth,o.width||$target.width());
12453 			$readBg.css({'height':maxHeight,'width':maxWidth});
12454 			$target.attr('initStyle',$target.attr('style'));
12455 			if(o.height!=''){$target.height(o.height);}			
12456 			if(o.width!=''){$target.width(o.width);}
12457 			else{$target.css('width',$target.width())}
12458 			if(o.model=='center'){
12459 				var winHeight = parseFloat($(window).height()),
12460 					winWidth = parseFloat($(window).width()),
12461 					tarHeight = parseFloat($target.height()),
12462 					tarWidth = parseFloat($target.width()),
12463 					scrollTop = document.body.scrollTop || document.documentElement.scrollTop,
12464 					scrollLeft = document.body.scrollLeft || document.documentElement.scrollLeft;
12465 				top = winHeight<tarHeight?scrollTop+15:winHeight/2 - tarHeight/2+scrollTop;
12466 				left = winWidth<tarWidth?scrollLeft+15: winWidth/2-tarWidth/2+scrollLeft;
12467 			}else if(o.model=='default'){
12468 				top = $target.offset().top;
12469 				left = $target.offset().left;
12470 			}
12471 			if($target.width()==maxWidth){
12472 				closeLeft =0;
12473 			}else{
12474 				closeLeft = left+$target.width()-15;
12475 			}
12476 			$closeSpan.css({'top':top-15,'left':closeLeft})
12477 				.bind('click',function(){that.hide();});
12478 			if(o.iframe){
12479 				if(window.top.document=='undefined'||window.top.document==null||window.top.document==''){
12480 					$target.css({'position':'absolute','top':top,'left':left});
12481 					$target.wrap($readBg).before($closeSpan);
12482 				}else{
12483 					var $targetClone = $target.clone(true);//clone方法在jqueryUI中remove的时候会触发插件的所有destroy方法
12484 					$targetClone.addClass('ui-readModel-clone').css({'position':'absolute','top':top,'left':left});
12485 					$(window.top.document.body).append($readBg);
12486 					$readBg.append($targetClone).append($closeSpan);
12487 				}				
12488 			}else{
12489 				$target.css({'position':'absolute','top':top,'left':left});
12490 				$target.wrap($readBg).before($closeSpan);
12491 			}			
12492 		},
12493 		/*
12494 		 * @description 隐藏插件
12495 		 * @example 隐藏插件，关灯
12496 		 * $("#targetID").readModel('hide');
12497 		 **/
12498 		hide:function(){
12499 			var o = this.options,$target = this.element,
12500 				$readBg = $('div.ui-readModel-bg'),
12501 				$closeSpan = $readBg.find('.ui-readModel-close');
12502 			$target.attr('style',$target.attr('initStyle')).removeAttr('initStyle');
12503 			$closeSpan.unbind('click');
12504 			if(o.iframe){
12505 				$readBg.hide();
12506 				var $targetClone = $readBg.find('.ui-readModel-clone');
12507 				if($targetClone.length!=0){
12508 					$targetClone.remove();
12509 					$target.unwrap($readBg);
12510 					$closeSpan.remove();
12511 				}else{
12512 					$target.unwrap($readBg);
12513 					$closeSpan.remove();	
12514 				}
12515 			}else{
12516 				$target.unwrap($readBg);
12517 				$closeSpan.remove();					
12518 			}
12519 			$('html').css('overflow','');
12520 		},
12521 		destroy:function(){
12522 			//alert('destroy');
12523 		}
12524 	});
12525 
12526 	$.extend($.ui.readModel, {
12527 		version: "1.3",
12528 		author:'黄卉',
12529 		date:'2012-12-24'
12530 	});
12531 
12532 })(jQuery);
12533 
12534 $(function(){
12535 	$(".ui-readModel").readModel();		
12536 	//$(".ui-readModel").readModel('destroy');
12537 });
